22a7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba chos ston to/ /'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de na byang chub
22a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa zhig 'dug pa des 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir shes rab
22b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi ral gri'i mtshon rnon po thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ga la ba de logs su brgyugs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis shes rab kyi mtshon las brtsams te/ ci nas kyang
22b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can dpag tu med pa dag mig rnam par dag pa dang / sems rnam par grol ba dang / bzod pa skyes pa dang / byang chub la zhugs par gyur pa de de lta de ltar chos bstan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas kyang 'khor
22b3(dkon brtsegs): de na sems can las dang po pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba rnam par rtog pa med pa gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis mtshon de mi mthong zhing chos bstan pa de yang mi thos pa de ltar byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas gnas brtan
22b4(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod kyis ston pa bgrongs pa'i phyir brtul pa'i las mi bzad pa mngon par 'dus byas pa de khyod la gang du rnam par smin par 'gyur/ 'jam
22b5(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ kho bos las mi bzad pa de lta bu ni byas na de gang du rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i gnas ni mi shes so/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu de lta mod kyi sgyu
22b6(dkon brtsegs): ma'i skyes bu'i las gang du rnam par smin par 'gyur ba der kho bo'i yang rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu sgyu ma'i skye bu yang ma rtog rnam par mi rtog la/ chos thams cad kyang mi rtog rnam
22b7(dkon brtsegs): par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar de btsun pa nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar ston cig /btsun pa mtshon dmigs su yod dam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no/ /'jam
22b8(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis smras pa / btsun pa las dmigs su yod dam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rnam par smin pa dmigs su yod dam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
23a1(dkon brtsegs): de ni ma yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu mtshon yang med/ las kyang med/ rnam par smin pa yang med na 'o na las de gang du rnam par smin par 'gyur/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
23a2(dkon brtsegs): dpal khyod kyis bsam pa des bstan pa ltar na las de ni gang du yang rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad las med pa/ rnam par smin pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gang dag
23a3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni ci nas kyang bdag cag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu mchi zhing sangs rgyas kyi
23a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing de dag tu chos ston par 'gyur ba de ltar thugs spro bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag je rang rang gi sangs rgyas
23a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing rnams su ltos shig / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bltas so/ /bltas pa na phyogs bcu kun gyi rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag nas 'jam
23a6(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sgra snyan pa yang thos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan snga na 'dug cing lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid 'dri ba la chos ston pa dang / de dag
23a7(dkon brtsegs): tu byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de snyed dang / lha'i bu 'dus pa de snyed kyang mthong ngo / /mthong bas kyang 'di snyam du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas kyang mi g.yo la/ thams cad du yang
23a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nye bar ston pa ni ngo mtshar to/ /ngo mtshar to snyam du ngo mtshar dang ldan par gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste dper na
23b1(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma mkhan ni sgyu ma shin tu bslabs pa'i phyir stan las kyang mi g.yo la/ gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang ston par byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la legs par bslabs pa yang
23b2(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams la sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed du bzhin nye bar ston par 'dod pa de snyed du sprul pa dag sprul par byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos 'di sgyu ma lta bur rig pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
23b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'o/ /chos kyi rnam
23b4(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di thos pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'dra ste/ 'jam dpal chos
23b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos shing yid ches pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa gang yin pa de ni 'dra ba yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin lags ste/ de ni stong pa nyid ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so/ /
23b6(dkon brtsegs): de ni mtshan ma ma mchis ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so/ /de ni smon pa ma mchis pa ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so/ /de ni de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so/ /de ni chos kyi dbyings ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so/ /
23b7(dkon brtsegs): de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so/ /de ni mnyam pa nyid ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so/ /de ni rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so/ /de ni dben pa ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so/ /de nas
23b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha mar gyur pa na spyod par 'gyur zhing / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi
24a1(dkon brtsegs): bu mo dag gi rna lam du grag par 'gyur ba de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang mi rnams kyi rol mo'i sgra gang ji snyed pa de dag
24a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ma dkrol bar sgra grag cing shing ljon pa thams cad las kyang me tog sna tshogs dag rab tu rgyas shing lhags par gyur to/ /rdzing bu dag nas kyang pad ma mang po dag rab tu 'thon par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
24a3(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur nas nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to/ /lha bye ba 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ steng gi bar snang la 'khod
24a4(dkon brtsegs): nas me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing phye ma dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa'i char dag kyang mngon par rab tu 'bebs so/ /sil snyen dag kyang rab tu gsil zhing lha'i glu dbyangs mang po dag kyang bsgrags
24a5(dkon brtsegs): nas thams cad kyis kyang thal mo sbyar ba btud de kha 'thun par tshig 'di skad ces a la la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa'i chos/ a la la chos/ a la la chos/ 'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor ba
24a6(dkon brtsegs): yang mthong ngo / /sems can gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang / thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas skrag par
24a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ba de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ zab mo la bzod pa yin no zhes kyang smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos
24a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab pa'i slad du snga ltas 'di dag byung ba lags na/ de ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na spyod par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
24b1(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir snga ltas 'di dag byung ba yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs mdzad du
24b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la brten nas rnam par grol ba'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
24b3(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na spyod par gyur cig / 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag ma mchis pa dang / sems can ma mchis pa dang / srog ma mchis pa
24b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang zag ma mchis pa dang / shed las skyes ma mchis pa dang / shed bu ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis dang / rnam par byang pa ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi
24b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na spyod par gyur cig / bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'dod chags ma mchis pa dang / zhe sdang ma mchis pa dang / gti mug ma mchis pa dang /
24b6(dkon brtsegs): ming ma mchis pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa dang / sgyu ma mchis pa dang / lta ba ma mchis pa dang / srid pa ma mchis pa dang / srid pa yongs su 'tshal ba ma mchis pa dang / lus ma mchis pa dang / lus su gdags
24b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis pa dang / sems ma mchis pa dang / sems su gdags pa ma mchis pa dang / dran pa ma mchis pa dang / dran par bgyid pa dag ma mchis pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dag ma mchis pa dang / gzhag
24b8(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis pa dang / nye bar gzhag pa ma mchis pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa dang / tshor ba ma mchis pa dang / 'du shes ma mchis pa dang / 'du byed rnams ma mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa dang /
25a1(dkon brtsegs): mig ma mchis pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa dang / rna ba ma mchis pa dang / sgra ma mchis pa dang / sna ma mchis pa dang / dri ma mchis pa dang / lce ma mchis pa dang / ro ma mchis pa dang / lus ma mchis pa dang /
25a2(dkon brtsegs): reg ma mchis pa dang / yid ma mchis pa dang / chos ma mchis pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams ma mchis pa dang / gzugs kyi khams ma mchis pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams ma mchis pa dang / 'di la rtag pa ma mchis pa
25a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / chad pa ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na spyod par gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa ma mchis pa
25a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba ma mchis pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba ma mchis pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang /
25a5(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa ma mchis pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams ma mchis pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ma mchis pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin
25a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i chos rnams ma mchis pa dang / stobs rnams ma mchis pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams ma mchi dang / ye shes ma mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa dang / stong pa nyid ma mchis pa dang /
25a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa ma mchis pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid ma mchis pa dang / rang bzhin ma mchis pa dang / 'thob pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon sum du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang /
25a8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa dang / rig pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par grol ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gram ma mchis pa dang / pha rol ma mchis pa dang / tshu rol ma mchis pa dang / thar pa ma mchis pa dang / ming ma
25b1(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang / ming du gdags pa ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na spyod par gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis chos
25b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'dis 'ga' yang ma sbyar/ ma grol mi sbyor/ mi 'grol ba'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na spyod par gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i
25b3(dkon brtsegs): tshig gang gis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis sems can 'ga' yang ma bkrol/ yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas pa de dag gis sems can 'ga' yang ma
25b4(dkon brtsegs): brnyes/ ma bshig /chos 'ga' yang ma bskyed/ ma bkag /rnam par ma bshig /ma bskyod pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis sems can 'ga'
25b5(dkon brtsegs): yang 'grol bar mi 'gyur/ yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar mi 'gyur/ de dag gis sems can yang brnyes par mi 'gyur/ 'jig par mi 'gyur/ chos 'ga' yang skyed par mi 'gyur/ 'gog par mi 'gyur/ rnam par 'jig par
25b6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur/ bskyod par mi 'gyur ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis sems can 'ga' yang mi 'grol/ yongs su mya ngan las mi zlo/ de dag gis
25b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'ga' yang mi brnyes/ mi 'jig /chos 'ga' yang mi skyed/ mi 'gog /rnam par mi 'jig mi bskyod pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na spyod par gyur
25b8(dkon brtsegs): cig / bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis chos bstan pa 'di la cung zad kyang ma smras/ ma brjod/ ma bshad/ ma bstan/ ma brtags/ ma bsgrags/ ma bsnyad/ ma smos/ ma bzlas shing / chos bstan pa 'di
26a1(dkon brtsegs): la yi ge gcig kyang ma brjod la/ chos bstan pa 'di gang gis kyang ma mnyan/ 'ga' yang nyan par mi 'gyur/ 'ga' yang rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig
26a2(dkon brtsegs): des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na 'dzam bu'i gling na spyod par gyur cig / bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'di la tshul khrims ma mchis pa dang / tshul khrims
26a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ma mchis pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas ma mchis pa dang / shes rab ma mchis pa dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ma mchis pa dang / rnam par grol ba ma mchis
26a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na 'dzam bu'i gling na spyod par gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das bden pa
26a5(dkon brtsegs): dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa stsol bar mi bgyid/ tshul khrims srung bar mi bgyid/ bzod pa sgrub par mi bgyid/ brtson 'grus rtsom par mi bgyid/ bsam gtan rnams
26a6(dkon brtsegs): sgom par mi bgyid/ shes rab spyod par mi bgyid/ byang chub don du gnyer bar mi bgyid/ yang dag pa la 'jug par mi bgyid/ byang chub thob par mi bgyid/ stobs rnams thob par mi bgyid/
26a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs pa rnams thob par mi bgyid/ dbang po rnams thob par mi bgyid/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams thob par mi bgyid/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar mi bgyid/ sems can grol
26a8(dkon brtsegs): bar mi bgyid/ smra bar mi bgyid pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na/ 'dzam bu'i gling na spyod par gyur cig /de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong
26b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du dog sa cher
26b2(dkon brtsegs): g.yos par gyur pa 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags rkyen ni gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa dman pa la mos pa'i
26b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'di dag 'dzin par mi 'gyur na ma legs kyis thong shig / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sman
26b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don gyi slad du bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sa phyogs 'di nyid du sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
26b5(dkon brtsegs): bdun bcu rtsa bzhis bstan te/ thams cad du yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis zhus so/ /byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha'i bu
26b6(dkon brtsegs): blo gros rab gnas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas ji srid cig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa rigs kyi bu 'di dag gis bskal pa grangs med pa phrag 'bum 'das pa na de bzhin
26b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa kun nas me tog mngon par 'phags pa seng ge'i rtsal gyi yon tan phung po zhes bya ba las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
26b8(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /de'i nyis gyur snyed kyis ni phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa thob bo/ /de'i nyis gyur snyed kyis ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnams par dag go/
27a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang / ji ltar 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha'i bu de dag dang / tshe dang
27a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i
27a3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa drug pa rdzogs so/ / // ban de klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis zhus pa/ / @#//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa
27a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u sum bcu rtsa bdun pa ste 'phags pa seng ges zhus pa/ sho lo ka drug bcu/ @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sing ha pa ri pr-i ts+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
27a5(dkon brtsegs): seng ges zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge
27a6(dkon brtsegs): slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs gcig go/ /thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs/ /rgyal ba gang zag mtshungs pa
27a7(dkon brtsegs): med/ /rgyal po ma skyes dgra yi bu/ /seng ge zhes ni grags pa zhig /tshong dpon bu pho lnga brgya yis/ /mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu/ /rgyal po'i khab nas de byung nas/ /rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po yis/ /gser las byas pa'i gdugs thogs te/ /
27a8(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gan song nas/ /zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ /lnga brgya po yis gdugs de dag /tshang bar thub pa che la phul/ /kun kyang byang chub don du zhugs/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mthu yis ni/ /de dag mi 'jigs skyes gyur nas/ /
27b1(dkon brtsegs): seng ges thal mo sbyar byas te/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la zhus pa ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang / /de ni 'dren pas bdag la gsungs/ /gang gis mdzes par 'gyur ba lags/ /gang gis rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ /skye ba dran par ji ltar 'gyur/ /
27b2(dkon brtsegs): thub pa chen pos lung bstan gsol/ /de dag lhag bsam ye shes kyis/ /mkhyen nas sangs rgyas lung bstan pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod gang zhes/ /khyod kyis dris pa de bstan to/ /bzod pa yis ni mdzes par 'gyur/ /tshangs par spyad
27b3(dkon brtsegs): pas rdzus te skye/ /chos kyi sbyin pas skye ba dran/ /gzhon nu de ltar shes par gyis/ /gang gis sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu dang / /gser mdog 'dra ba'i lus 'gyur zhing / /de mthong sems can dga' bar 'gyur/ /
27b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa kun gyis mtshan du 'gyur/ /byams pas de bzhin dpe byad bzang / /sems can kun la sems mnyam pas/ /rgyal ba gser gyi mdog 'drar 'gyur/ /gzungs ni gang gis thob par 'gyur/ /gang gis ting 'dzin skye 'gyur lags/ /
27b5(dkon brtsegs): gzung ba'i tshig tu gang gis 'gyur/ /thub pa chen pos lung bstan gsol/ /chos la bzod pas gzungs rnams 'thob/ /sems bsgoms pas ni ting 'dzin skye/ /kyal ba'i tshig rnams spang byas na/ /gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig tu 'gyur/ /
27b6(dkon brtsegs): dran dang ldan par ji ltar 'gyur/ /thub pa ji ltar blo gros ldan/ /ji ltar chos spyod 'gyur ba lags/ /skye bu dam pa mkhas cis 'gyur/ /g.yo med pas ni dran ldan 'gyur/ /don la sems pas blo gros ldan/ /gus dang bcas
27b7(dkon brtsegs): pas chos spyod 'gyur/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid rtogs pas mkhas/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/ /las gang gis ni skye bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon gyi mngon sum du/ /zhu ba zhu bar ji ltar 'gyur/ /gang
27b8(dkon brtsegs): zhig chos kyi sbyin pa la/ /nam yang bar chad mi byed pa/ /de ni des na myur rab tu/ /'jig rten mgon dang phrad par 'gyur/ /gang gis mi khom spong bar 'gyur/ /gang gis bzang 'gror mchi 'gyur lags/ /
28a1(dkon brtsegs): skye ba kun du skye ba na/ /bag mchis par ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /dad pas mi khom spong par 'gyur/ /tshul khrims kyis ni bzang 'gror 'gro/ /stong pa nyid ni bsgom byas na/ /rtag tu bag dang ldan par 'gyur/ /thub pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /
28a2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar las rnams dag par 'gyur/ /ji ltar bdud kyi snyis mi thogs/ /ji ltar chos kyi phongs 'gyur spong / /rnam par grol bas las rnams dag /brtson 'grus kyis ni bdud 'dul 'gyur/ /ci smras de bzhin byed pas ni/ /chos kyis phongs pa
28a3(dkon brtsegs): spong bar 'gyur/ /ka la ping ka'i sgra snyan dang / /tshangs pa'i dbyangs 'drar ji ltar 'gyur/ /thub pa mos pa sna tshogs kyi/ /sems can rnams ni gang gis dga'/ /bden par smras pas tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ /ngag rtsub spangs pas sgra snyan 'gyur/ /kyal
28a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshig dang phra ma rnams/ /spangs pas sems can dga' bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar tshe ring 'gyur ba lags/ /bro nad nyung bar ji ltar 'gyur/ /rnam par 'dren pa gang gis na/ /g.yog 'khor rnams ni mi phyed 'gyur/ /gsod pa mi byed tshe ring 'gyur/ /
28a5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'tshe bas ni nad nyung 'gyur/ /mi mthun pa dag bsdums byas na/ /g.yog 'khor rnams ni mi phyed 'gyur/ /don rnams ji ltar 'grub 'gyur lags/ /gang gis longs spyod mi nyams 'gyur/ /gang dang gang du skye ba der/ /dbang chen grags par ji ltar
28a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /chags pa med pas don rnams 'grub/ /ser sna med pas longs spyod 'phel/ /gang dang gang du skye ba der/ /phrag dog med pas dbang cher grags/ /ji ltar lha yi mig 'thob 'gyur/ /lha yi rna ba ji ltar 'thob/ /
28a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'chi 'pho skye ba dag /'dren pa gang gis 'tshal bar 'gyur/ /mar me byin pas mig 'thob 'gyur/ /rol mo'i sgra yis rna ba dag /'chi 'pho skye shes ye shes kyis/ /de dag de ltar 'grub par 'gyur/ /
28a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /zag pa gang gis pas par 'gyur/ /tshe rabs snga dran cis 'gyur lags/ /rdzu 'phrul ci yis 'thob par 'gyur/ /bzhon pa byin pas rdzu 'phrul 'thob/ /dran pa bsgoms
28b1(dkon brtsegs): pas rjes su dran/ /mtha' gnyis rab tu spang byas na/ /zag pa zad par reg par 'gyur/ /gang gis zhing ni phun sum tshogs/ /cis ni dge 'dun phun sum tshogs/ /gang gis phun sum tshogs 'od 'gyur/ /gang gis phyogs bcur lhang nger
28b2(dkon brtsegs): gda'/ /smon lam gyis ni phun sum zhing / /bsdu bas dge 'dun phun sum tshogs/ /'dir ni rin chen gdugs phul bas/ /phyogs bcur lhang nger snang bar 'gyur/ /chos rnams thams cad bsdu ba ni/ /
28b3(dkon brtsegs): chos gang gis ni thob par 'gyur/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa der/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba 'thob/ /sems can thams cad thar bya'i phyir/ /byang chub don du sems btud pa/ /des ni chos rnams
28b4(dkon brtsegs): bsdu ba 'thob/ /der ni dga' ba 'ang 'thob par 'gyur/ /bslab pa ci 'dra bslabs pa dang / /sems ni ci 'dra bsgoms pa yis/ /thub pa chen po khyod 'dra ba'i/ /ston pa thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur/ /
28b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can ma lus thams cad la/ /mnyam pa'i sems nyid bslabs pa dang / mnyam par sems ni bsgoms pas na/ /thams cad zil gnon rgyal bar 'gyur/ /skye ba kun tu byang chub sems/ /
28b6(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam na yang sems de ni/ /'dor mi 'gyur na ma nyal tshe/ /smos ci 'tshal bar gang gis 'gyur/ /grong dang grong khyer rnams su'am/ /gang du gnas pa'i yul rnams su/ /byang chub la ni yang dag 'dzud/ /
28b7(dkon brtsegs): des na sems 'dor mi 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang du skye bar yang / /ji ltar stobs ni cher 'gyur zhing / /rtag tu mthu yis 'phags pa dang / /bdud rnams bye bas mi tshugs 'gyur/ /'dir ni snying po lnga byin
28b8(dkon brtsegs): zhing / /skrag la mi 'jigs byin na ni/ /gang dang gang du skye bar yang / /des ni stobs ni cher 'gyur te/ /rtag tu mthu yis 'phags pa dang / /bdud rnams bye bas mi tshugs so/ /
29a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de/ /'jig rten mgon gyis mngon sum du/ /lung bstan pa 'di thos nas su/ /seng ge yid ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /seng ge grogs dang lhan cig tu/ /'di skad
29a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi ni tshig smras te/ /spyod pa bstan pa 'di la ni/ /bdag cag rjes su bslab par bgyi/ /de nas sangs rgyas 'dzum mdzad de/ /stong gsum po yang g.yos gyur nas/ /ma pham pas ni sangs rgyas la/ /
29a3(dkon brtsegs): ci zhig slad du 'dzum mdzad pa/ /thub chen lung bstan gsol zhes zhus/ /de skad zhu ba zhus pa dang / /ma pham pa la sangs rgyas kyis/ /'di skad ces ni bka' stsal to/ /gang gi phyir ni 'dzum mdzad pa/ /
29a4(dkon brtsegs): ma pham nga las 'dir nyon cig /sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad bcu dang / /gzhan yang khrag khrig phrag bcu la/ /byang chub don du 'dus nas ni/ /mi yi 'dren pa rnams la mchod/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang
29a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis mchog / mar me mdzad pa tshun chad du/ /bram ze'i khye'u 'di dag rnams/ /nga yis yongs su smin par byas/ /snang ba che zhes bya ba yi/ /bskal pa mdzes pa 'byung 'gyur te/ /de dag
29a6(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa gcig de la/ /rnam par 'dren par 'gyur ba ste/ /ye shes rtog gi rgyal mtshan zhes/ /'jig rten 'dren pa rnams su 'gyur/ /'od dpag med kyi bkod pa ltar/ /de dag gi yang de 'drar 'gyur/ /
29a7(dkon brtsegs): byams pa nas ni bzung nas su/ /bskal pa sum brgya tshang bar ni/ /de yi bar du dus kun du/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas phrad par 'gyur/ /'di dag byang chub thob pa yi/ /ming ni gang sus thos pa rnams/ /
29a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad 'jig rten du/ /kun mkhyen gang zag mtshungs med 'gyur/ /gang zhig lung bstan 'di thos nas/ /mos pa skyed par byed pa ni/ /'jig rten gsum po 'di dag na/ /de dang mtshungs
29b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsod nams med/ /gang gis bskal pa drug stong du/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad du/ /rin chen rnams kyis bkang byas nas/ /byang chub phyir 'dir byin pa bas/ /gang gis chos kyi rnam
29b2(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di/ /thos nas byang chub phyir 'jug na/ /sngar smos pa yi bsod nams kyis/ /grangs dang char yang mi phod do/ /chos 'di bshad pa'i tshe na ni/ /'jig rten mgon po'i mthu yis ni/ /
29b3(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams me tog char pa 'bebs/ /stong gsum po yang g.yos par 'gyur/ /seng ge grogs dang bcas pa yis/ /mngon par shes pa lnga thob nas/ /nyin bdun par du mchod byas nas/ /bstan
29b4(dkon brtsegs): pa la ni rab tu byung / /de dag kun kyis ting 'dzin 'thob/ /zad mi shes pa'i gzungs kyang thob/ /sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ /sangs rgyas chos la 'dzud par byed/ /chos kyi rnam grangs
29b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di bstan pa na sems can bye ba phrag brgyad bcu byang chub mchog la zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ seng ge grogs dang bcas pa dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang /
29b6(dkon brtsegs): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i
29b7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnams grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las seng ges zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum bcu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs so/ / //
29b8(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la dang / mu ni bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //
30a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnams grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u sum bcu rtsa brgyad pa ste sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen thabs la mkhas pa byang chub
30a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ye shes dam pas zhus pa/ /bam po dang po/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba bud d+ha ma hA ra ha s+yo pA ya kau sha l+ya dz+nyA nod ta ra bo d+hi sa twa pa ri
30a3(dkon brtsegs): pr-its+tsha pa ri brta nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen thabs la mkhas pa byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pas zhus
30a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
30a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong brgyad stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems
30a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po khri drug stong thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ mngon par shes pa sgrub pa la mkhas pa/ mi skye ba'i
30a7(dkon brtsegs): chos la bzod pa thob pa/ yon tan 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ des nas bcom ldan 'das phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe nang du
30a8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas ring po ma lon par 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/
30b1(dkon brtsegs): bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag par ston to/ /
30b2(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam
30b3(dkon brtsegs): pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan
30b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das la de skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das
30b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
30b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris
30b7(dkon brtsegs): shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
30b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
31a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa thabs la mkhas pa zhes bgyi na thabs la mkhas pa de gang lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
31a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po thams la mkhas pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes
31a3(dkon brtsegs): dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la
31a4(dkon brtsegs): snying brtse ba dang / lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
31a5(dkon brtsegs): po rnams kyi shes pa rjes su gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
31a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir zhugs te/ rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa
31a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dri bar sems pa ni rigs kyi bu yang khyod legs so/ /rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la zung shig dang / ngas byang chub sems dpa'
31a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/
31b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni
31b2(dkon brtsegs): zan kham gcig tsam yang sems can thams cad la sbyin par byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gang gi tshe dud 'gro'i skye
31b3(dkon brtsegs): g nas su gyur pa la zan kham gcig tsam yang sbyin par byed na de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin par byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad kyis
31b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par bya bar yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro/ /de rgyu gnyis kyis na sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo bar byed de/ gnyis gang zhe na/
31b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang / yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa nyid kyis te/ rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa
31b6(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa la rjes su yi rang
31b7(dkon brtsegs): bar byed cing / rjes su yi rang nas kyang sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo zhing btang ste yongs su bsngo bar yang byed do/ /de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su
31b8(dkon brtsegs): bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba'i sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag gang dag yin pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon par byed la len
32a1(dkon brtsegs): pa po gang dag yin pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon par byed de/ rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub
32a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa ni phyogs bcu dag na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / spos kyi shing ljon pa dang / me tog dang / me tog phreng dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa
32a3(dkon brtsegs): b dag gir ma byas shing yongs su ma bzung ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsam pas yongs su bzung zhing yongs su bsdus nas sangs rgyas thams cad la 'bul bar byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de
32a4(dkon brtsegs): yang sems can thams cad la gtong bar byed de/ yongs su btang nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed do/ /phyogs bcu dag na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / spos kyi
32a5(dkon brtsegs): shing ljon pa dang / me tog dang / me tog phreng dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa bdag gi dang bcas shing yongs su bzung ba dang / bcas pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi dri rlung gis btab
32a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ngad de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas sangs rgyas thams cad la 'bul bar byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bdag dang / sems can thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
32a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye
32a8(dkon brtsegs): shes mthong ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
32b1(dkon brtsegs): c hen po thabs la mkhas pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sems can sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas sems can de dag gi sdug
32b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad bsdus te 'chags par byed cing / 'di ltar sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad bdag gi lus la 'bab par 'gyur zhing sems can de dag
32b3(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gyur cig ces go cha gyon par yang byed do/ /phyogs bcu kun gyis 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sems can bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar gyur pa gang dag yin pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas
32b4(dkon brtsegs): pas de dag yang dag par bsdus te rjes su yi rang bar byed cing / rjes su yi rang nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa'i sems bskyed pas sems can thams cad kyis sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya
32b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed do/ /de dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad rnams 'thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs
32b6(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag byas/ bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas/
32b7(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur byas nas 'di ltar so sor rtog par byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings gcig las nges par byung ba dang / tshul khrims gcig pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gcig pa dang / shes rab gcig
32b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rnam par grol ba gcig pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba gcig pa dang / ye shes gcig pa dang / rig pa gcig pa yin no zhes so sor rtog par byed do/ /des de ltar so sor brtags nas 'di ltar shes
33a1(dkon brtsegs): par byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag byas/ bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas/ bsnyen bkur byas pas ni bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
33a2(dkon brtsegs): phyag byas pa dang / bkur sti byas pa dang / ri mor byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro snyam du shes par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa ni phyogs bcu'i
33a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mchod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad bsam pas yongs su bzung nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar byed de/ rigs kyi bu
33a4(dkon brtsegs): de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa ni gang gi tshe blo tshe rtul bar gyur na yang de bdag
33a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid khyad du gsod par mi byed cing / zhum par mi byed par de tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam la yang 'jug par byed cing de 'di ltar so sor rtog par yang byed de/ tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig po 'di'i
33a6(dkon brtsegs): don gang yin pa de ni gsung rab tu gtogs pa thams cad kyi don yin no zhes so sor rtog par byed do/ /des de ltar tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig kha ton du bslabs nas zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis snying rjes chen po
33a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed de/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa 'dod pa med pas grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu skye bo mang po la tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de rgya cher yang dag
33a8(dkon brtsegs): par ston par byed cing 'di ltar smon lam 'debs par yang byed de/ sems can gang su dag gis bdag gi tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du nges par
33b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs par yang byed do/ /de dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa des sems can thams cad kun dga' bo ltar mang du thos par 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa nyid kyang 'thob par 'gyur te/
33b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa ni gal te brgya la brgya lam na dbul por gyur
33b3(dkon brtsegs): na yang des tha na gzhan gyi las kyang byas te/ kha zas nal ze gang tsam yang blangs nas zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis dge 'dun nam/ gang zag la 'bul bar yang byed do/ /phul nas kyang de 'di ltar so sor rtog par byed de/
33b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis sems rgya chen pos byin na sbyin pa yang rgya chen por 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas na 'di ltar bdag gi sbyin par bya ba'i chos 'di ni chung mod kyi/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis byin pas dpag tu
33b5(dkon brtsegs): med par 'gyur ro snyam du so sor rtog par byed do/ /de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems tshad med par gyur pa des kha zas nal ze gang tsam po de sbyin par byed cing / bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang sems can thams
33b6(dkon brtsegs): c ad 'di lta ste dper na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ji lta ba bzhin du skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog 'grub par 'gyur zhing lag na rin po che
33b7(dkon brtsegs): grub par gyur cig ces yongs su sngo bar byed do/ /de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa des byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba'i sems can rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yang zil
33b8(dkon brtsegs): gyis gnon par 'gyur la/ skye bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog kyang 'grub par 'gyur/ lag na rin po che yang 'grub par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas
34a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gal te nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams
34a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par gyur kyang de dag la dga' bar mi byed cing / gal te byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la
34a3(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur lhag pa dag yod la/ bdag la de lta ma yin par mthong na yang de rgyu gnyis kyis bdag la rtog par byed de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las nges par byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
34a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams yin la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las nger par byung ba ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams yin no snyam du bdag nyid la rtog par byed cing / de 'di ltar so sor rtog par byed de/ 'di dag la bsnyen
34a5(dkon brtsegs): bkur ba lhag par dag yod mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'dir ni bdag nyid shin tu mchog dang / shin tu gtso bo yin gyi 'di dag ni ma yin no/ /de dag ni bdag gi pha'i nor gyi phung po la yongs su sbyod par byed pa ma yin pas bdag gis 'di dag la dga' bar yang mi
34a6(dkon brtsegs): bya la/ 'di dag la phrag dog kyang mi bya'o snyam du so sor rtog par byed do/ /des lhag pa'i bsam pas sems bskyed pa des gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas kyang khengs par mi 'gyur la/ bsnyen bkur ma byas
34a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sems can thams cad la thugs mnyam pa kun du 'dzin par mdzad pa lta bu'i rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spangs pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
34a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni sbyin pa sbyin pas pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /
34b1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gang gi tshe slongs mo ba mthong ba na de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs te/ ser sna'i sems tshar gcod par
34b2(dkon brtsegs): byed cing gtong ba chen po yang spel bar byed la/ sbyin no snyam pa'i sems kyang skyed pa gang yin pa de ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yin no/ /tshul khrims yang dag par blangs shing tshul khrims dang ldan pa la sbyin pa
34b3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin par byed pa dang / sems can tshul khrims 'chal ba gang dag yin pa de dag tshul khrims la 'god par byed cing sbyin pa sbyin nas 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god par byed pa gang yin
34b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yin no/ /byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / ma 'dres pa'i sems dang / ma 'khrugs pa'i sems dang / le lo med pa'i sems dang / rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang /
34b5(dkon brtsegs): snyoms pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba dang / bldag pa dang / myang ba dag la mngon par gus pa yang dag par sgrub par
34b6(dkon brtsegs): byed cing rtsol bar byed pa dang / lus kyis zhal ta byed pa dang / sems kyis zhal ta byed pa dang / ldang ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yin no/ /byin pa gang yin
34b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de la sems rtse gcig pa nyid dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i bsam pa dang / rnam par g.yeng ba med pa gang yin pa de ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /byin pa byin nas chos
34b8(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi rjes su yang dag par gzhol bar byed de/ sus byin/ su la byin/ ci zhig byin/ 'di'i rnam par smin pa sus myong bar 'gyur zhes chos nyid kyi rjes su yang dag par gzhol bar byed cing des de ltar yongs su btsal nas
35a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang gang gis byin pa dang / gang la byin pa dang / ci zhig byin pa dang / de'i rnam par smin pa myong bar byed pa gang yin pa'i chos 'ga' yang mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
35a2(dkon brtsegs): yin to/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni sbyin pa sbyin pas kyang pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
35a3(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pas sbyin pa gang gis
35a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyang 'khor ba las yongs su 'dzin par bgyid la/ sbyin pa de nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
35a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi thabs la mkhas pa de ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la
35a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa ni thabs la mkhas pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sbyin pa chung ngu yang chen por byed la/ chen po ni dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang
35a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gal te brgya la brgya lam
35a8(dkon brtsegs): na sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang ngam/ sems kun du rmongs pas nyes pa byung na yang de 'di ltar so sor slob ste/ gal te bdag phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched 'di dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par
35b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur na ni de lta na bdag gis yongs su gdung bar bya dgos par 'gyur bas bdag gis 'di ltar go cha bgo bar bya ste/ bdag sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du 'khor bar
35b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bar bya ba la bdag gis sems zhum par mi bya/ 'jigs par mi bya/ sems skrag par mi bya/ yongs su gdung bar mi bya zhing / ji lta ji ltar 'khor ba na 'khor bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya
35b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / nyes pa 'di yang chos bzhin du phyir bya zhing phyin chad nyes pa mi 'byung bar bya ba dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad kyang nyes pa las dbyung ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o zhes go cha gyon par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu
35b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni gal te rtsa ba'i nyes pa bzhi po thams cad byung bar gyur na yang thabs la mkhas pa des sel bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub
35b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' la nyes pa med ces smra'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
35b6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nongs pa dang bcas pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyis bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' so sor thar pa'i bslab pa la slob par byed na bskal
35b7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'bum gyi bar du rtsa ba dang 'bras bu za bar byed cing sems can thams cad kyi legs par smras pa dang / nyes par smras so cog bzod par byed du zin kyang / nyon thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la
35b8(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dag gis gnas par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtsa ba'i nyes pa lci ba zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rtsa ba'i nyes pa byung bar gyur
36a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de dag kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i skal pa med pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
36a2(dkon brtsegs): l dan pa'i yid la byed pa dag ma bshags ma spangs kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i skal pa med cing sangs rgyas kyi sa 'thob par
36a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i skal pa med de de ni gnas med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can
36a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi ston pa lags te/ mi mkhyen pa 'am/ ma gzigs pa 'am/ thugs su ma chud pa 'am/ mngon gsum du ma mdzad pa cung zad mi mnga' lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad
36a5(dkon brtsegs): ces dge slong gis nyes pa byung ba mthong na bcab par mi bya bar tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan dag gam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar smros shig ces bka' stsal pas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
36a6(dkon brtsegs): mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por thar chags su bsod snyoms kyi slad du mchi ba na/ grong khyer gzhan zhig na byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po zhes bgyi ba khri'i steng na bud med zhig dang lhan cig
36a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa mthong ba de dag byams pa dang ldan pa dang / nongs pa ma mchis pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol lags so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshig 'di skad ces gsol nas ring po ma lon par de nas de'i
36a8(dkon brtsegs): mod la sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar seng ge bar snang la ta la bdun srid tsam du 'phags te 'dug
36b1(dkon brtsegs): nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ nyes pa'i chos dang ldan pa bar snang la 'dug par nus snyam 'am/ kun dga' bos smras
36b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni mi nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur pa 'di la ji ltar na byang chub
36b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' nyes pa'i chos dang ldan pa dris shig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yul yul por gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
36b4(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gtso bo chen po 'di lta bu la nongs pa yongs su glengs pa gang lags pa'i nongs pa la nongs par 'chags shing mchis na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag
36b5(dkon brtsegs): gi nongs pa la nongs par bshags pa gang lags pa de nongs pa la nongs par yongs su gzung du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga'
36b6(dkon brtsegs): bo khyod theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa dag la nyes pa'i 'du shes ma skyed cig / kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gcig pu zla med par zhi gnas kyi
36b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas gnas par byed pa ni zag pa zad pa mngon sum du bya ba la bar chad med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa thams cad
36b8(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ldan pa bud med kyi 'khor dam pa'i nang na 'dug cing dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyod par byed pa yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bar du gcod pa med par rig par
37a1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni dkon mchog gsum mo/ gsum gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon
37a2(dkon brtsegs): mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ma bkod pa'i g.yog 'khor gang yin pa de mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo gang gi tshe khyod kyis byang chub
37a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang / dga' mgur spyod par byed pa mthong na
37a4(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo khyod kyis skyes bu dam pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa lta bu'i dbang po lnga dang ldan zhing gnas pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po khri
37a5(dkon brtsegs): gcig gi steng na bud med dang lhan cig 'dug par gyur pa yang nyon cig / kun dga' bo bud med de ni 'das pa'i dus na tshe rabs lnga brgya na byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po'i chung mar gyur te/ de sngon
37a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi tshul bzhin ma yin pa de nyid kyis rigs kyi bu de la lhag par sems kyis 'bral bar gyur kyang byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po de'i dpal dang / gzi brjid dang / tshul khrims kyi stobs
37a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa mthong nas/ gnas ngan len gyi tshig brjod par ma nus nas de gcig pu dben par 'dug pa na 'di lta bu'i sems skyes par gyur te/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po
37a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang lhan cig khri gcig gi steng na 'dug par gyur na bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can
37b1(dkon brtsegs): r ab mchog rgyal pos sring mo de'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod gyi grong
37b2(dkon brtsegs): khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/ /de mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na sring mo de'i khyim ga la ba der zhugs nas nang gi sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / phyi rol gyi sa'i khams
37b3(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa'i sa'i khams de dag ni gcig pa yin pa'i chos kyi sgo 'dis sems dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis lag pa g.yas pas sring mo de bzung ste khri gcig la 'khod do/ /'khod ma thag tu ngas de'i tshe
37b4(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so/ /sangs rgyas 'dod pa bsngags mi mdzad/ /de ni byis pa'i spyod yul min/ /'dod la sred pa spangs byas na/ /mi mchog sangs rgyas rnams su 'gyur/ /kun dga' bo
37b5(dkon brtsegs): de na sring mo des tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ khri de las babs nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po'i rkang pa la gtugs te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
37b6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di skad ces smras so/ /'dod gang sangs rgyas smad pa dag /slan chad don du gnyer mi bgyid/ /'dod la sred pa spang bgyis nas/ /mi mchog sangs rgyas grub gyur cig /bdag gi sems kyis gang bsams
37b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i/ /nongs pa de ni khyod la 'chags/ /srog chags kun la sman slad du/ /bdag ni byang chub 'dun pa skyed/ /kun dga' bo de ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal pos thabs la mkhas pa
37b8(dkon brtsegs): des sring mo de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par rab tu bzhag nas stan las langs te song ngo / /
38a1(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khyad par la ltos/ kun dga' bo nga ni sring mo de 'di nas shi 'phos nas bud med kyi lus bsgyur te bskal pa grangs med pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa
38a2(dkon brtsegs): dgu 'das pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing des
38a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can mi dge ba'i kun nas ldang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar lung ston to/ /kun dga' bo rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar
38a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor gang bzung na log par ltung ba'i chos su 'gyur ba de 'dzin par mi byed par rig par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po bar
38a5(dkon brtsegs): snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ni thabs
38a6(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa dang snying rje chen po la gnas par bgyi lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'dis bdag ni 'di snyam du gal te byang chub sems dpas ni sems can gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang
38a7(dkon brtsegs): dag par bskyed pa'i slad du 'di lta bu'i nongs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing nongs pa ji lta bu byung bas bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du sems can dmyal ba chen por sreg par 'gyur yang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
38a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas ni nongs pa 'byung ba de dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de la spro bar bgyi lags kyi/ sems can gcig po de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gtang ba la ni ma lags so/ /
38b1(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skye bu dam pa legs so legs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po de lta bu
38b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa ni nyes pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang mi 'gyur la/ nyes pa thams cad spong bar yang byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes pa'i phyir te/ 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i
38b3(dkon brtsegs): yang ches grangs med pa/ rgya che ba/ dpag tu med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol du gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u skar ma zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur te/ des lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi
38b4(dkon brtsegs): bar du nags 'dab dag tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa byas nas des lo bzhi khri nyis stong po de dag 'das pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang legs 'byor ces bya bar zhugs so/ /des grong khyer chen po der zhugs pa na tshong dpon gyi bu mo
38b5(dkon brtsegs): zhig gis bram ze'i khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa de mthong nas de 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis bram ze'i khye'u de'i mdun du rab tu brgyugs te rkang pa la gtugs so/ /
38b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma des bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sring mo khyod ci 'dod des de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u kho mo ni khyod 'tshal lo/ /des de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sring mo kho bo ni 'dod
38b7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi/ kho bo ni tshangs par spyod pa yin no/ /des de la di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u gal te khyod dang lhan cig tu 'grogs par mi 'gyur ba lta na bdag 'gum par 'gyur lags so/ /
38b8(dkon brtsegs): de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ bdag gis lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas deng brtul zhugs gzhig pa 'di ni bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin no snyam nas/ des bu mo de mthus spangs
39a1(dkon brtsegs): te bor nas gom pa bdun bor ba dang / de'i gom pa bdun pa la gnas pa'i tshe snying rje skyes par gyur nas 'di ltar bdag gi brtul zhugs bshig ste sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar gyur kyang bdag gis sems
39a2(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba de bzod par bya zhig bu mo 'di bor bar 'gyur ba dang / 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur bar bya gor ma chags snyam mo/ /rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma de de nas phyir log ste/
39a3(dkon brtsegs): lag pa g.yas pas bu mo de bzung ste/ de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzang mo longs shig dang kho bos khyod ci 'dod pa bzhin bya'o/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma de lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du de'i khyim na gnas nas yang
39a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par byung ste/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bskyed nas de nas shi 'phos ma thag tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u skar ma zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin snyam
39a5(dkon brtsegs): du khyod yid gnyis dang the tshom za bar gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u skar ma zhes bya ba der gyur to/ /shAkya'i bu mos 'tsho ma ni de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi
39a6(dkon brtsegs): bu mor gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu ngas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa des cung zad tsam zhig 'dod pa dang ldan par byas pas kyang bskal pa khrir 'khor ba bsnyil cing spangs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu sems can
39a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag gi sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i las gang yin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba la ltos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang
39a8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu gal te dge slong shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu dag thabs la mkhas pa yin par gyur na ni dge slong ko ka li ka yang sems can
39b1(dkon brtsegs): dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes pa'i phyir te/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba
39b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig gi gsung rab la dge slong dri med ces bya ba chos smra ba zhig byung bar gyur to/ /de dgon pa'i phug zhig na gnas so/ /de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba na drang srong lnga brgya zhig kyang gnas te/ de'i tshe na dus ma yin
39b3(dkon brtsegs): bar sprin chen po 'dus shing char chen po babs par 'gyur to/ /de nas bud med gnyis shig grong bar gyi lam na 'dug pa de gnyis char pa de bskyab pa'i phyir dge slong dri med gnas pa'i phug tu zhugs te/ phug de
39b4(dkon brtsegs): nas phyir byung ba dang / drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis bud med de gnyis dge slong dri med kyi phug nas phyir byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag 'di snyam du e ma'o dge slong dri
39b5(dkon brtsegs): med 'di ni sdig pa 'dod pa mi tshangs par spyod pa yin no snyam nas thab dang zhe sdang gi 'du shes skye bar 'gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dri med kyis drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa
39b6(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis shes nas de'i tshe steng gi bar snang gi nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid tsam du mngon par 'phags te 'dug pa drang srong de dag gis mthong nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gi bstan bcos dag
39b7(dkon brtsegs): las mi tshangs par spyod pas ni steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par mi nus so zhes 'byung snyam nas/ de dag gi de'i mod la dge slong dri med kyi rkang pa la yan lag lngas gtugs te nyes pa la
39b8(dkon brtsegs): nyes par bshags so/ /rigs kyi bu gal te dge slong dri med de de'i tshe steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par ma gyur na ni drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag rang rang gi lus de nyid kyis
40a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dri med ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang the tshom za bar gyur
40a2(dkon brtsegs): na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dri med ces bya ba der gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des na khyod kyis 'di ltar gal te dge slong shA ri'i
40a3(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / maud gal gyi bu gnyis de'i tshe steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par gyur na ni dge slong ko ka li ka yang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur bar rigs par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des
40a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang khyed kyis 'di ltar gang du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shes 'jug par 'gyur ba de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na smad 'tshong ma
40a5(dkon brtsegs): sgyu rtsal drug bcu bzhi'i bya ba shes shing legs par lobs pa ni de'i 'og tu nor 'dod pa'i phyir skye bu gzhan gyi drung du ci nas kyang bdag nyid yongs su gtang zhing dga' ba ston pa dang / ji srid du skye bu de las don
40a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ma bsgrubs kyi bar du de la yo byad thams cad kyang sri bar mi byed pa de lta de ltar gnas par byed do/ /de nas don bsgrubs zin pa'i 'og tu ni de la mi lta mi sems par spong bar byed cing de bzhi de las 'gyod
40a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems gcig tsam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang thabs la mkhas pa des sems can 'di dag yongs su smin par bya'o zhes bya bar shes te/ rnam grangs
40a8(dkon brtsegs): des sems can de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du drung du sbyor bar byed cing de dag la yo byad thams cad mi sri bar byed do/ /sems can rnams kyi dge ba la dga' bas bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtong bar byed kyi yo byad la dga'
40b1(dkon brtsegs): bas ni ma yin no/ /gang gi tshe kye ma sems can 'di dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba byas par gyur pa dag ste/ 'di dag gis phyis yongs su nyams par byed mi nus par shes na ni de'i 'og tu 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang rtsed mo thams cad
40b2(dkon brtsegs): la mi lta bar spangs te 'gro zhing de de dang 'brel ba'i sems la gnas par mi byed do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na mes yongs su gdungs pa'i sa bon rnams ni kha dog yongs su nyams pa med pa la myu gu 'byung
40b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i skal pa med pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bdag med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongs su
40b4(dkon brtsegs): gdungs na de 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad la yongs su spyod par byed kyang / log par ltung bar 'gro ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su 'dzin par mi byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi kha dog las yongs su nyams par
40b5(dkon brtsegs): yang mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na dud 'gro skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags bung ba ni me tog thams cad las dri bsnom zhing ro myang bar byed kyang gang la yang rtag pa'i 'du shes sgom par mi byed/ gnas
40b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi sred pa skyed par mi byed cing de dag las dri dang / 'dab ma dang / sdong bu dang / me tog 'phrog par mi byed pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir
40b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang rtsed mo thams cad la yongs su longs spyod pa byed kyang de dag la rtag pa'i 'du shes sgom par yang mi byed/ gnas kyi sred pa skyed pa yang mi byed la/ bdag kyang rmas par mi 'gyur/ gzhan yang rmas par mi
40b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nya pa shin du legs par bslabs pa ni srad bu cig la gzan ma btags te mchil pa byas nas mtsho chen po'i nang du 'dor ro/ /de srad bu legs par bsrungs pa
41a1(dkon brtsegs): gcig po des gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na mtsho chen po nas mchil pa de 'dren par byed pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
41a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / bdag med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtan par gtad pas 'dod pa'i 'dam chen por 'jug par byed kyang de thams cad mkhyen
41a3(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyi sems legs par bsgom pa des gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na 'dod pa'i khams spangs te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na skye bu rig sngags dang / gsang sngags
41a4(dkon brtsegs): 'chang ba ni rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis bzung ste zhags pa lnga'i chings mas bcings par gyur kyang de ni gang gi tshe 'gro bar 'dod pa de'i tshe rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa gcig gis chings ma de dag
41a5(dkon brtsegs): t hams cad bcad nas gang du 'gro bar 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po
41a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi dga' ba myong bar byed cing de dag dang 'dres par gnas par byed kyang de gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe shes rab kyi rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems legs par
41a7(dkon brtsegs): bsrungs pa gcig gis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i chings ma de dag thams cad rab tu bcad de/ de nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na 'phong gi slob dpon
41a8(dkon brtsegs): legs par bslabs zhig ral gri rnon po ras bcos bus dkris pa zhig thogs te 'dron pa mang po sgrol bar byed pa na sems can mi mkhas pa 'phong gi shes pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni 'phong gi slob dpon de la snying rje ba dang / brnyas pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed cing /
41b1(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'di skad ces gzhu yang med/ ral gri yang med/ dong pa yang med/ 'khor kyang med pa 'dis ni 'dron pa 'di dag bsgral bar mi nus te/ /'dis ni bdag nyid kyang
41b2(dkon brtsegs): thar bar byed mi nus na 'gron pa thams cad bsgral ba dang / chom rkun pa'i sde pham par bya ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med pas 'di ni tshul ma yin pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang zer bar 'gyur la/ de nas 'phong
41b3(dkon brtsegs): gi slob dpon de 'brog dgon par son te chom rkun pa'i tshogs lhags par gyur pa na/ mda' gzhu thogs te go cha sra ba bgos nas mtshon cha de gzas te chom rkun pa rnams la 'debs par byed cing / des chom rkun pa
41b4(dkon brtsegs): d e dag thams cad srog dang phral nas yang mtshon cha lag tu len par byed pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du
41b5(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa'i mtshon cha legs par thogs te/ thabs mkhas pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa gang dag de'i thabs la
41b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa'i shes pa de khong du ma chud pa de dag gis de mthong ba'i tshe de dag de la ma dad pa dang / snying rje skyed par byed cing tshig 'di skad ces 'di ltar bag med pa'i gnas pas gnas pa 'dis ni bdag nyid kyang thar
41b7(dkon brtsegs): par byed mi nus na sems can thams cad bsgral ba lta ci smos shing bdud kyi sde pham par byed par lta ga la 'gyur te/ de ni gnas med pas 'di ni tshul ma yin pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang zer mod kyi
41b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa dang / shes rab kyis legs par yongs su zin pa ni gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe shes rab kyi mtshon des nyon mongs pa'i dra ba thams cad dral cing rab tu gtubs nas shes rab
42a1(dkon brtsegs): dang lhan gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bud med dang bral ba dang / 'khrig pa dang bral ba shin tu yongs su dag pa dag tu 'gro bar byed do/ /gtam 'di brjod par gyur pa de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
42a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po dga' byed ces bya ba mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs par gyur te/ de mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms spyod pa na tshong dpon zhig gi khyim du phyin pa dang tshong dpon de la bu mo
42a3(dkon brtsegs): dpal yon can gyi mchog ces bya ba phyug chung zhig yod par gyur pa khang bzangs kyi steng na 'dug pa des dge slong de'i skad thos nas bsod snyoms thogs te byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed ga la ba der song ngo / /de nas bu mo dpal
42a4(dkon brtsegs): yon can gyi mchog gis byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed mthong ma thag tu 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis dpe byed las byad bzhin dang sgra skad dang / kha dog gi mtshan ma gzung ba dang / de 'dod chags kyis
42a5(dkon brtsegs): kun nas dkris pa'i sems dang / 'dod chags kyis kun nas bslang ba'i sems dang / 'dod chags kyis yongs su gtugs pa'i sems dang / 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdungs pa'i sems kyis bsregs pas lus rngul bar
42a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas 'greng bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed kyang bu mo dpal yon can kyi mchog mthong nas tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang
42a7(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i sems skyes par gyur nas yud tsam zhig na de la dran pa 'di lta bu skyes par gyur te/ chos gang la chags par gyur pa'i chos de gang yin/ ci mig mig la chags sam/ mig ni chags pa ma yin te/ g.yo
42a8(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ sems pa med pa/ 'dus byas pa/ rim pa bdun pa/ sha'i ri lu yin te/ mig de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir sems par mi byed/ tshor bar mi byed do/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
42b1(dkon brtsegs): yid dang / lpags pa dang / mdog dang / sha yang de dang 'dra ste/ des rkang mthil yan chad glad pa man chad kyi bar la so sor brtags na nang dang phyi rol na gang chags par 'gyur ba'am/ sdang bar 'gyur ba'am/
42b2(dkon brtsegs): rmongs par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang ma dmigs so/ /des ma dmigs nas 'dod chags kyi sems dang bral bar gyur cing / des sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor brtags pas chos thams cad
42b3(dkon brtsegs): ma skyes par rig nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis steng gi bar snang la ta la bdun srid tsam du mngon par 'phags te/ mnyan yod kyi grong khyer
42b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas nam mkha' de nyid las rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // // bam po gnyis pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
42b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po dga' byed steng gi bar snang las ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar chags pa med par 'ong ba gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis byang
42b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed steng gi bar snang las ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar chags pa med par 'ong ba mthong ngam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
42b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed 'dis ni 'dod chags kyi sems la brten te/ chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas bdud kyi sde btul zhing chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor to/ /de nas
42b8(dkon brtsegs): bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bud med kyi lus spangs te/ mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa'i lus thob cing sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skyes so/ /skyes ma thag tu de la rin po che sna bdun
43a1(dkon brtsegs): las byas pa'i gzhal med khang dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa yang byung bar gyur/ de'i rim gro byed pa'i bsnyen bkur ma lha'i bu mo khri bzhi stong yang nye bar gnas par gyur to/ /de'i mod la des bdag gis las ci zhig byas shing
43a2(dkon brtsegs): bsags pas 'di skyes par gyur snyam du bsams pa dang / de 'di snyam du gyur te/ bdag ni mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por tshong dpon gyi bu mor gyur pa las de na bdag gis kun du chags pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
43a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po dga' byed la bltas pa dang / bdag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bud med kyis lus rjes te/ bdag gis 'dir skyes pa'i lus thob cing bdag la 'byor ba
43a4(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med pa 'di lta bu dag kyang byung bar gyur to snyam nas sngon gyi las rjes su dran pa'i shes pa yang skyes par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dod chags kyi sems las kyang rnam par smin pa 'di lta bu
43a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur na/ bdag gis dad pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed la phyag byas shing / bsnyen bkur byas na lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ bdag 'dod pas dga' ba dang rtse ba dang / dga'
43a6(dkon brtsegs): mgur spyod cing bag med pa'i gnas pas gnas pa ni bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin zhing mi rigs kyi/ bdag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed ga la ba der 'gro bar bya gor ma
43a7(dkon brtsegs): chag snyam mo/ /de nas lha'i bu de 'khor lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / me tog phreng ba dang / byug pa dag thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed
43a8(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba der song nas kha dog shin du 'phags pa shin du 'phags pa'i snang ba chen pos rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal snang bar byas te/ lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das
43b1(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi rkang
43b2(dkon brtsegs): pa la yang mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo pug pug por sbyar nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /sangs rgyas mi
43b3(dkon brtsegs): mchog rnams ni bsam mi khyab/ /byang chub mchog la zhugs rnams bsam mi khyab/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi chos kyang bsam mi khyab/ /brags chen rnams kyi spyod pa'ang bsam mi khyab/ /mnyan yod du ni bdag sngon
43b4(dkon brtsegs): bu mor gyur/ /tshong dpon bu mo dpal yon mchog ces bgyi/ /mdzes shing thog mar phyug chung gyur pa lags/ /pha ma'i glo bar mchi zhing rab tu byams/ /sangs rgyas sras po smad par ma gyur pa/ /mthu chen dga'
43b5(dkon brtsegs): byed ces bgyi gang lags pa/ /bsod snyoms spyod cing mnyan yod rgyu ba'i tshe/ /de ni bdag gi pha yi khyim du mchis/ /skad snyan yid du mchi ba thos gyur nas/ /bdag cag sems kyis bsod snyoms thogs
43b6(dkon brtsegs): nas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras po gang lags pa/ /dga' byed mthu chen ga la mchis par mchis/ /mthong ma thag tu bdag ni 'dod chags dang / /ldan pa tshul bzhin ma lags sems skyes te/ /gal te ji ltar
43b7(dkon brtsegs): bsams bzhin ma 'jal na/ /srog la mi lta 'gum pa'i dus bgyi snyam/ /tshul bzhin ma lags 'dod pas rab gdungs nas/ /de la bka' mchid brjod par bgyi ba dang / /bsod snyoms stsol ba'i rngo yang ma thog nas/ /rngul byung
43b8(dkon brtsegs): der ni 'greng bzhin gum par gyur/ /bcom ldan bdag ni 'chi 'phor gyur pa'i tshe/ /skad cig de la bud med lus spangs te/ /shi 'phos mtho ris 'jig rten skyes gyur nas/ /bdag gi 'od gsal skyes pa nyid 'di thob/ /rin chen
44a1(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs blta na sdug pa yi/ /gzhal med khang mchog mdzes pa grub gyur cing / /bdag gis yog 'khor lha'i bu mo ni/ /khri dang bzhi stong tshang ba byung bar gyur/ /bdag la sems bzang byung bar gyur pa ni/ /
44a2(dkon brtsegs): sug las gang gi rnam smin 'di 'dra ba/ /rjes su dran nas bdag ni 'di snyam bgyid/ /chags bcas sems kyi rnam smin 'di 'dra ste/ dga' byed yid dga' 'od gsal mkhas pa la/ /chags bcas sems kyis bdag gis
44a3(dkon brtsegs): bltas gyur pas/ /sug las de yi rnam smin bzang po des/ /bdag ni gzi brjid mthu stobs 'di 'dra bas/ /chags bcas sems kyi rnam smin 'di 'dra na/ /gang gis de la mchod bgyis ci smos te/ /gang la bde gshegs
