44a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa 'jug 'gyur pa/ /de ni nyan thos rang rgyal sa ma lags/ /bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar ni/ /sangs rgyas ye shes mchog rab bsgrub pa dang / /bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyed spyad bgyi bar/ /bdag gi
44a5(dkon brtsegs): dam bcas 'di ni spang mi bgyi/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen dga' 'byed dam pa la/ /chos kyi mchod pa mchog gis mchod par bgyi/ /gang dag byang chub 'tshal ba ma gtogs par/ /gzhan gyis 'di la 'dren rnams mchod mi 'gyur/ /
44a6(dkon brtsegs): bud med gang dag 'dod chags sems kyis ni/ /bdag la rtog pa bud med lus bsgyur nas/ /de kun 'jigs med skyes pa 'thob 'gyur bar/ /byang chub spyod mchog dam pa spyad par bgyi/ /lus rngul shi bar gyur pa mthong
44a7(dkon brtsegs): nas ni/ /bu mo'i pha ma tsho nges 'debs byed cing / /dge slong de yis byad stem byas snyam ste/ /ngu zhing dge sbyong rnams la mi snyan brjod/ /sangs rgyas mthu yis lha yi bu de ni/ /song nas pha ma dag la tshig smras pa/ /dge sbyong
44a8(dkon brtsegs): la ni zhe sdang khro ma byed/ /yun ring sdug bsngal 'gyur bar ma byed cig /bu mo dpal yon shi 'phos gang yin de/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum skal ba mnyam gyur cing / /des ni bud med lus kyang spangs byas te/ /de ni lha'i bu
44b1(dkon brtsegs): pho 'od gsal gyur/ /bde bar gshegs kyi spyan sngar khyed deng la/ /khro ba'i sems kyi nyes pa 'di shogs shig /sangs rgyas mi mchog rnams ni ma gtogs par/ /sems can rnams kyi dpung gnyen gnas gzhan med/ /
44b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs med de yis legs par bskul byas pas/ /pha ma gnyis kyis sangs rgyas sgra thos nas/ /nye du'i tshogs dang lhan cig 'grogs gyur te/ /shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar dong bar gyur/ /mi mchog zhabs la spyi bos phyag
44b3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te/ /khro ba'i sems kyi nyes pa bshags byas nas/ /de bzhin gshegs la gus dang bcas byas te/ /bde gshegs rang byung la ni zhu zhus pa/ /ji tsam gyis na 'dren pa mchod par 'gyur/ /chos dang dge 'dun
44b4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar mchod pa lags/ /zhus pa de yi lan ni stsal du gsol/ /thos nas de bzhin gnas bgyi gzhan ma lags/ /rgyal pas de dag bsam pa dag mkhyen nas/ /'jig rten mgon pos 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /gang zhig
44b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thams cad mchod 'dod pa/ /de yis brtan par byang chub sems skyed cig /bu mo'i pha dang ma dang nye du ni/ /lnga brgya tshang ba nyung ba ma yin pas/ /skyes bu khyu mchog de yi gsung thos nas/ /byang chub phyir ni sems kyang brtan
44b6(dkon brtsegs): par bskyed/ /rgyal bas kun dga' bzang la bka' stsal pa/ /kun dga' ji ltar bshad pa 'di nyon cig /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsam yas te/ /shes rab thabs la mkhas pa'ang de bzhin no/ /dga' byed smon lam yang
44b7(dkon brtsegs): dang yang 'debs pa/ /bud med gang dag chags pa'i sems kyis ni/ /bdag la rtog pa bud med lus spangs nas/ /de dag myur du skyes bu 'jig med shog /bud med gcig min gnyis dang gsum min te/ /bye ba khrag khrig stong
44b8(dkon brtsegs): phrag mang po rnams/ /gang dag dga' byed la ni chags gyur pa/ /de dag thams cad shi 'phos skyes par gyur/ /kun dga' 'dod chags bskyed pa gang gis ni/ /sems can gzhan dag sems dmyal 'gro 'gyur ba/ /de yis dpa'
45a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams mtho ris 'gro 'gyur zhing / /skyes par 'gyur ba'i yon tan de 'dra ltos/ /lha'i bu gang gis nga la mchod byas te/ /gus dang bcas pas byang chub mchog zhugs pa/ /des ni sangs rgyas bye mang mchod byas nas/ /rgyal
45a2(dkon brtsegs): ba blta na mdzes zhes bya bar 'gyur/ /lnga brgya gang dag byang chub zhugs gyur pa/ /de dag mi mchog rnams su 'byung 'gyur ba/ /gang la dad byas bde ba bsam yas pa'i/ 'jig rten mgon la su zhig gus mi byed/ /gang dag
45a3(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs rnams kyang bde sbyin na/ /gang dag gus byed de la ci smos pa/ /grags chen sman gyi rgyal po lta bu yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la su sdang skyed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
45a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na sems can rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ chos kyi bar du gcod pa'i sems dang ldan
45a5(dkon brtsegs): pa gang la la dag ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi drung du mchis na de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/ /gser gyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig par 'gyur ba de bzhin du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan
45a6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'am chos kyi bar du gcod pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang dag la la dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi drung du mchis na yang de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
45a7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi kha dog tu sems gcig tu 'gyur lags pas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni deng slan cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang 'dra bar 'dzin lags so/ /btsun pa
45a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na sman gyi rigs chen po blta mdzes zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ sems can rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ /dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can bro nad sna
45b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyis thebs pa gang la la dag gis de mthong na de dag thams cad kyi bro nad rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi drung du mchis na de dag thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang /
45b2(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang nyon mongs pa'i bro nad rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /
45b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la kun dga' bo ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces
45b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de ltar zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyi gnas pa dag gis kyang gnas par bgyid la/ sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i slad du 'dod pa'i
45b5(dkon brtsegs): khams na yang kun du gda' ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i chos rnams kyis kyang gnas par bgyid la nyan thos dang / rang sangs
45b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos rnams la yang reg par mi bgyid pa dang / snying rje chen po yang kun du skyed par bgyid la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la yang 'jug par bgyid pa de ni btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub
45b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar lags te/ bde bar gshegs pa de ni mchog tu ngo mtshar lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
45b8(dkon brtsegs): gang dag chags pa thams cad srung bar bgyid cing 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang ro dang reg bya'i chags pa dag la spyod par bgyid kyang de dag la chags par yang mi 'gyur ba de dag ni
46a1(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa la gnas pa lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams las brtsams te/ dpe 'ga' zhig rjod
46a2(dkon brtsegs): par spobs lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa spobs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung khyod spobs par gyis shig /'od srung chen pos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
46a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper bgyi na 'brog dgon pa chen po zhig mchis par gyur la/ 'brog dgon pa chen po de la yang srid pa'i rtse mo dang mnyam pa'i ra ba mchis par gyur cing / 'brog dgon pa chen po der yang srog
46a4(dkon brtsegs): chags 'bum phrag du ma zhig zhugs par gyur la/ 'brog dgon pa chen po de la yang chab sgo ni gcig cig mchis par gyur cing / 'brog dgon pa chen po de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na grong khyer chen po
46a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byor pa rgyas pa/ gsang lo legs pa/ /skye bo dang mi mang pos kun du gtam pa nyams dga' ba zhig kyang mchis par gyur la/ grong khyer chen po de la yang chab sgo nas gcig cig mchis par
46a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur cing / gang dag grong khyer chen po der zhugs par gyur pa de dag ni dga' ba dang / 'gum pa ma mchis par 'gyur la/ grong khyer chen po de na yang mtho gang tsam gyi tshad kyi shul shin du dog cing nyam nga
46a7(dkon brtsegs): ba zhig kyang mchis shing de'i g.yas g.yon na khru 'bum tsam mchis pa'i g.yang sa chen po dag kyang mchis par gyur la/ de nas 'brog dgon pa chen po de'i dbus nas sems can mkhas pa zhi
46a8(dkon brtsegs): ba glo ba gzhungs pa/ sems can thams cad la don du 'gyur ba 'tshal ba bde bar 'tshal ba/ grub pa dang bde bar 'tshal ba/ sman par 'tshal ba snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gcig cig byung bar gyur
46b1(dkon brtsegs): nas des 'brog dgon pa chen po der 'di skad ces kye grogs po dag kho bo ni khyed cag gi yongs su skyob pa yin te/ 'brog dgon pa chen po 'di nas ha cang yang mi ring ba na grong khyer chen po 'byor pa/ rgyas pa/ bde ba lo
46b2(dkon brtsegs): legs pa/ nyams dga' ba zhig yod de/ gang dag der zhugs par gyur pa de dag ni rga ba med pa dang / 'chi ba med par 'gyur zhing sems can dpag tu med pa rnams skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na pa dang / 'chi ba
46b3(dkon brtsegs): las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par yang 'gyur bas sems can shes pa dang ldan pa tshur shog / grong khyer chen po der 'dong ngo zhes sgra bsgrags shing skad kyis go bar bgyis
46b4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na/ de na sems can dman pa la mos shing nges par 'byung ba'i bsam pa can gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'di skad ces bdag cag 'di nas kyang mi g.yo bar gdams shing rjes su bstan pa de yang 'tshal/
46b5(dkon brtsegs): la bdag cag 'di na gnas bzhin du grong khyer de na mchis pa'i yon tan de dag kyang 'byung bar gyur cig ces mchi lags so/ /sems can rgya chen po la mos pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'di skad ces bdag cag ni
46b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod ji lta ba de bzhin du grong khyer der mchi'o zhes mchi lags so/ /sems can bsod nams chung ba gang dag lags pa de dag ni sgra de nyan cing thos nas kyang dang bar mi bgyid cing skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin
46b7(dkon brtsegs): can de'i slad bzhin du mchi bar mi bgyid lags te/ de nas skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can de 'brog dgon pa chen po de nas slar byung ba dang / des shul de yang mthong bar gyur/ des mtho gang tsam gyi
46b8(dkon brtsegs): shul shin du dog cing nyam nga ba de yang mthong bar gyur/ shul de'i g.yas g.yon na khru 'bum tsam mchis pa'i g.yang sa chen po de dag kyang mthong bar gyur nas de g.yas g.yon kyi g.yang sa de
47a1(dkon brtsegs): dag rtsig pa dang spang leb kyis bkum ste/ rkang lag bzhis 'phye zhing shul de las 'da' bar bgyid la/ g.yas g.yon du yang mi lta bar slad bzhin du phyir rgol
47a2(dkon brtsegs): ba skra 'byin cing 'jigs pa ston pa dag mchi yang slar yang mi lta la/ skyo zhing yid byung ba yang ma mchis par shul der mchi bar 'gyur ba dang / ji lta ji ltar mchi bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar grong khyer de mthong bar yang 'gyur
47a3(dkon brtsegs): la de lta ji ltar mthong ba de lta de ltar de'i 'jigs pa dang 'jigs su rung ba thams cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur zhing grong khyer der zhugs na rga ba dang / 'gum pa dang / bro nad ma mchis par gyur la/ sems can dpag tu ma mchis
47a4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi don bgyid cing skye ba dang / rga ba dang / bro 'tshal ba dang / 'gum pa las yang dag par bzla ba'i slad du chos ston par yang bgyid pa zhig mchis na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de la 'brog dgon
47a5(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni 'khor ba'i dgon pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so/ /srid pa'i rtse mo dang mnyam pa'i ra ba zhes bgyi ba de ni ma rig pa dang sred pa'i srid pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so/ /'brog dgon pa chen
47a6(dkon brtsegs): po der yang srog chags 'bum phrag du ma zhugs par gyur la zhes bgyi ba de ci byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi tshig bla dgas lags so/ /'brog dgon pa chen po de la yang chab sgo ni gcig cig mchis par
47a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur cing zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni bgrod pa gcig pa'i shul blta bar bgyi lags so/ /skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can zhes bgyi ba ji lta ba de bzhin du ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams blta
47a8(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi lags so/ /sems can dman pa la mos shing nges par 'byung ba'i bsam pa can gnas de las kyang mi g.yo la grong khyer gyi yon tan yang 'tshal ba de dag ji lta ba de bzhin du ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad blta bar bgyi
47b1(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /sems can rgya chen po la mos pa tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag ni khyod ji ltar ba bzhin du grong khyer der mchi lags so zhes mchi ba de dag ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag blta bar bgyi lags so/ /
47b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can bsod nyams chung ngu sgra de nyan cing thos nas kyang dad par mi bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag ni gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa dang / kun du rgyu dag gi tshig bla dgas lags so/ /'brog dgon pa chen po de nas slar byung ba zhes bgyi ba ji lta ba de bzhin du ni
47b3(dkon brtsegs): thams can mkhyen pa nyid du nges par bsngos pa'i sems kyis brtson 'grus brtsams pa blta bar bgyi lags so/ /mtho gang tsam gyi tshad kyi shul zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba bzhin du ni chos kyi dbyings blta bar bgyi lags so/ /de'i g.yas g.yon
47b4(dkon brtsegs): na khru 'bum tsam mchis pa'i g.yang sa chen po zhes bgyi ba ji lta ba de bzhin du ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa rnams blta bar bgyi lags so/ /g.yas g.yon kyi g.yang sa de dag rtsig pa dang spang leb kyis bkum ste
47b5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba bzhin du ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa blta bar bgyi lags so/ /rkang lag bzhis 'phye zhing shul de las yang dag par 'da' bar bgyid la zhes bgyi ba de bzhin du ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsdu ba'i
47b6(dkon brtsegs): dngos po bzhis sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams sdud cing yang dag par 'da' bar bgyid pa dag lta bar bgyi lags so/ /slad bzhin du phyir rgol ba sgra 'byin cing 'jigs pa ston pa dag mchi yang zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni bdud dang bdud kyi
47b7(dkon brtsegs): ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang blta bar bgyi la/ de bzhin du sems can sdig pa la mngon par zhen pa yongs su nyon mongs pa can gyi las kun du spyod par bgyid pa gang dag byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'phya ba dang / smod par bgyid pa
47b8(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang blta bar bgyi lags so/ /slar yang mi lta la zhes bgyi ba de ni bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas sems bskyed pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so/ /g.yas g.yon du yang mi lta bar zhes bgyi ba de
48a1(dkon brtsegs): ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi dga' ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas lags so/ /grong khyer chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer gyi
48a2(dkon brtsegs): tshig bla dgas lags so/ /ji lta ji ltar mchi bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar grong khyer de mthong bar yang 'gyur la zhes bgyi ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i tshig bla dgas dang
48a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mthong dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang / ye shes la nges par rtog par bgyid pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas
48a4(dkon brtsegs): pa la shin du legs par slob pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so/ /ji lta ji ltar mthong ba de lta de ltar de'i 'jigs pa dang / 'jig su rung ba thams cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur zhing zhes bgyi ba de ni sems
48a5(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad 'jigs pa ma mchis pa shing the tshom dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i tshig bla dgas lags so/ /grong khyer der zhugs na rga ba dang / 'gum pa dang bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur zhing sems can dpag
48a6(dkon brtsegs): tu ma mchis pa rnams kyi don bgyid la/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / bro nad dang / 'gum pa las yang dag par bzla ba'i slad du chos ston par yang bgyid ces bgyi ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
48a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshig bla dgas lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni ye shes dang ldan pa lags te/ btsun
48a8(dkon brtsegs): pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'ong srung chen po la legs so zhes bya ba
48b1(dkon brtsegs): byin te/ 'od srung legs so legs so/ /'od srung khyod kyis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la spro ba skyed pa ni yang khyod legs te/ 'od srung khyod kyi dpe brjod pa des lha dang mi rnams
48b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi skye dgu las srog chags khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /'od srung byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thabs la mkhas pa legs par
48b3(dkon brtsegs): bslabs pa/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa yin te/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gang gis bdag la gnod par 'gyur ba 'am/ gzhan la gnod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
48b4(dkon brtsegs): las mi byed cing / tshig gang gis bdag dang gzhan la gdung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig kyang mi smra'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
48b5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad du byang chub sems dpa' ni tshig gang gis bdag dang gzhan la gdung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig mi
48b6(dkon brtsegs): smra'o zhes bka' stsal lags na/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng zhes bgyi bar gyur pa na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
48b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di skad ces dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya/ byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas dge sbyong
48b8(dkon brtsegs): mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs pa de ci las dgongs te de skad gsungs pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
49a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'i tshad rab tu rnam par dbye
49a2(dkon brtsegs): bas khyod la ci zhig bya thong shig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pas skyes bu dam pa de dag ni
49a3(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ji ltar sems cad yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar gnas par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu de lta mod kyi 'on kyang legs par rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la zung shig dang / thabs
49a4(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya'o/ /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
49a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mar me mdzad tshun chad du thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa gang yin pa de dag las phyogs tsam zhig bstan par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
49a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mthong ma thag tu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bar der byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khrul pa med pa dang / ca co med pa dang / brjed pa med pa dang / sems rnam
49a7(dkon brtsegs): par g.yengs pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa med pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na zhag bdun gyis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang
49a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ 'dod na bskal pas kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'dod na bskal pa brgyas kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'dod na bskal pa stong gis kyang byang chub mngon
49b1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'dod na bskal pa 'bum gyis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dod na bsams
49b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du srid pa len cing 'gro bar yang byed do/ /de ni thabs la mkhas pa dang / shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pas gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed
49b3(dkon brtsegs): cing / 'dod na phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa brgya phrag mang por yang yid yongs su skyo ba med par gnas par byed de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang nyan thos kyang zhi
49b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag la snyoms par 'jug la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang bar byed mod kyi de'i lus g.yo bar yang mi 'gyur/ sems g.yo bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos ni
49b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba kho nar shes par byed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag la snyoms par 'jug kyang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams bsdu ba'i brtson 'grus rgyun mi gcod cing
49b6(dkon brtsegs): pha rol du phyin pa drug gis sems can yongs su smin par yang byed la/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa na snying rje chen po skyed par yang byed de/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no/ /
49b7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na dga' ldan gyi gnas na 'dug bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar yang nus mod kyi
49b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams kyis ni chos mnyan pa'i phyir dga' ldan gyi gnas su 'dzeg par mi nus la/ lha rnams kyis ni chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling du 'bab
50a1(dkon brtsegs): bar nus so/ /snyam nas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'dzam bu'i gling du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang
50a2(dkon brtsegs): b yang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos nas ma'i mngal du ma zhugs shing mngal gyi dri mas ma reg pa kho nar de'i skad cig de nyid la byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing chos kyi 'khor lo skor
50a3(dkon brtsegs): bar yang nus mod kyi/ de la sems can kha cig 'di snyam du 'di lha'am klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ sprul pa zhig gam/ 'di ga las 'ongs pa zhig snyam du nem nur dang / yid gnyis dang / the tshom skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag nem
50a4(dkon brtsegs): nur dang / yid gnyis dang / the tshom skyes par gyur na/ nyon mongs pa yongs su zad par bya ba'i phyir chos nyan par mi byed/ shes par mi byed/ brtson 'grus rtsom par mi byed pas byang chub sems dpas mngal na gnas pa bstan pa'i rgyu ni
50a5(dkon brtsegs): de yin/ rkyen ni de yin no/ /rigs kyi bu khyod 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' mngal gyi gnas su zhugs so/ /snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dri ma med pa zhes bya ba
50a6(dkon brtsegs): yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas nas bzhugs bzhin du de la snyoms par zhugs shing yongs su bsten nas ting nge 'dzin de las ma langs bzhin du dga' ldan gyi gnas nyid nas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug mod kyi
50a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis de na de ma mthong bas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin las langs so/ /snyam du shes par zad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni dga' ldan gyi gnas nas mi g.yo bzhin du sprul pa dag gis 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang
50a8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod pa'i bya ba thams cad kun du ston par byed de/ de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpas sprul pa dag gis kun tu bstan pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni kun du
50b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa gtsang ba yin pas phyir mngal gyi gnas su mi 'gro ba'i phyir te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' glang po che thal kar du bsgyur te ma'i mngal du 'jug pa
50b2(dkon brtsegs): ston par byed ce na/ de ni dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshig bla dgas yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa yin pas na des ni ci nas kyang lha'am mi gzhan gang
50b3(dkon brtsegs): la yang med pa de lta bu kho nas mngal du 'jug pa bstan par bya dgos pa'i phyir te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas shing dgur ma yin
50b4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ sems can gang dag 'di snyam du kye ma gzhon nu 'di ni mngal na gnas pa'i dus yongs su ma rdzogs pas dbang po ma tshang bar 'gyur to/ /snyam du sems pa'i sems can de dag gi the tshom bcad pa dang / mngal gyi dus dang / dbang po
50b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs pa kun du bstan par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas kyi dgur ni ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas pa na yang lha rnams byang chub sems dpa' la
50b6(dkon brtsegs): blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyur zhing de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod rin po che bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa lha'i longs
50b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa mthong nas lha'i bu sa ya phrag gnyis dang / bzhi 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i
50b8(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mchan brtol te mngal gyi gnas nas 'byung ba kun du ston par byed ce na/ sems can gang dag 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' ni pha dang ma'i
51a1(dkon brtsegs): mer mer po las skyes pa ma yin gyi rdzus te skyes pa yin no snyam du sems pa'i sems can de dag gi the tshom bcad pa'i phyir ma'i mchan brtol te mngal gyi gnas nas 'byung ba kun tu bstan to/ /byung ma thag tu yum
51a2(dkon brtsegs): lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis lus la yang rma med cing sgros med la/ byang chub sems dpa' mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis bde ba myong bar gyur pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i bde ba ni sngon nam yang ma reg cing sngon nam yang ma
51a3(dkon brtsegs): myong ste/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dgon par btsas shing grong du ma yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni yun ring po nas dgon pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang /
51a4(dkon brtsegs): dben pa la dga' ba dang / kun spyod pa gtsang ba dang / grong du btsas na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyang lha'i phye ma dang / spos dang / me tog phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me tog dag gis shin tu 'phags pa'i mchod pa byed par mi
51a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang rgyags pa dang / bag med pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dgon par btsas shing grong du ma yin pa'i rgyu ni de yin/ rkyen
51a6(dkon brtsegs): ni de yin no/ /ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i yum gyis shing p+lag sha'i yal ga la bzung ste bang mal ma byas par byang chub sems dpa' btsas par byas she na/ sems can gang dag 'di snyam du yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul ni
51a7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bud med gzhan dag bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas reg cing byang chub sems dpa' btsas so snyam du sems pa'i sems can de dag gi the tshom bcad pa dang / bde bar btsas par kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul
51a8(dkon brtsegs): gyis shing p+lag sha'i yal ga la bzung ste bang mal ma byas par byang chub sems dpa' btsas par byas so/ /ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mchan g.yas pa brtol te/ dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis mngal gyi gnas nas
51b1(dkon brtsegs): byung zhing skye gnas nas kyang ma yin/ lus kyi phyogs gzhan nas kyang ma yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni kun spyod pa gtsang ba dang / 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa dang / 'dul ba'i sems can rnams
51b2(dkon brtsegs): gdul ba'i phyir des ni ji ltar sems can dman pa gzhan dag bzhin du ma'i mngal du rten cing gnas pa ma yin pa dang / mi gtsang ba ma yin pa de ltar skye ba bstan par bya dgos pa'i phyir te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mchan g.yas
51b3(dkon brtsegs): pa brtol te/ dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis mngal gyi gnas nas byung zhing byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi mchan yang rma med cing sgros med par gyur te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas
51b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ /ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis bzung la mir gyur pa gzhan dag gis ma yin zhe na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar bas lha rnams 'dun par byas pas lha'i
51b5(dkon brtsegs): dbang po rgya byin gyis bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu gos rin po ches bzung bar bya'o/ /zhes sngon smon lam btab pa'i phyir des na byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las rgya chen po la brtson par byed pa yin te/ de yang
51b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu yongs su ma bzung bar gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed la drug kyang ma yin/ brgyad kyang ma yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpas ni ji
51b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar gzhan sus kyang sngon ma bstan pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi brtson 'grus chen po dang / skye bu dam pa'i rtsal gdon mi za bar kun tu bstan par bya dgos pa dang / gom pa bdun bor bas sems can gang dag gi don bya dgos
51b8(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag gi don gom pa drug gis kyang mi chog la brgyad ni lhag par 'gyur bas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu yongs su ma bzung bar gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed la drug kyang ma yin/ brgyad kyang ma yin te/ de yang byang chub
52a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gom pa bdun 'dor ba na tshig 'di skad ces nga ni 'jig rten na thu bo yin no/ /nga ni 'jig rten na gtso bo yin te/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na pa dang / 'chi
52a2(dkon brtsegs): ba mthar dbyung bar bya'o zhes rjod par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu 'khor de na brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dbang che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags pa dag 'dus par gyur te 'khod la nga rgyal gyis khengs pa de dag 'di snyam du
52a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag ni ches bla ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni de lta ma yin no/ /snyam du sems shing 'dud par mi byed/ rab tu 'dud par mi byed/ phyag 'tshal bar mi byed/ rab tu phyag 'tshal bar mi byed pas na de na byang chub
52a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu 'di dag yun ring por don med dang / gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / log par ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpas tshig
52a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces nga ni 'jig rten na thu bo yin no/ /nga ni 'jig rten na gtso bo yin te/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang na pa dang / 'chi ba mthar dbyung bar bya'o zhes smras te/ tshig gi sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
52a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di go bar gyur nas lha'i bu gang dag der ma lhags pa de dag kyang sgra de thos nas lhags par gyur cing / de nas lha'i bu de dag dang brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dag yid byung ba skyes shing ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur nas gus pa dang bcas pas
52a7(dkon brtsegs): thal mo pug pug por sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar byed de/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' tshig 'di skad ces nga ni 'jig rten na gtso bo yin te/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang na pa dang / 'chi
52a8(dkon brtsegs): ba mthar dbyung bar bya'o/ /zhes smras pa'i rgyu ni de yin/ rkyen ni de yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshig de ni yang dag par yin te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma
52b1(dkon brtsegs): thag tu gad mo cher dgod par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' la ni 'dod chags dang lhan cig skyes pa'am/ zhe sdang dang lhan cig skyes pa'am/ gti mug dang lhan cig skyes pa rgod pa'i gad mo yang med/ rta
52b2(dkon brtsegs): gad du dgod pa yang med mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis ni bdag dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems bskyed pa las bdag gis ni byang chub thob par gyur gyi/ sems
52b3(dkon brtsegs): c an 'di dag ni le lo'i dbang gis 'khor ba thib por gnas par gyur pas kye ma sems can 'di dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir snying rjes bgrod par bya ba'i chos thams cad la brtson 'grus rtsom
52b4(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed pa yin no zhes de ltar snying rje chen po bskyed pa na/ sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin par rig la/ bdag cag ni dman pa dang / bag med pa yin par rig nas de dag
52b5(dkon brtsegs): da bdag la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gad mo cher gad par byed de de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa
52b6(dkon brtsegs): btsas ma thag tu brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dag gis 'khru bar byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu de ni brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dag mchod pa'i las byed pa yang yin la/ 'jig rten na yang khye'u dag btsas ma thag tu gdon mi
52b7(dkon brtsegs): z a bar khrus byed pa dag yod pas byang chub sems dpas kyang 'jig rten shes pa'i rjes su gdon mi za bar 'jug par bya dgos pas na don gyi dbang de mthong ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu brgya byin dang
52b8(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa dag gis 'khru bar byed de/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dgon par btsas ma thag kho nar byang chub kyi snying por mi 'gro bar ci'i phyir grong khyer du
53a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jug ce na/ dbang po rnams yongs su smin par kun du bstan pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bya ba kun du bstan pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtsed mo de dag kun du bstan nas kyang gling chen po bzhi la mi lta bar spangs te mngon par 'byung ba
53a2(dkon brtsegs): kun du bstan par bya ba dang / 'di ltar sems can gzhan dag kyang bdag gi rjes su slob pa na 'dod pa'i dga' dang / rtsed mo dang / longs spyod dang / 'khor rgya chen po dag spangs te rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir
53a3(dkon brtsegs): te/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dgon par btsas ma thag kho nar byang chub kyi snying por mi 'gro bar grong khyer du zhugs nas mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i rgyu ni de yin/ rkyen ni de yin te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /ci'i phyir byang
53a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa na/ yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur ce na/ de la ni byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i nyes pa med de/ yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul nyid tshe zad nas dus las 'das pa yin gyi byang
53a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i nyes pa ma yin te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog na gnas pa nyid kyi tshe na lha'i mig rnam par dag pas yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi tshe la so sor brtags na byang chub sems dpa'i yum lha
53a6(dkon brtsegs): mo sgyu 'phrul gyi tshe'i lhag ma ni zla ba bcu dang zhag bdun las ma las par shes nas/ de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog nas shi 'phos te ma'i mngal du zhugs pa yin pas rigs kyi bu rnams grangs des
53a7(dkon brtsegs): na khyod kyis 'di ltar yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul nyid tshe zad nas 'chi ba'i dus byas par zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i nyes pa ni ma yin par rigs par bya ste/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /ci'i phyir
53a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas yi ge dang / lag rtsis dang / bstan bcos dang / grangs dang rtsis dang / ral gri'i thabs dang / mda' gzhu'i thabs dang / 'gyed stobs dang / gyad kyi 'dzin stangs dang / skar ma'i dpyad dang / dga' ba dang / rtsed mo
53b1(dkon brtsegs): dag legs par bslabs shes na/ 'jig rten dang rjes su 'thun par bya ba'i phyir te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dang po nyid nas gang la legs par bslabs par ma byas pa'i bzo 'am/ gsang sngags sam/ rig sngags sam/ bstan bcos sam/ bro gar ram
53b2(dkon brtsegs): glu 'am/ rol mo'i sgra 'am/ bzhad gad dam/ 'jo sgeg gam/ dga' ba 'am/ rtsed mo kun du bstan par bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'ga' yang ming mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' la ni btsas ma
53b3(dkon brtsegs): thag kho nar 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzo dang / las kyi gnas thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon shin du legs par bslabs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa'i dbang gi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir te/
53b4(dkon brtsegs): de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa btsun mo dang / slas dang / g.yog 'khor len par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod pa don du gnyer ba
53b5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i gnas skabs na skyes bu dam pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir te/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pas ni btsun mo dang / slas dang bu'i 'khor gdon mi za bar bstan par bya dgos te
53b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' ni skyes bu dam pa ma yin gyi za ma'i rigs shig yin no snyam du sems par gyur na/ /de dag yun ring por don med pa dang / gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / log par ltung bar
53b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bas sems can de dag gi the tshom bcad pa dang / 'di lta ste sras sgra gcan zin kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma blangs so/ /gang dag 'di snyam du sras sgra gcan zin ni yab dang
53b8(dkon brtsegs): yum gyi mer mer po las skyes pa yin no snyam du sems na de ltar mi ltar 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgra gcan zin 'di ni sngon 'di skad du bdag srid pa tha ma pa'i bur gyur cig ces smon lam btab bas na sgra gcan zin ni
54a1(dkon brtsegs): lha yul nas shi 'phos nas 'dir rdzus te skyes pa yin gyi/ pha dang ma'i mer mer po las skyes pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma yang sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis blangs pa yin te/ des de bzhin
54a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi spyan sngar bram za'i khye'u khyod srid pa tha ma pa gyur ba na bdag gi khyim thab tu gyur la/ bdag kyang khyod kyi btsun mor gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpas
54a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'di skad ces bzang mo nga ni 'dod pa rnams don du gnyer ba ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du gyur cig ces ud pa la'i phyir khas blangs te/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de ni
54a4(dkon brtsegs): mi slu ba yin pas na byang chub sems dpas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma blangs so/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pas ni btsun mo'i 'khor dang / g.yog 'khor gdon mi za bar kun du bstan par bya dgos
54a5(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'di ltar shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho mas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / lha'i mchod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas 'di skad du kye ma bdag
54a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang yon tan gyi chos 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur cig ces lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar na shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma byang chub kyi sems
54a7(dkon brtsegs): brtan par skyed du gzhug pa'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma blangs so/ /gzhan yang sems can gang dag 'dod pa dang / bran dang / chung ma dang / las kyi mtha' dang / khang khyim dang / nor rdzas
54a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'du 'dzis sbags nas yongs su 'dzin pa spangs te rab tu 'byung bar mi nus pa'i sems can de dag la 'dod pa'i sred pa dang / longs spyod dang / nor rdzas dang / chung ma la mi lta ba kun du bstan par bya ba'i phyir yang
54b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma blangs ni khang khyim dang nor rdzas dang / chung ma dang / 'khor rnams la mi lta bar spangs te mngon par byung na/ sems can de dag kyang 'di snyam du gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'di
54b2(dkon brtsegs): yang de ltar btsun mo dang / nor rdzas dang / 'khor dang / longs spyod rgya chen po dag la mi lta bar spangs te rab tu byung na de'i phyir bdag cag kyang ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung bar mi bya snyam du sems par bya ba'i phyir ro// // bam po gsum pa/ gzhan yang byang
54b3(dkon brtsegs): c hub sems dpas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bud med gzhon nu bsnyen bkur ma gang dag dge ba'i chos rnams kyis yongs su smin par byas shing yid gcugs par gyur pa de dag gis 'di skad ces bdag cag khyod srid pa tha
54b4(dkon brtsegs): ma par gyur pa'i bar tshun chad kyi btsun mor gyur cig / ces smon lam btab pas na de dag gi dkar po'i chos rgya cher smyin par bya ba'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpas 'khor rnams blangs te/ de na byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i
54b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi nang du gnas pa'i bud med bzhi khri nyis stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/ /lhag ma rnams ni log par mi ltung ba'i chos can du byas te/ rnam grangs des kyang byang chub
54b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas 'khor rnams blangs so/ /gzhan yang bud med gang dag 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdung ba chen pos yongs su gdungs par gyur pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' mthong ma thag tu bdag nyid 'dod chags
54b7(dkon brtsegs): dang bral bar kun shes par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas bdag nyid kyi chu zheng dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i sprul pa mngon par sprul nas/ sprul pa de dang bud med de dag lhan cig dga' ba dang
54b8(dkon brtsegs): rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na de dag so so nas 'di snyam du bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyod par byed do snyam du sems par zad kyi
55a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam gtan gyi dga' ba'i gnas pas gnas par byed do/ /sprul pa'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me
55a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad tshun chad nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/ /shAkya'i bu 'dun pa dang / rta bsngags ldan gnyis kyang de gnyis kyi sngon gyi smon lam nyid yin par blta bar bya ste/ de yang byang
55a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin par blta bar bya'o/ /ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bsam gtan byed ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' de na gnas pas lha bye ba phrag bdun bcu gdul bar dang yab
55a4(dkon brtsegs): dang yum dag yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdag rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir mngon par 'byung ba dang / shes rab che ba nyid gdon mi za bar kun tu bstan par bya dgos pa dang / shing 'dzam bu'i grib mas ma btang ba nyid
55a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang kun du bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bsam gtan byed pa'i rgyu ni de yin/ rkyen ni de yin te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa'
55a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / rtsed mo thams cad don du mi gnyer ba ci'i phyir bskyed mos tshal gyi sar byung zhe na/ rgan po dang / nad pa dang / shi ba kun du bstan par bya ba dang / nye du rnams kyis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni nye du rnams mi 'dod
55a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin gyi/ rga ba dang / na pa dang / 'chi bas 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / khyim na gnas pa ni nyes pa mang po'i skyon chags pas gnas ma yin par rig nas mngon par byung ba yin no zhes shes par 'gyur ba kun du bstan par bya
55a8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sems can thams cad kyang rga ba dang / na pa dang / 'chi bas 'jigs pa kun du bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/ de'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang / rtsed mo don du mi gnyer ba yang bskyed mos tshal gyis sar byung ste
55b1(dkon brtsegs): de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' nam phyed kyi dus kyi tshe mngon par byung la nyin mo ma yin zhe na sems can rnams gang la gnas na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i
55b2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/ dkar po'i chos don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bus ni bde ba rgya chen po ji snyed pa yang yongs su spangs te nam phyed kyi dus kyi tshe na ma dris mi ltos par mngon par 'byung bar bya ba dang bde ba'i yo byad
55b3(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed pa dag kyang yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / dkar po'i phyogs yongs su nyams par mi bya ba'i phyir te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpas skye bo rnams gnyid log
55b4(dkon brtsegs): par byas te mngon par byung zhe na/ skye bo rnams ni lha rnams kyis gnyid log par byas pas lha rnams kyis nyes par kun du bstan pa'i phyir te/ byang chub sems dpa' la nye du rnams dang / skye bo rnams tha ba dang / zhe sdang gi sems
55b5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par gyur na de dag la yun ring por don med pa dang / gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / log par ltung bar 'gyur gyi/ de dag gi skye bo rnams lha rnams kyis gnyid log par byas shing lha rnams kyis sgo phye ste/ bar snang la
55b6(dkon brtsegs): khyer bas de ni byang chub sems dpas mnyes so zhes shes par gyur na/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' la dad pa rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur bas don gyis dbang de mthong ba'i phyir skye bo rnams gnyid log par byas nas mngon
55b7(dkon brtsegs): par byung ste/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpas rta dang rgyan rnams shAkya'i bu 'dun pa la phyir bskur zhe na/ 'di lta ste chog shes pa kun du bstan pa bya ba'i phyir te/
55b8(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag 'di skad ces byang chub sems dpa' ni dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar rab tu byung bas na gser dang / dngul dag don du gnyer ba ma yin no/ /zhes brjod par bya ba dang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
56a1(dkon brtsegs): skye bo dag rjes su slob tu gzhug par bya ba'i phyir te/ 'di ltar gang dag bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung bar 'gyur ba de dag gis ni nga'i rjes su bslab cing dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi la
56a2(dkon brtsegs): brten nas rab tu 'byung bar bya ste/ rab tu 'byung bas ni dang po kho na nas 'tsho ba la ltos shing rab tu 'byung bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /ci'i phyir byang chub
56a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' bdag nyid kyis ral gris skra bregs te/ rab tu byung zhe na rigs kyi bu 'di ltar gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang gzi brjid zil gyis mnan te/ skra 'dreg par bzod pa'i lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am
56a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'ga' yang med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de nyid rab tu 'byung ba don du gnyer bas na dad pa dang ldan pa yin no zhes kun du bstan pa dang / bdag nyid
56a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis skra bregs te rab tu byung na rgyal po zas gtsang yang sus nga'i bu'i skra bregs de chad pas gcad do/ /zhes mi dga' bar mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid kyis rang gi ral gris skra bregs so zhes rgyal po zas gtsang gis
56a6(dkon brtsegs): thos nas cang mi zer bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyis bu gzhan
56a7(dkon brtsegs): yang gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpas lo drug tu dka' ba spyod pa spyad pa yang nyon cig / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi mi dge ba'i las kyi bya ba dag la nges par skyo bar bya zhing
56a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dun par bya ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la tshig 'di skad ces dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig
56b1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ byang chub ni mchog du rnyed par dka' ba yin pas dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras pa de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang / ldem po'i ngag yin par blta bar bya ste/ las kyi sgrib pa de'i rgyus byang
56b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' lo drug tu dka' ba spyod do/ /byang chub sems dpas ci las bsams te tshig de skad ces smras she na/ rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung
56b3(dkon brtsegs): gi gsung rab la bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng de la ne'u ldangs bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa lnga zhig yod pa de dag sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang dang / sdig pa'i
56b4(dkon brtsegs): grogs po dang phrad pas byang chub kyi sems dag brjed par gyur nas de'i tshe rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag mu stegs can gyi brtul zhugs spyod par gyur cing sangs rgyas kyi brtul zhugs mi spyod pa dang / mu stegs can gyi gsang
56b5(dkon brtsegs): sngags la brtson zhing sangs rgyas kyi gsang sngags la mi brtson pa dang / mu stegs can la mos shing mu stegs can gyi dbang gis byang chub ni bdag cag la yod de/ bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas yin no zhes bdag nyid ston pa yin par khas 'chi bar
56b6(dkon brtsegs): byed do/ /bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng gis rigs kyi bu de dag snod yin par rig nas thabs la mkhas pas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu lnga po de dag rim gyis mu stegs can de dag gi drung nas phyir bzlog par 'dod pas de
56b7(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pas rdza mkhan bum byed la tshig 'di skad ces dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya/ byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras te/ rigs kyi bu
56b8(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng de phugs gzhan zhig tu bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu lnga po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'khod do/ /de nas rdza mkhan bum byed de sa phyogs ga la ba der song ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
57a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bsngags pa brjod cing bsngags pa brjod nas bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye 'od zer phreng tshur shog de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
57a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar 'dong ngo / /rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma bram ze'i khye'u 'di dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa yin pas gal te bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
57a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang / byang chub kyi bsngags pa brjod cing mu stegs can rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin par brjod par gyur na rigs kyi bu 'di dag yongs su dogs par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
57a4(dkon brtsegs): p a yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnas de lta bu yod do snyam nas bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng de sngar dam bcas pa de nyid rjes su srung bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu 'thun
57a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i thabs la mkhas pas tshigs 'di skad ces dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya/ byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras so/ /ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du
57a6(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni byang chub kyi 'du shes kyang med/ sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang med/ sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i sangs rgyas
57a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / byang chub kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ byang chub ni nang du yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / byang chub ni phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / byang chub ni nang dang phyi rol du
57a8(dkon brtsegs): yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de ltar chos thams cad ma skyes mi dmigs pa'i phyir byang chub ni gtan stong pa nyid yin pas bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i thabs la
57b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa des tshig 'di skad ces dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya/ byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras so/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe na bram
57b2(dkon brtsegs): ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng de ne'u ldangs lnga po de dag chu 'gram zhig na 'khod par gyur pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus rigs kyis bu lnga po de dag gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir rdza mkhan bum byed chu 'gram de ga la ba der song ste
57b3(dkon brtsegs): bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng ba de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye 'od zer phreng tshur shog /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba yin gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

57b5(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras te/ bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng des de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gror ma btub pa dang / de nas rdza mkhan bum byed des bram ze'i
57b6(dkon brtsegs): khye'u 'od zer phreng gi thor to nas bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la ba der khrid de song ngo / /bram ze'i khye'u lnga po de dag gis kyang bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng la yongs su
57b7(dkon brtsegs): bskor te yid 'dun par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la ba der dong ngo / /de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu log par lta ba'i khyim du skyes pa lnga po de dag cher
57b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dun par gyur nas/ 'di snyam du 'di ltar bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la lta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / drung du 'gro ba dang /

58a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung gi spyan sngar 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas de ni ci 'dra ba zhig yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos de ni ci 'dra ba zhig yin snyam nas/ de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu lnga po de dag gis 'dun pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs
58a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la blta ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi thad du dong ngo / /de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung mthong ma thag tu
58a4(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bskul bas dad pa thob par gyur to/ /de dag gis dad pa thob nas bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng la smras pa/ ston pa'i yon tan 'di lta bu dag khyod kyis sngon chad kho bo cag la ma smras so zhes smyos so/ /

58a6(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags pa yang thos nas lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis
58a7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pas thugs su chud nas/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnams grangs phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i gzungs rdo rje'i tshig chos thams cad skye ba myed pa
58a8(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba de lta de ltar yang dag par bstan par mdzad de/ des rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar na da ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thogs pa
58b1(dkon brtsegs): m i mnga' bas khyed cag la gal te bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng des rigs kyi bu de dag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bsngags pa brjod cing mu
58b2(dkon brtsegs): s tegs can rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par gyur na des ni rigs kyi bu de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar 'gro ba'i gnas dang skabs kyang med na dad pa 'thob par
58b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do zhes lung bstan to/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng gis shes rab

58b5(dkon brtsegs): zad kyi/ rigs kyi bu phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas la nem nur med cing byang chub la yang som nyi med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la yang som nyi med de/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas
58b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag yongs su smin par byas shing las kyi rnam par smyin pa bstan pa gang yin pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des kyang ngas lo drug tu dka' ba spyod pa spyad par gyur pas sems can
58b7(dkon brtsegs): mi shes pa spyod pa gzhan dag gis ni dge sbyong dang bram ze tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag la bzlog nas tshig rtsub po smras la/ de dag gis shes kyang rung mi shes kyang rung / shes pa dang ldan yang rung / shes pa dang mi ldan yang rung ste/
58b8(dkon brtsegs): brjod par gyur na de dag yun ring por don med pa dang / gnod pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / log par ltung bar 'gyur bas na sems can de dag la las kyi bya ba bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas de la de'i las
59a1(dkon brtsegs): kun du ston par zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' la ni las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang med do/ /gzhan yang sems can gang dag dge sbyong dang / bram ze tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag la tshig rtsub po smras nas/ bdag la ni thar pa'i skal
59a2(dkon brtsegs): pa med do snyam nas 'gyod pa la gnas shing phyin chad rtsol bar mi byed pa'i sems can de dag gi 'gyod pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir yang las de kun du bstan te/ de dag 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis
59a3(dkon brtsegs): t hogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la tshig 'di skad ces byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras
