128a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /snyam pa ste/ byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
128a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nges par byung ba yin no/ /byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
128a8(dkon brtsegs): ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhing mi nyams la yongs su mi nyams te/ khyad par thob par 'gyur/ bdud phyir rgol ba bcom par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi
128b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid ji lta bzhin du rtogs nas 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo bar 'gyur/ yongs su mi skyo ba'i yid dang ldan nas kyang gzhan gyi kha na ma las pa'i ye shes kyis myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
128b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha
128b3(dkon brtsegs): dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa
128b4(dkon brtsegs): las byams pas zhus pa chos brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so/ / // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing
128b5(dkon brtsegs): zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa ste/
128b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa 'od srung gis zhus pa lung bstan pa/ bam po dang po/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya kA sh+ya ba pa ri brta nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'od srung gi le'u zhes bya ba theg pa
128b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po'-i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi bya rgod phung po'i ri la/
128b8(dkon brtsegs): dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas/ 'dus pa khri drug stong thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
129a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
129a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos dang / chos
129a3(dkon brtsegs): smra ba la mi gus pa yin/ chos la ser sna byed cing chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud byed pa yin/ chos 'dod pa'i gang zag rnams la chos kyi bar chad byed cing 'dun pa zlog par byed rnam par 'khrug
129a4(dkon brtsegs): par byed de/ mi ston cing rab tu 'chab pa yin/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis bdag la stod cing gzhan la smod pa yin te/ 'od srung chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab yongs su nyams
129a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /chos smra ba la gus pa med pa yin/ /chos la ser sna byed par gyur pa dang / /chos la slob dpon dpe mkhyud byed pa yin/ /chos 'dod rnams la bgegs
129a6(dkon brtsegs): ni byed gyur cing / /'dun pa zlog la de bzhin rnam 'khrug byed/ /rgyal bas bsngags pa'i chos ni yong mi ston/ /le lo can de bdag stod rtag tu brtson/ /gzhan la smod par byed la mngon par dga'/ /
129a7(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi 'di dag rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyi/ /shes rab nyams par 'gyur par rgyal bas gsungs/ /chos bzhi 'di dag rab tu spang byas la/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos bzhi gzhan bsgom mo/ /
129a8(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab chen por 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos dang chos smra ba la gus pa dang bcas pa yin/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis rnyed pa
129b1(dkon brtsegs): dang bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la mi re bar ji ltar thos pa dang / ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa yin/ mang du thos pa las shes rab 'byung bar
129b2(dkon brtsegs): rig nas mgo 'am gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du thos pa yongs su tshol zhing ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams 'dzin par byed pa yin/ nan tan snying por byed kyi smra ba dang brjod pa'i tshig lhur len pa ma yin pa ste/
129b3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab chen por 'gyur ba'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /chos smra ba la gus dang bcas pa yin/ /zang zing med cing rnyed dang bkur sti la/ /re ba med cing tshigs
129b4(dkon brtsegs): bcad mi sems par/ /ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams gzhan la ston/ /thos las shes rab 'byung bar des rig nas/ /mgo la 'bar bzhin rtag tu thos pa tshol/ /de ni ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams 'dzin/ /
129b5(dkon brtsegs): chos bzung nas ni nan tan bya phyir gnas/ /mkhas de nan tan snying por byed pa yin/ /tshig lhur mi len smra ba lhur mi len/ /mkhas pas chos bzhi 'di dag bsten byas na/ /rgyal bas bsngags
129b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes rab thob par 'gyur/ /'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ slob dpon dang / bla ma dang
129b7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin gnas slu ba dang / gzhan 'gyod pa med pa dag la 'gyod pa nye bar sgrub pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la bsngags pa ma yin pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / brjod pa ma yin pa'i sgra
129b8(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'byin pa dang / sgyu dang g.yos gzhan la nye bar spyod kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas ma yin pa ste/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad
130a1(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ sbyin gnas bla mas bsgom bzhin mi byed dang / /gzhan dag la yang the tshom nyer sgrub dang / /sems can gang dag byang chub rab zhugs pa/ /de la bsngags min mi
130a2(dkon brtsegs): snyan smra ba dang / /sgyu dang g.yo dang rgyan la dor byed pas/ /gzhan la sten kyi bsam pas ma yin pa/ /chos bzhi 'di dag kun tu bsten byas nas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems mchog nyams par 'gyur/ /
130a3(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas na chos 'di sten byed na/ /byang chub mchog las de ni ring bar 'gyur/ /de las bzlog pa sten par byed na ni/ /byang chub mchog rab bsngags pa reg par 'gyur/ /'od srung byang chub
130a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na skye ba thams cad du skyes ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems mngon du 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bar ma dor brjed par mi 'gyur ro/ /bzhi
130a5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srog gi phyir ram/ tha na bzhad gad kyi phyir yang brdzun gyi tshig mi smra ba dang / sgyu dang g.yo med par sems can thams cad kyi drung na lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas pa dang
130a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes skyed cing de dag gi yang dag pa'i bsngags pa phyogs bzhir rjod pa dang / nyi tshe ba'i theg pa mi 'dod pa'i phyir sems can gang rnams
130a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par byed pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/ 'od srung chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
130a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' skye ba thams cad du skyes ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems mngon du 'gyur te byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du ngar ba dor brjed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
130b1(dkon brtsegs): srog gi phyir yang brdzun tshig mi smra zhing / /rtag tu don dang ldan pa'i tshig rnams smra/ /sgyu dang g.yo ni rtag tu rnam spangs te/ /lhag pa'i bsam pas rtag tu sems can lta/ /sems
130b2(dkon brtsegs): can dge ba byang chub gang zhugs pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' de la ston par sems/ /ston pa'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag nas kyang / /de dag bsngags pa phyogs bzhir rjod
130b3(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ /sems can gang dag yongs su smin byed pa/ /bla med ye shes yang dag 'dzin du 'jug /chos de dag la rab tu gnas pa rnams/ /byang chub sems ni nams kyang
130b4(dkon brtsegs): brjed mi 'gyur/ /'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos skyes shing byung ba rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i chos de dag gis rgyas par
130b5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gsang tshig tshol ba dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti la lhag par zhen pas khyim la lta ba dang / byang chub
130b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' la rnam par sdang zhing skur ba 'debs pa dang / ma thos pa dang ma zin pa'i mdo sde rnams spong ba ste/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang
130b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos skyes shing byung ba rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i chos de dag gis rgyas par mi 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nga rgyal gyis ni 'jig rten rgyang pan
130b8(dkon brtsegs): tshol/ /rnyed kyi phyir ni khyim la sbyor bar byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas sras la sdang / /de dag bsngags min kun du smra bar byed/ /de ni ma thos pa dang ma zin mdo/ /bde bar
131a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas gsungs pa spong bar byed/ /chos 'di dag dang ldan par gyur pa ni/ /dge ba'i chos kyis rgyas par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltas byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa yi/ /chos bzhi 'di dag rgyang bsring rnam
131a2(dkon brtsegs): par spang / /'di dag bsten na byang chub rab ring ste/ /gnam sa ring bas shin du ring bar 'gyur/ /'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na khyad par du 'gro bas yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/
131a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod tshol ba la brtsams nas legs par thos pa tshol gyi nyes pa mi tshol te/ sems can thams cad la nga rgyal
131a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i phyir sems khyi dang 'dra ba yin/ chos kyi rnyed pas chog par 'dzin te/ log pas 'tsho ba thams cad yongs su spangs shing 'phags pa'i rigs kyis chog par 'dzin pa yin/ gzhan dag gi ltung ba byung ba
131a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ma byung ba mi gling zhing gzhan dag gi 'khrul pa gzhan dang gzhan mi tshol ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo gang dag de'i blos mi rtogs pa de la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni mtha' yas shing sems can mos
131a6(dkon brtsegs): pa tha dad pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos bstan pa 'jug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen kyi bdag gis ni mi shes te/ de bzhin gshegs pas mngon sum mo zhes byas nas mi
131a7(dkon brtsegs): spong ba ste/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na khyad par du 'gro bas yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de ni rtag tu pha rol phyin rnams dang / /thabs
131a8(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas dang byang chub sde snod brtson/ /nga rgyal med pas khyi 'dra'i sems kyis su/ /sems can kun la nga rgyal bcag pa yin/ /chos dang 'thun pa'i rnyed pas chog sems shing / /'tsho ba yongs dag 'phags pa'i rigs
131b1(dkon brtsegs): la gnas/ /gzhan gyi 'khrul pa tshol bar mi byed cing / /gzhan gyi ltung ba gleng bar mi byed do/ /gang la de yi blos ni mi rtogs pa/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum ste/ /bde gshegs bshad pa'i byang chub mtha' yas
131b2(dkon brtsegs): pas/ /rgyal bas mkhyen gyi bdag gis mi shes so/ /chos bzhi 'di dag rig par gyur pa ni/ /ye shes khyad par 'phags mchog nyams mi 'gyur/ /chos 'di dag la rab tu gnas pa ni/ /rgyal bas bsngags pa'i byang
131b3(dkon brtsegs): chub rnyed mi dka'/ /'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni gya gyu can gyi sems bskyed pa ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang par bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la som nyi dang
131b4(dkon brtsegs): yid gnyis dang / the tshom za ba dang / sems can rnams la nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / 'chab pa dang / khre ba dang / gnod par sems pa dang / gzhan gyi rnyed pa rnams la phrag dog dang ser sna byed pa dang / byang chub
131b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams la bsngags pa ma yin pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / brjod pa ma yin pa'i sgras tshigs su bcad pa 'byin pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni gya gyu can gyi sems bskyed pa ste/ de dag byang
131b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ chos rnams la ni som nyi yi gnyis byed/ /sems can rnams la nga rgyal rgyags khro sten/ /gzhan gyi rnyed la ser sna phrag dog byed/ /
131b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba la ni nams kyang dad mi byed/ /mi mkhas rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' la/ /bsngags pa min dang brjod min mi snyan rjod/ /gyu gyu can gyi sems bzhi rnam par spang / /byang chub sems dpas rtag tu sems can bsten/ /
131b8(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' drang po'i drang ba'i mtshan nyid yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ba rnams mi 'chab cing rjod de rnam par 'byed pa dang / 'chags pas kun nas ldang ba
132a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin/ de'i bden pa'i tshig gang gis rgyal srid stor ba 'am/ nor yal ba 'am/ srog gi bar chad du 'gyur yang bden pa'i tshig mi mkhyud cing gzhan nas gzhan du sgyur ba'i tshig mi smra pa yin/
132a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba skur pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / smod pa dang / bshung ba dang / sdigs pa dang / rdeg pa dang / gsod pa dang / 'ching bar byed pa'i nyes par thams cad la bdag gis nyes par sems shing
132a3(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pas gzhan dag la mi 'khrug cing 'khon du 'dzin pa med pa yin/ de dad pa la rab tu gnas pa yin te/ bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir thams cad dad par mi 'gyur ba'i sangs
132a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos la mngon par dad pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' drang po'i drang ba'i mtshan nyid yin no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ltung ba byung ba 'chab par mi byed kyi/ rjod cing rnam par 'byed de
132a5(dkon brtsegs): nyes par 'dor/ nor dang rgyal srid phyir dang srog phyir yang 'du shes bsgyur te brdzun pa'i tshig mi smra/ skur dang smod dang bshung dang gsod pa dang / /'ching bar byed dang go rar bcug pa la/ /bdag gis nyes sems
132a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la 'khrug mi byed/ /las ni bdag gir bya bas 'khon mi 'dzin/ /de ni bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub dang / /dad la gnas shing bsam pa dag ldan pa/ /'di dag drang ba'i mtshan du sangs rgyas gsungs/ /
132a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can mchog gis rtag tu bsten par bya/ /'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pa la gces pa 'dor ba'i chos su gnas shing chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i
132a8(dkon brtsegs): chos sgrub pa la nan tan du mi byed pa yin/ rjes su bstan pa la gces pa 'dor ba'i chos su gnas shing slob dpon dang mkhan po la sri zhu mi byed pa yin/ dam bcas pa las nyams kyang dad pas byin pa la kun
132b1(dkon brtsegs): du spyod de/ dad pas byin pa log par ltung bar byed pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' dul ba cang shes rnams mthong na mi gus shing nga rgyal 'dzin pa yin te/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod do/ /
132b2(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thos pas rgod par gnas par byed pa yin/ /rjes su bstan pa'i chos nyid rtogs mi 'gyur/ /de ni chos kun gces pa 'dor ba sten/ /'phags pa rnams la nam yang sri zhu byed/ /dam bcas
132b3(dkon brtsegs): nyams kyang dad pas byin pa yin/ /kha zas rnams la de ni rtag tu za/ /byang chub sems dpa' cang shes thob pa dag /mthong bar gyur na gus par mi byed cing / /dmu rgod de ni nga rgyal 'phel bar byed/ /byang chub sems
132b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' nga rgyal bcag mi sten/ /'di dag dmu rgod bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ /de dag rgyal sras rnams kyis yongs su spang / /'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa ste/ bzhi gang
132b5(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ legs par thos pa nyan cing de la nan tan du byed de don la rton kyi tshig 'bru la mi rton pa yin/ gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa la 'thun par 'dzin cing bka' blo bde la legs par byed pa'i las
132b6(dkon brtsegs): byed cing bla ma la sri zhu bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin las ma nyams te cang shes pas zas za ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa' dul ba cang shes rnams mthong na gus pa dang bcas shing rjes
132b7(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas par de la gzhol/ de la 'bab/ de la bab cing de'i yon tan 'dod pa yin te/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' cang shes so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang mnyan de ni legs par thos
132b8(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ /chos don snying por byed cing nan tan gnas/ /rjes su bstan pa 'thun par 'dzin byed cing / /chos 'dod bka' blo bde bar bla ma sten/ /tshul khrims ting nge 'dzin la rtag gnas shing / /tshul khrims bsdams
133a1(dkon brtsegs): nas de ni bza' ba za/ /gus dang bcas shing rje sar bcas pa yin/ /de la gzhol zhing der 'bab yon tan 'dod/ /rgyal sras gang dag cang shes thob gyur pa/ /de dag la ni
133a2(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu dga' bas lta/ /bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa 'di bzhi ni/ /bde gshegs sras po cang shes thob pa yin/ /'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa ste/ bzhi
133a3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su smin par ma byas pa rnams la yid rton pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul ba dang / sems can snod du ma gyur pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen
133a4(dkon brtsegs): po ston pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang / rgya chen po la mos pa'i sems can rnams la theg pa dman pa ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang / sems can yang dag pa la rab tu
133a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can rnams la brnyas shing tshul khrims 'chal ba sdig pa'i chos can kun tu sdud pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub
133a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i 'khrul pa'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ yongs smin ma byas rnams la yid mi brtan/ /snod min rnams la rgya chen chos mi bshad/ /rgya chen sems can rnams la theg pa dman/ /byang
133a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' mchog gis bshad mi bya/ /yang dag gnas shing tshul khrims yon tan ldan/ /dge ba'i chos can rnams la brnyas mi bya/ /tshul khrims 'chal ba'i sems can yongs mi sdu/ /sdig
133a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos rnams yongs su spang bar bya/ /'khrul ba'i chos bzhi de dag shes gyur nas/ /byang chub sems dpas rgyang bsring rnam par spang / /'di dag bsten na byang chub 'tshang mi rgya/ /de lta bas na mkhas
133b1(dkon brtsegs): pas chos 'di spang / /'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang / sems can thams cad la mtshungs
133b2(dkon brtsegs): par chos ston pa dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad la yang dag par sbyor ba ste/ 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub
133b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i lam mo/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems can rnams la rtag tu sems snyoms bya/ /sangs rgyas theg mchog yang dag 'dzin du 'jug /rgyal bas bsngags pa'i chos
133b4(dkon brtsegs): ni bstan par bya/ /sems can kun la dang ba'i sems su bya/ /yang dag sbyor zhing nan tan byed par gnas/ /sems can kun la mtshungs par spyad par bya/ /
133b5(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi 'di dag rgyal bas rab bsngags te/ /rgyal sras rnams kyis de dag rtag tu bsten/ /'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bshes gnyen ngan pa grogs po ngan
133b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa
133b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa don nyung zhing bya ba nyung ba dang / 'jig rten rgyang pan pa gsang tshig sna tshogs kyi spobs pa can dang / gang la bsten pas 'jig
133b8(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi zang zing kun sdud par 'gyur gyi chos kun mi sdud pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bshes gnyen ngan pa grogs po ngan pa ste/
134a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nyan thos gang dag bdag phan brtson pa dang / /gang dag rab tu byung
134a2(dkon brtsegs): nas rnal 'byor spyod/ /rang sangs rgyas pa gang dag byed nyung zhing / /bdag gi don du 'du 'dzi rnam par spong / /byis pa gang dag 'jig rten rgyang pan klog /ji ltar bstan
134a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gang dag 'dir rtsod byed/ /gang la bsten na zang zing kun sdud kyi/ /chos ni nam yang sdud par mi byed pa/ /de bzhi byang chub sems dpas rab spangs nas/ /
134a4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i bshes gnyen bzhi la bsten par bya/ /'di dag bshes gnyen ngan dang grogs ngan du/ /rgyal bas gsungs te thag bsring yongs su spang / /'od
134a5(dkon brtsegs): srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi lam rton pa'i phyir slong ba byang chub sems
134a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / thos pa'i shes rab rton pa'i phyir chos smra ba byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
134a7(dkon brtsegs): cad rton pa'i phyir rab tu 'byung ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rton pa'i
134a8(dkon brtsegs): phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen no/ /
134b1(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub yongs su rton phyir len pa po/ /sbyin byed rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin/ /chos don smra ba thos dang shes rab byed/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin
134b2(dkon brtsegs): par bde gshegs gsungs/ /gang dag rab 'byung yang dag 'dzin 'jug pa/ /de dag dge rtsa yin pas bshes gnyen gsungs/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi lam ni rton pa'i phyir/ /
134b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams ni bde gshegs sras kyi bshes/ /rgyal bas bsngags pa bzhi po 'di dag ni/ /bde gshegs sras kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ /'di dag bsten cing rtag tu bag
134b4(dkon brtsegs): yod na/ /bde gshegs bstan pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/ /'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' ltar bcos pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti
134b5(dkon brtsegs): don du gnyer gyi chos don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / rjod pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa don du gnyer gyi yon tan don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / bdag bde ba don du gnyer gyi sems can gyi sdug bsngal
134b6(dkon brtsegs): bsal pa don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / 'khor gyi tshogs don du gnyer gyi dben pa don du gnyer ba ma yin pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' ltar bcos pa'o/ /
134b7(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rnyed pa don du gnyer gyi chos 'dod min/ /brjod pa don gnyer yon tan don gnyer min/ /bdag bde rtag tu don du gnyer byed cing / /sems can sdug
134b8(dkon brtsegs): bsngal bsal ba don mi gnyer/ /'khor tshogs don du gnyer gyi dben mi 'dod/ /bde la chags kyi yon tan ma chags pa/ /bzhi po de dag bcos
135a1(dkon brtsegs): par gsungs pa ste/ /de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spangs/ /'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i yon
135a2(dkon brtsegs): tan te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid la yang mos la las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa dang / de bdag med par bzod la sems can la snying rje che ba dang / de'i bsam
135a3(dkon brtsegs): pa mya ngan las 'das pa la yang gnas la sbyor ba 'khor ba na yang gnas pa dang / de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sbyin pa yang gtong la rnam par smin pa la yang
135a4(dkon brtsegs): mi re ba ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i yon tan no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ chos rnams
135a5(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid du rtag mos kyang / /las kyi rnam par smin la 'ang yid ches so/ /bdag med bzod pas mnyam pa nyid gnas kyang / /sems can rnams
135a6(dkon brtsegs): la snying rje chen po skyed/ /de bsam rtag tu mya ngan 'das la gnas/ /de yi sbyor ba 'khor bar gnas pa yin/ /yongs smin bya phyir
135a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa sbyin byed kyang / /las kyi rnam par smin la re ba med/ /'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i gter chen po rnyed pa ste/ bzhi
135a8(dkon brtsegs): po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa drug nyan pa dang / chos smra ba la khong khro ba med pa'i
135b1(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis lta ba dang / bag yod par dgon pa la gnas par mngon par dga' ba ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i gter chen po rnyed
135b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshe rab kun tu sangs rgyas mnyes par byed/ /pha rol phyin pa drug po rnams kyang nyan/ /chos smra ba la sems ni rab tu dang / /
135b3(dkon brtsegs): mthong na rtag tu gus pa skyed par byed/ /rtag tu bag yod gyur nas dgon par gnas/ /de ni de nyid la yang rtag tu dga'/ /bzhi po 'di dag rgyal ba'i
135b4(dkon brtsegs): sras rnams kyi/ /gter chen yin par bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ /'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lam las yang
135b5(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'da' ba'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems
135b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad rtog pa dang / sems can thams cad la mi brnyas pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud
135b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' pa'i chos so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems ni yongs su gtong mi byed/ /sems can rnams la khong khro
135b8(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu spong / /lta bar gyur pa thams cad 'dor bar byed/ /sems can tshogs la brnyas par yod mi byed/ /bde bar gshegs pas bzhi po 'di dag ni/ /bdud las 'da'
136a1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba'i chos su gsungs/ /'di dag bsten na rgyal ba rnam 'dren pa/ /gser 'dra'i sku mnga' mtshungs pa med par 'gyur/ /'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad sdud par
136a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul 'chos med par dgon pa na gnas pa dang / len du phan 'dogs par re ba med par 'gyur ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag dang / sems can thams cad la lus dang srog /gtong zhing dam
136a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba dang / thos pa dang don gyis ngoms mi myong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sdud pa'i brtson 'grus te/ 'od srung chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad
136a4(dkon brtsegs): sdud par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dgon par gnas shing tshul 'chos rnam par spong / /rgyal gsungs bsdu ba sems can rnams la byed/ /dam chos yongs su btsal ba brtsam byas nas/ /lus dang srog kyang yongs
136a5(dkon brtsegs): su gtong bar byed/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba shin du mi nyung ba/ /yang dag bsgrub phyir rtag tu ngoms mi myong / /dge ba'i chos rnams yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir/ /chos bzhi 'di dag bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ /'od srung bzhi po 'di dag
136a6(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos sbyin pa dang / /tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams la cher snying rje ba dang / /sems can thams
136a7(dkon brtsegs): cad byang chub kyi sems ston pa dang / /nyam chung ba rnams la bzod pa sten pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dag cing zang zing med
136a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyis su/ /chos kyi sbyin byed rgyal bas rab tu bsngags/ /tshul khrims mi ldan pa la snying rje che/ /gzhan dag byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed 'jug /nyam chung rnams la bzod pas dang du len/ /'di ni dge
136b1(dkon brtsegs): chos sdud par gsungs pa ste/ /'di dag bsten na rgyal bar 'gyur bas na/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag rtag tu bsten/ /'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa
136b2(dkon brtsegs): 'joms par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sgron ma sbyin pa dang / tha na 'dris pa rnams la yang sbyin pa ste/ 'od
136b3(dkon brtsegs): srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa 'jom par byed pa'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshul khrims sdom pa yang dag 'dzin byed pa/ /dam chos 'dzin dang sgron
136b4(dkon brtsegs): ma sbyin pa dang / /de bzhin tha na 'dris la sbyin byed cing / /mkhas pa ma rig sa las rnam par 'byed/ /'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/
136b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos sbyin pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang phrag dog med pa dang / gzhan dag la mi brnyes pa ste/ 'od srung chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur
136b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang dag byang chub la ni sgrib byed pa/ /sdig pa bzhi pa bcu po rnam spangs nas/ /mkhas pas de bzhin bcu gnyis gzhan bsten na/ /'chi med reg nas byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /
136b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can dam pa gang dag chos tshul 'di/ /'dzin tam klog gam rab tu sten byed pa/ /de dag bsod nams mtha' yas rgyal ba gsungs/ /de yi tshad ni rgyal ba rnams rjod do/ /gang gis zhing ni gang gA'i bye ma snyed/ /
136b8(dkon brtsegs): rin chen bkang ste rgyal la phul ba bas/ /gang gis 'di las tshig bzhi'i tshigs bcad klog /bsod nams 'di yi grangs su'ang 'di mi phod do/ /'od bsrung byang chub sems
137a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i ming tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya'i 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos spyod pa dang / snyoms par spyod pa dang / dge ba spyod pa dang / chos la gnas pa dang ldan pa la byang chub sems
137a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' zhes bya'o/ /'od srung gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ste/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la phan
137a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'dzud pa dang / bdag ci re zhes yongs su 'jal zhing gzhan gyi shes pa la mi smod pa dang / nga rgyal med pa dang / lhag pa'i
137a4(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa bstan pa dang / bcos ma ma yin pa'i byams pa dang / mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba la sems snyoms pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha'i bar du gtan du mjal ba dang / tshig ran cing 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis gsong
137a5(dkon brtsegs): por smra ba dang / khur blangs pa rnams la sgyid lug pa med pa dang / sems can thams can la snying rje chen po yongs su ma bcad pa dang / yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba'i phyir thos pa dang /
137a6(dkon brtsegs): don gyis mi ngom mi myong ba dang / bdag gi 'khrul pa rnams la skyon du lta zhing gzhan gyi 'khrul pa rnams la mi gshe bar bsgo ba dang / spyod lam thams cad du byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyong ba dang / rnam par smin pa la
137a7(dkon brtsegs): mi re ba'i gtong ba dang / srid pa'i 'gro bar skye ba thams cad la mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i bzod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i brtson
137a8(dkon brtsegs): 'grus dang / gzugs med pa'i khams rnam par gsal ba'i bsam gtan dang / thams mkhas pas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang rab tu ldan pa'i thabs kyis zin pa'i shes rab dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang tshul
137b1(dkon brtsegs): khrims 'chal ba rnams la gnyis su med pa'i byams pa dang / gus par byas te chos nyan pa dang / gus par byas te dgon pa la gnas par mngon par dga' ba dang / 'jig rten gyi sna tshogs rnams la mi dga' zhing
137b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la mngon par dga' ba dang / theg pa dman pa la mi 'dod cing theg pa chen po la phan yon du lta ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spong zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sten pa dang /
137b3(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi sgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa lngas rnam par rtsen pa dang / ye shes la rton pa dang / sgrub pa dang log par sgrub pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams mi gtong ba dang / gcig tu chad par smra ba dang /
137b4(dkon brtsegs): bden pa gces su byed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba ste/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems
137b5(dkon brtsegs): can kun la phan dang bde bya ba'i/ /lhag pa'i bsam la mos par byed pa yin/ /kun mkhyen ye shes la ni sems grol zhing / /ri 'am mi ri snyam du bdag la dpog /smod pa med cing lhag pa'i nga rgyal med/ /
137b6(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa brtan zhing bcos pa med par byams/ /mdza' dang mi mdza' rnams la sems kyang snyoms/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha' la thug par du/ /sems can rnams la gtan du rab du mdza'/ /'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis
137b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam por smra bar byed/ /khur blangs pa la sgyid lug zhum pa med/ /sems can dag la snying rje yongs ma bcad/ /dam chos yongs su tshol la skyo ba med/ /thos pas mi ngom bdag gi 'khrul skyon lta/ /gzhan la
137b8(dkon brtsegs): gshe bas gdung bar byed pa med/ /spyod lam rnams su sems ni rab tu sbyong / /gtong ba rnam par smin la re ba med/ /tshul khrims srid pa'i 'gro bar gnas ma yin/ /sems can rnams la bzod cing khong khro med/ /
138a1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba yang dag sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus dang / /gzugs med khams spangs pa yi bsam gtan dang / /thabs kyis yang dag zin pa'i shes rab dang / /bsdu ba rnam bzhis yang dag zin thabs dang / /khrims ldan
138a2(dkon brtsegs): khrims med gnyis med byams pa dang / /gus par byas te dus su chos nyan dang / /gus par byas te dgon zhi gnas pa dang / /'jig rten sna tshogs dga' bar mi byed dang / /theg pa dman la dga' bar mi byed cing / /theg pa che
138a3(dkon brtsegs): la 'dod pa skyed pa dang / /sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spong byed cing / /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rtag tu sten pa dang / /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi la sgom pa dang / /mngon shes rnam lngas rtag tu rtsen pa dang / /ye shes
138a4(dkon brtsegs): rjes su rtag tu 'brang ba dang / /sgrub dang ldan pa gtong bar mi byed dang / /sgrub dang mi ldan gzhan yang mi gtong dang / /gcig tu chad par rtag tu smra ba dang / /bden la rtag tu gus dang bcas pa dang / /byang chub sems
138a5(dkon brtsegs): ni sngon du btang nas su/ /rgyal ba'i bsngags pa'i chos ni sgom par byed/ /bde gshegs gsungs pa'i sum bcu rtsa gnyis chos/ /'di dag bde gshegs sras kyis bsten par bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin
138a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni/ /chos 'di bden zhes bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ /'od srung dpe nye bar 'god pa bstan pa gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rab tu shes par byed pa'i dpe nye bar dgod pa khyod la bstan par bya'o/ /
138a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba ste/ 'gyur ba med cing lan du phan 'dogs pa la re ba med do/ /'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa yang byang chub
138a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba yin te/ 'gyur ba med cing lan du phan 'dogs par re ba med do/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na sa 'di skye bo kun gyi 'tsho/ /lan la mi re 'gyur ba
138b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa bzhin/ /byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sems gnas pa/ /rgyal mchog bla na med pa'i ye shes su/ /ma gyur bar du skye bo kun gyi 'tsho/ /lan la re ba med cing 'gyur ba med/ /bu dang dgra la yid kyis mtshungs par sems/ /
138b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mchog rab rtag par yongs su tshol/ /'od srung 'di lta ste dper na chu'i khams ni rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad skyed par byed do/ /'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa
138b3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byas te gnas pa yang sems can thams cad la dkar po'i chos thams cad skyed do/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na chu ni rtswa dang gel pa dang / /nags tshal
138b4(dkon brtsegs): sman dang 'bru'i rnam pa skyed/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' bsam dag pa/ /sems can mtha' yas byams pas khyab par byed/ /sna tshogs chos la khyab byas rim gyis su/ /dkar po'i chos kyis rnam par rgyas 'gyur zhing / /
138b5(dkon brtsegs): dpung bcas sde dang bcas pa'i bdud bcom nas/ /rim gyis rgyal ba'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper na me'i khams ni lo tog thams cad yongs su smin par byed do/ /'od srung de bzhin du byang chub
138b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i shes rab kyang sems can thams cad kyi dkar po'i chos thams cad yongs su smin par byed do/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na me ni rtswa dang sman rnams dang / /lo tog thams cad yongs su smin par byed/ /
138b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin bde gshegs sras kyi shes rab kyang / /skye bo rnams kyi dge ba'i chos smin byed/ /'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung gi khams ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam par sgrub bo/ /'od srung de bzhin du
138b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa yang sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par sgrub bo/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rlung ni sangs rgyas dgongs pa bzhin/ /
139a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sna tshogs zhing rnams rnam par sgrub/ /de bzhin rgyal sras rnams kyi thabs mkhas kyang / /bde gshegs gsungs pa'i chos mchog rnam par sgrub/ /'od srung 'di lta ste dper na bdud sdig can gyi dpung
