143b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags te/ gang sman des nad thams cad bskyod nas sman ltor mchis pa nyid ma byung na mi de'i bro nad shin tu tshabs che bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa 'od
144a1(dkon brtsegs): srung de bzhin du lta bar gyur pa thams cad las 'byung ba ni stong pa nyid yin na 'od srung gang stong pa nyid kho nar lta ba de ni gsor mi rung ngo zhes ngas bshad do/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /dper na sman pas nad ni
144a2(dkon brtsegs): bsal ba'i phyir/ /mi zhig la ni bkru sman btang ba las/ /nad rnams bskyod nas 'khrus par ma gyur na/ /de yi gzhi las nad ni sos mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin lta ba thibs por gnas pa las/ /'byung ba'i mchog ni stong pa nyid yin na/ /
144a3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig stong pa kho nar lta gyur pa/ /de ni gsor mi rung zhes rgyal bas gsungs/ /'od srung 'di lta ste dper na mi la la zhig nam mkhas 'jigs skrags nas brang rdung zhing ngu ste/ nam mkha' 'di sol/ nam mkha'
144a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di sol zhes de skad ces zer na 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ nam mkha' de bsal bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni rngo mi thog lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
144a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag stong pa nyid kyis skrag /rab tu skrag na de dag ni sems 'khrugs pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /zhes ngas bshad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung de dag ni stong pa
144a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid la spyod la de nyid kyis skrag pa'i phyir ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na nam mkhas 'jigs pas nyen pa'i mi/ /blun po nam mkha' 'di ni sol zhes zer/ /nam mkha' bsal bar nus pa
144a7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin yang / /rmongs pas byis pa dag ni de skad smra/ /de bzhin dge sbyong bram ze gang dag cig /stong pa nyid kyis skrag cing sems 'khrugs pa/ /byis pa de dag stong pa nyid spyod pa/ /stong pa nyid ni
144a8(dkon brtsegs): gang du 'ang gzhig mi nus/ /'od srung 'di lta ste dper na ri mo mkhan zhig gis bdag nyid kyi gnod sbyin gyi gzugs 'jigs 'jigs lta zhig bris nas de 'jigs skrag ste khas bub du 'gyel nas rgyal bar gyur pa
144b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du/ 'od srung byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang bdag nyid kyis byas pa'i gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams kyis 'khor ba na 'khor yang chos de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mi shes so/ /de la 'di
144b2(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bya ste/ /dper na ri mo mkhan zhig gis/ /gnod sbyin 'jigs pa'i gzugs byas nas/ /de yis 'jigs te khas bub tu/ /'gyel nas brgyal bar 'gyur ba ltar/ /byis pa so so'i skye bo kun/ /bdag nyid kyis ni byas pa
144b3(dkon brtsegs): yi/ /gzugs sgra la sogs rmongs gyur pas/ /'gro ba drug tu 'khyam par 'gyur/ /'od srung 'di lta ste/ /dper na mi sgyu ma mkhan zhig gis sgyu ma sprul pa sprul nas sprul pa des sgyu ma mkhan de nyid zos pa de bzhin du 'od srung dge
144b4(dkon brtsegs): slong rnal 'byor spyod pa yang gang dang gang yid la byed pa de thams cad de la gsog tu snang ngo / /gsob dang / stong pa dang / snying po med pa nyid du snang ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis mngon sprul pa/ /
144b5(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma byas pa de yis de zos ltar/ /rnal 'byor pas ni yid la gang byed pa/ /de ni de la gsog dang gsob tu snang / 'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper na shing gnyis rlung gis drud pa/ de las me byung ste/ byung nas shing de gnyis sreg pa
144b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du 'od srung yang dag par so sor rtog pa yod na 'phags pa shes rab kyi dbang po skye ste/ de skyes pas yang dag par so sor rtog pa de nyid sreg par byed do/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /dper na shing gnyis rlung gis drud pa las
144b7(dkon brtsegs): me byung nas ni de nyid sreg par byed/ /de bzhin shes rab dbang po skyes nas kyang / /so sor rtog pa de nyid sreg par byed/ /'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ mar me bus na mun pa mun gnag med par 'gyur yang mun pa mun gnag de gang nas
144b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su yang 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba med do/ /yang 'od srung mar me de 'di snyam du bdag gis mun pa mun gnag bsal lo snyam du mi sems mod kyi 'on kyang mar me la brten nas mun pa mun
145a1(dkon brtsegs): gnag med par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung de la mar me gang yin pa dang / mun pa mun gnag gang yin pa de gnyis ga stong pa ste/ gzung du med cing byed pa med do/ /'od srung de bzhin du ye shes skyes na mi shes pa med par
145a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur yang mi shes pa de gang nas kyang 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su yang 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba med do/ /yang 'od srung ye shes 'di snyam du bdag gis mi shes pa bsal lo snyam du mi
145a3(dkon brtsegs): sems mod kyi 'on kyang ye shes la brten nas mi shes pa med par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung de la ye shes gang yin pa dang / mi shes pa gang yin pa de gnyis ga stong pa ste gzung du med cing byed pa med do/ /de la 'di skad
145a4(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ dper na sgron mas mun pa mun gnag kun/ /med par gyur kyang 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med/ /de bzhin shes byung mi shes med 'gyur yang / /de ni gang nas 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med/ /sgron mas
145a5(dkon brtsegs): mun pa bsal snyam mi sems kyang / /snang ba byung nas mun pa med par 'gyur/ /stong pa gzung med nam mkha'i me tog 'dra/ /de bzhin ye shes mi shes gnyis ga stong / /'od srung 'di lta ste/
145a6(dkon brtsegs): dper na khyim dang / khang pa dang / khang phran lo 'bum 'das par sus kyang lan 'ga' yang mar me ma bus pa der mi la la zhig gis mar me bus na 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ mun pa mun gnag de
145a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du bdag ni lo 'bum du bsags pa yin te/ bdag 'di nas mi 'gro'o snyam du sems sam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni mi sems lags te/ mar me bus na mun pa mun gnag la mi 'chi ba'i
145a8(dkon brtsegs): mthu ma mchis kyi gdon mi 'tshal bar ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de bzhin du las dang nyon mongs pa bskal pa 'bum du bsags pa yang tshul bzhin du yid
145b1(dkon brtsegs): la byed pa'i so sor rtog pa gcig gis med par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung mar me zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po'i tshig bla dgas so/ /'od srung mun pa mun gnag ces bya ba de ni 'phags pa ma yin pa'i las
145b2(dkon brtsegs): dang nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla dgas so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /dper na khyim du mi 'ga' la la yis/ /ring zhing lon nas mar me bus byas na/ /de la mun pa bdag gnas ring lon gyis/ /'di nas mi 'gro snyam du sems
145b3(dkon brtsegs): pa med/ /mar me phyung na mun pa mun gnag la/ /med par mi 'gyur ba yi nus med de/ /mar me brten nas mun pa med par 'gyur/ /gnyis ga stong pa rlom sems ci yang med/ /de bzhin zag med 'phags pa'i ye shes
145b4(dkon brtsegs): brten/ /mi shes nyon mongs bsags pa med par 'gyur/ /ye shes dang ni nyon mongs rtag par yang / /de dag lan 'ga' tsam yang 'grogs pa med/ /ye shes mi shes med bya mi sems kyang / /ye shes brten nas
145b5(dkon brtsegs): mi shes med par 'gyur/ /gnyis ga gzung med nam mkha'i me tog bzhin/ /de bzhin ye shes mi shes gnyis ga stong / /'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la ni sa bon rnams mi skye'o/ /'od srung de bzhin du gang
145b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas las byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye ba ni ma byung mi 'byung ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mkha' las sa bon skye ba ni/ /'das dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar med/ /de bzhin 'dus ma
145b7(dkon brtsegs): byas las sangs rgyas chos/ /skye ba gang du 'ang ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur/ /'od srung 'di lta ste dper na lud kyis gang ba'i sa la ni sa bon thams cad skye'o/ /'od srung de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i lud kyis gang ba'i 'jig rten gnas pa las
145b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye'o de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na lud bcas rlan dang bcas pa la/ /sa bon skye yi dgon dung rnams la min/ /de bzhin nyon mongs log ldan skye bo la/ /rgyal sras rnams kyi rgyal ba'i
146a1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams skye/ /'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper na 'brog dgon pa dgon dung rnams na ni pad ma mi skye'o/ /'od srung de bzhin du gang 'dus ma byas la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye ba ni ma byung mi 'byung ngo / /
146a2(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na pad ma chu rdzing rnams na skye/ /dgon dung dag na nams kyang skye mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin 'dus ma byas la sangs rgyas chos/ /skye ba gang du'ang ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur/ /'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper na lud yod
146a3(dkon brtsegs): yod pa'i 'dam rdzab nas pad ma skye'o/ /'od srung de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i lud yod pa'i 'dam rdzab log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste dper na
146a4(dkon brtsegs): lud bcas 'dam rdzab chu las ni/ /pad ma skye yi thang las nam yang min/ /de bzhin nyon mongs log ldan skye bo la/ /rgyal sras rnams kyi rgyal ba'i chos rnams skye/ /'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po bzhi mar sar gyis
146a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gang bar gyur pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa blta bar bya'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rgya mtsho bzhi po mar sar gyis/ /yongs gang gtsang zhing kun nas yid du 'ong / /de bzhin
146a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' bde gshegs sras/ /dge ba'i klung gis rtag tu gang bar blta/ /'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper na mi la la zhig gis skra tshal pa brgyar gshags pa'i rtse mos rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las chu thigs pa
146a7(dkon brtsegs): gcig blangs pa de bzhin du 'od srung nyan thos kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa blta bar bya'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na chu yi phung po de las ni/ /skra tshal brgya'i rtse mos thigs blangs pa/ /de bzhin
146a8(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos rnams kyis dge byas pa'i/ /dge ba dag dang ldan par blta bar bya/ /'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper na yungs 'bru srin bus zos pa'i nang gi nam mkha' bzhin du nyan thos kyi 'dus ma byas shes pa blta bar bya'o/ /
146b1(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na yungs 'bru srin bus zos pa yi/ /nang gi nam mkha' de ni chung ba yin/ /nyan thos 'dus ma byas pa shes pa yang / /de bzhin chung zhing shin du chung bar blta/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na phyogs bcu'i
146b2(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha'i khams bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus ma byas shes pa blta bar bya'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad na/ /nam mkha'i khams ni sgrib pa med par 'dug /byang chub
146b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i 'dus ma byas shes pa/ /'gro ba kun gyi mchog kyang de ltar blta'o/ /'od srung 'di lta ste dper na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i btsun mo dam pa skyes pa/ dbul po dang nyal nas phyis
146b4(dkon brtsegs): de la bu byung bar gyur na/ 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ de rgyal po'i bu zhes bya 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de bzhin
146b5(dkon brtsegs): du nga'i nyan thos rnams chos kyi dbyings las skyes mod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras dbang bskur ba'i 'os shes mi bya'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rgyal po'i btsun mo yid 'ong ba/ /skyes pa dbul
146b6(dkon brtsegs): po dang ni nyal gyur te/ /de phyir de la bu byung gang yin pa/ /de ni rgyal po'i bu min dbang bskur min/ /de bzhin nyan thos 'dod chags bral gyur pa/ /de dag nga bu dbang bskur 'os ma yin/ /de ltar de dag bdag la phan phyir brtson/ /
146b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gzhan gnyis ga'i don byed sangs rgyas sras/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba bran mo ngan pa dang nyal ba de las de'i bu byung na/ 'od srung de bran mo ngan pa las byung du zin kyang de la
146b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i sras shes bya'o/ /'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa 'khor ba na 'khor zhing sems can rnams 'dul ba'i mthu ma thob tu zin kyang de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras shes bya'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste dper na 'khor los
147a1(dkon brtsegs): sgyur ba bran mo dang / /nyal bar gyur pa de las bu byung ba/ /bran mo las ni byung bar gyur kyang de/ /rgyal po'i sras shes 'jig rten zer ba ltar/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang po sems bskyed pa/ /srid pa gsum na 'khor
147a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing mthu chung ste/ /sbyin dang thabs kyis sems can mi 'dul yang / /sems can dag pa rgyal ba'i sras shes bya// // bam po gnyis pa/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la bu gzhon nu
147a3(dkon brtsegs): stobs che zhing mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa mthu rnyed pa stong yod par gyur la/ de dag gang yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i mtshan dang mi ldan na de la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i sras su 'du shes mi skyed pa de bzhin
147a4(dkon brtsegs): du/ 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs 'bring ba nyan thos bye ba brgya stong de dag gang yang byang chub sems dpar ma gyur na de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su 'du shes mi skyed do/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper
147a5(dkon brtsegs): na mi dbang rgyal po'i sras stong po/ /'ga' yang bu yi mtshan dang mi ldan/ /de phyir de dag gces byed mi nus pas/ /de la mi mchog bu yi 'du shes med/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas zhabs 'bring byed pa mang / /'ga' yang byang chub
147a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ma yin na/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' med phyir/ /de la bde gshegs sras su dgongs mi mdzad/ /'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du gzhon nu
147a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor los sgyur ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa chags nas zhag bdun lon te 'byung ba chen po mer mer por 'dug kyang shin du stobs dang ldan pas de la lha rnams re ba skyed kyi/ gzhon nu stobs che la mgyogs pa'i shugs dang
147a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan zhing mthu rnyed pa de dag la ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs mi 'chad par gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dbang po yongs su
147b1(dkon brtsegs): ma smin pa/ nyon mongs pa'i 'byung ba chen po mer mer por gyur pa 'khor ba na 'khor zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub pa yang shin du stobs dang ldan pas de la sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha rnams re
147b2(dkon brtsegs): ba skyed kyi/ dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa de dag la ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi 'chad par gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur
147b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i btsun mo mchog / de mngal bsod nams mtshan ldan sems can chags/ /stobs dang ldan pas lha rnams re ba skyed/ /gzhon nu mthu thob rnams la ma yin ltar/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtse gcig sems gnas shing / /
147b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bar gnas te byang chub tshol byed pa/ /de la lha dang klu rnams re ba skyed/ /rnam thar brgyad pos bsam gtan byed la min/ /'od srung 'di lta ste dper na nor bu rin po che bai dU r+ya gcig gis mching bu'i nor bu'i phung po ri rab
147b5(dkon brtsegs): tsam zil gyis gnon to/ /'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /de la 'di skad ce bya ste/ dper na 'od gsal rin chen bai dU r+ya/ /
147b6(dkon brtsegs): mching bu'i nor bu mang po zil gyis gnon/ /byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sems bskyed pas/ /nyan thos stong yang de ltar zil gyis gnon/ /'od srung 'di lta ste dper na bya ka la ping ka'i phru gu sgo nga'i sbubs
147b7(dkon brtsegs): na 'dug pa mig ma bye ba yang 'di lta ste/ zab cing snyan pa'i sgra skad kyis bya'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs
147b8(dkon brtsegs): na 'dug pa las dang nyon mongs pa'i mun pa dang rab rib kyi ling tog gis khebs par yang 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba'i sbyor ba'i sgra skad kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis
148a1(dkon brtsegs): gnon to/ /'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa las gzhon nu 'khor los sgyur ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa btsas ma thag tu tshong dpon dang / grong rdal gyi
148a2(dkon brtsegs): mi dang / yul gyi mi thams cad dang / rgyal phran thams cad phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po skyed pa la yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten phyag
148a3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo/ /de la 'di skad bya ste/ dper na sa bdag chen po rgyal po la/ /mtshan gyis lus spras bu zhig yod gyur na/ /gzhon nu de ni btsas par mthong ma thag /grong khyer mi dang rgyal phran thams cad
148a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dud/ /de bzhin byang chub sems ni bskyed ma thag /mtshan ldan rgyal ba'i sras po de la ni/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten phyag mtshal zhing / /dang ba'i sems kyis shin du gces par 'dzin/ /'od srung
148a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na ri'i rgyal po gangs ri la sman gang dag skyes pa de dag thams cad ni nga yir bya ba med/ ris su bcad pa med/ rnam par rtog pa med de/ nad gang la btang yang nad de rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /'od srung
148a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi sman gang yang dag par sgrub pa de thams cad rnam par mi rtog par sgrub cing / sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems kyis gso bar rab tu sbyor ro/ /de
148a7(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na ri rgyal gangs kyi ri bo la/ /sman skyes de dag mi rtog ngar 'dzin med/ /gang la btang ba de kun zhi bar byed/ /kha cig nad dang rga ba 'ang sel bar byed/ /de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po
148a8(dkon brtsegs): ye shes sman/ /yang dag sgrub pa 'ang rnam par rtog spangs nas/ /sems can phan phyir thams cad yang dag sgrub/ /snyoms pa'i sems kyis sems can gso bar byed/ /'od srung 'di lta ste dper na zla ba tshes
148b1(dkon brtsegs): pa la phyag 'tshal ba ltar nya ba la ni ma yin no/ /'od srung de bzhin du gang dag nga la rab tu dad pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag bya'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni de lta ma yin no/ /de
148b2(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa las ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ zla ba tshes la
148b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad phyag 'tshal gyi/ /zla ba nya la de ltar phyag mi 'tshal/ /de bzhin gang dag nga dad de dag gis/ /rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' phyag 'tshal cig /'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper na yi ge'i
148b4(dkon brtsegs): phyi mo rnams ni bstan bcos thams cad 'dzin pa shes pa'i sngon du 'gro'o/ /'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa yang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa dang / byin gyi brlabs
148b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad 'dzin pa'i ye shes bla na med pa'i sngon du 'gro'o/ /'od srung 'di lta ste dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor btang ste sus kyang skar ma'i gzugs la nam yang sngon phyag ma byas so/ /'od srung de bzhin du
148b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa'i snying rje chen po dang ldan pa nga'i bslab pa la zhugs pa btang ste nyan thos la nam yang phyag mi 'tshal lo/ /de la 'di skad ces
148b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ sus kyang zla ba rnam par spangs nas su/ /skar ma'i tshogs la nam yang phyag ma byas/ /de bzhin bslab pa la zhugs pa nam du yang / /nga sras btang ste nyan thos phyag mi 'tshal/ /'od srung 'di lta ste dper na lha
148b8(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mching bu'i nor bu byi dor byas kyang mching bu'i nor bu nam yang nor bu rin po che bai dU r+yar mi 'gyur ro/ /'od srung de bzhin du nyan thos tshul khrims dang / bslab pa dang / sbyangs
149a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad snyungs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang ldan yang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
149a2(dkon brtsegs): rgya bar nam yang mi 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/ /mching bu'i nor bu byi dor byas kyang ni/ /mching bu dag ste bai dU r+yar mi 'gyur/ /'di 'dra de nyid de yi rang
149a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin yin/ /de bzhin nyan thos khrims dang thos pa dang / /bsam gtan ldan zhing sbyangs pa kun ldan yang / /byang chub snying por 'dug ste bdud btul nas/ /byang chub reg ste bde gshegs 'gyur ba med/ /'od srung 'di lta
149a4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya byi dor byas na de kAr Sha pA Na brgya stong mang po 'byung ba'i sgor 'gyur ro/ /'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan byi dor byas na de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas brgya
149a5(dkon brtsegs): stong mang po 'byung ba'i sgor 'gyur ro/ /de la de skad ces bya ste/ rin chen bai dUr+ya ni sbyang byas na/ /kAr Sha pA Na mang po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas sras kyis sbyang byas na/ /nyan thos mang po 'byung
149a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sgor 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa 'od srung yul gang du srin bu rnga mo dung ka zhes bya ba mgo nag gan rkyal du nyal ba byung na
149a7(dkon brtsegs): yul de 'jigs pa dang bcas/ 'tshe ba dang bcas/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bcas/ 'khrug pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung gal te yul der byang chub sems dpa' byung na
149a8(dkon brtsegs): yul de 'jigs pa med pa dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don la
149b1(dkon brtsegs): brtson par bya ste/ des dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub nas sems can thams cad la gtang bar bya'o/ /ye shes kyi sman
149b2(dkon brtsegs): gang tshol ba des phyogs bzhir song ste sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i gso ba bya'o/ /yang dag pa'i gso bas sems can rnams gso bar bya'o/ /'od srung de la yang dag pa'i gso ba gang zhe na/
149b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags la mi sdug pa dang / zhe sdang la byams pa dang / gti mug la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang /
149b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma'i dmigs pa yid la byed pa thams cad la mtshan ma med pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / /gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad la gnas pa spang pa'i phyir
149b5(dkon brtsegs): smin pa med pa dang / phyin ci log thams cad spang ba'i phyir phyin ci ma log pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du
149b6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa la/ 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa la chos thams cad bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa la mya ngan las 'das pa zhi
149b7(dkon brtsegs): bas gso ba dang / lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos la gnas pa rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ste/ de la lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba can du gnas kyang lus kyi rjes su lta bas
149b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag tu lta bar mi ltung ba dang / tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba can du gnas kyang tshor ba'i rjes su lta bas bdag tu lta bar mi ltung ba dang / sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba can du
150a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyang sems kyi rjes su lta bas bdag tu lta bar mi ltung ba dang / chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba can du gnas kyang chos kyi rjes su lta bas bdag tu lta bar mi ltung bas gsog dang / yang
150a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par spong ba bzhis ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis ni lus dang sems la ril por 'dzin pa 'dor
150a3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lngas ni ma dad pa dang / le lo dang / brjed ngas pa dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / shes bzhin med pa rnams gso ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis ni chos la
150a4(dkon brtsegs): shin du rmongs shing mi shes pa gso ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ni 'chal pa'i shes rab dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad dang / lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams gso ba ste/ 'od
150a5(dkon brtsegs): srung 'di ni yang dag pa'i gso ba zhes bya'o/ /'od srung byang chub sems dpas gso ba 'di la bslab par brtson par bya'o/ /'od srung 'dzam bu'i gling na sman pa dang / sman pa'i slob ma ji snyed yod
150a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag gi nang na 'tsho byed ni mchog ces bya'o/ /'od srung gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed dang 'dra
150a7(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur kyang de dag la la zhig gis lta ba dang 'gyod pa la gnas pa gso ba'i sman gang yin zhes dris na/ de dag gis shes pa 'am/ bstan pa 'am/ bsgo bar mi nus so/ /'od srung de la byang chub
150a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas 'di snyam du bdag ni 'jig rten gyi sman tsam gyis chog par mi bya'i/ bdag gis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi sman yongs su btsal bar bya'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
150b1(dkon brtsegs): legs par yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o snyam du brtag par bya'o/ /de ltar brtags nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi sman gang tshol ba des phyogs bzhir song la sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i
150b2(dkon brtsegs): gso ba bya ste/ yang dag pa'i gso bas sems can rnams gso bar bya'o/ /'od srung de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi sman gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyu rkyen la 'jug pa shes pa dang / bdag med pa dang
150b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa'i chos rnams la mos pa'i shes pa dang / stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa'i chos rnams la mi sdang ba dang / sems can yongs su tshol
150b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i brtson 'grus so/ /de 'di ltar sems yongs su tshol te/ 'dod chags par 'gyur ba 'am/ zhe sdang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ gti mug par 'gyur ba'i sems de gang yin/ ces 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/
150b5(dkon brtsegs): da ltar byung ba zhig yin nam/ de la sems 'das pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa gang yin pa de ni ma phyin pa'o/ /da ltar byung ba ni gnas pa med do snyam mo/ /'od srung sems ni nang na yang med/ phyi
150b6(dkon brtsegs): rol na yang med/ gnyis ga med pa la yang mi dmigs so/ /'od srung sems ni dpyad du med pa/ bstan du med pa/ rten ma yin pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ gnas pa med pa'o/ /'od srung
150b7(dkon brtsegs): sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma gzigs mi gzigs/ gzigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /log par bzhugs pa'i 'du shes las chos rnams byung ba ma gtogs par sems ni sangs rgyas thams
150b8(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis kyang ma gzigs/ mi gzigs/ gzigs par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni rgyu ci 'dra bar blta zhe na/ 'od srung sems ni sgyu ma dang mtshungs te/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pas skye ba rnam pa
151a1(dkon brtsegs): mang po yongs su 'dzin to/ /'od srung sems ni 'bab chu'i rgyun dang mtshungs te/ mig gnas pa skyes nas 'jig cing 'jug pa'o/ /'od srung sems ni rlung dang mtshungs te/ ring du 'gro zhing gzung du med par rgyu
151a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'o/ /'od srung sems ni mar me'i 'od 'phro ba dang mtshungs te/ rgyu dang rkyen las 'byung ba'o/ /'od srung sems ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs te/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa glo bur ba rnams kyis nye bar nyon mongs pa'o/ /
151a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung sems ni glog dang mtshungs te/ skad cig tu 'jig cing mi gnas pa'o/ /'od srung sems ni spre'u dang mtshungs te/ yul thams cad 'dod pa'o/ /'od srung sems ni las rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed
151a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir ri mo mkhan dang mtshungs so/ /'od srung sems ni nyon mongs pa tha dad pa 'byung ba'i phyir mi gnas pa'o/ /'od srung sems ni gnyis pa mtshams sbyor ba med pa'i phyir gcig pu rgyu ste gnyis su med
151a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ /'od srung sems ni chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i phyir rgyal po dang mtshungs so/ /'od srung sems ni sdug bsngal thams cad skyed pa'i phyir mi mdza' ba dang mtshungs so/ /'od srung sems ni
151a6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'jig par byed pa'i phyir bye ma'i khang pa dang mtshungs so/ /'od srung sems ni mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa'i phyir zil pa dang mtshungs so/ /'od srung sems ni sdug bsngal
151a7(dkon brtsegs): la bde bar 'du shes pa'i phyir nya'i mchil pa dang mtshungs so/ /'od srung sems ni bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa'i phyir rmi lam dang mtshungs so/ /'od srung sems ni mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar 'du
151a8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i phyir sbrang ma sngon po dang mtshungs so/ /'od srung sems ni gnod pa rnam pa mang po byed pas phyir rgol ba dang mtshungs so/ /'od srung sems ni rtag tu klan ka tshol ba'i phyir gnod sbyin mdangs
151b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phrog pa dang mtshungs so/ /'od srung sems ni rtag tu glags lta bas dgra dang mtshungs so/ /'od srung sems ni rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang ldan pas rtag par mtho dma' can no/ /'od srung sems ni dge ba'i
151b2(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba thams cad rku bas chom rkun dang mtshungs so/ /'od srung sems ni gzugs la dga' bas phyi byi zhwa la'i mig dang mtshungs so/ /'od srung sems ni sgra la dga' bas g.yul gyi rnga dang mtshungs so/ /'od srung sems
151b3(dkon brtsegs): ni phag mi gtsang ba'i dri la dga' ba bzhin du dri la dga'o/ /'od srung sems ni ro la dga' bas zas kyi lhag ma za ba'i bran mo dang mtshungs so/ /'od srung sems ni reg pa la dga' bas sbrang ma 'bru mar gyi snod
151b4(dkon brtsegs): la chags pa dang mtshungs so/ /'od srung sems ni kun du btsal na mi rnyed do/ /gang mi rnyed pa de mi dmigs so/ /gang mi dmigs pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang
151b5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no/ /gang 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin pa de ni dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'o/ /gang dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pa de ni yod pa yang
151b6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin med pa yang ma yin no/ /gang yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin pa de ni ma skyes pa'o gang ma skyes pa de la ngo bo nyid med do/ /gang ngo bo nyid med pa de la 'byung ba med do/ /gang 'byung ba med pa de la
151b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa med do/ /gang 'gag pa med pa de la 'bral ba med do/ /gang 'bral ba med pa de la 'ong ba yang med/ 'gro ba yang med/ 'chi 'pho yang med/ skye ba yang med do/ /gang la 'ong ba yang med/ 'gro ba yang med/
151b8(dkon brtsegs): 'chi 'pho yang med/ skye ba yang med pa de la 'du byed gang yang med do/ /gang la 'du byed gang yang med pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /gang 'dus ma byas pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs so/ /'phags pa
152a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi rigs gang yin pa de la bslab pa yang med/ bslab pa las 'das pa yang med do/ /gang la bslab pa yang med/ bslab pa las 'das pa yang med pa de la rgyu ba yang med/ mi rgyu ba yang med/
152a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rgyu ba yang med pa gang la rgyu ba yang med/ mi rgyu ba yang med/ rab tu rgyu ba yang med pa de la sems kyang med/ sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang med do/ /gang la sems kyang med/ sems las byung ba'i chos rnams
152a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang med pa de la las kyang med/ las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med do/ /gang la las kyang med/ las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med pa de la bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal yang med do/ /gang la bde ba yang med/ sdug pa
152a4(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba yang med pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs te/ 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs gang yin pa de la ni las kyang med/ las mngon par 'du byed pa yang med do/ /gang la las kyang med/ las mngon par 'du byed
152a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang med pa'i rigs de la ni lus kyi las byed pa med do/ /ngag gis ma yin/ yid kyis ma yin no/ /rigs de la tha ma dang 'bring dang mchog tu rnam par gzhag pa yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs de ni nam mkha'
152a6(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshungs pa'i phyir mnyam pa'o/ /rigs de ni chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir khyad par med pa'o/ /rigs de ni lus dang sems dben pa'i phyir dben pa'o/ /rigs de ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'thun pa'o/ /rigs
152a7(dkon brtsegs): de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir dri ma med pa'o/ /rigs de ni ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pas nga'i ba med pa'o/ /rigs de ni yang dag pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa mnyam pa las byung ba
152a8(dkon brtsegs): ste/ mi mnyam pa med pa'o/ /rigs de ni don dam pa'i bden pa yin pas bden pa'o/ /rigs de ni gtan du mi skye ba'i phyir mi zad pa'o/ /rigs de ni rtag tu chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi phyir rtag pa'o/ /
152b1(dkon brtsegs): rigs de ni mya ngan las 'das pa mchog gi phyir bde ba'o/ /rigs de ni rnam pa thams cad du dri ma med pa'i phyir dge ba'o/ /rigs de ni bdag yongs su btsal te ma rnyed pa'i phyir bdag med do/ /rigs de ni rab tu
152b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o/ /'od srung nang du yongs su tshol la phyi rol du ma rgyu shig /'od srung ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong khyi rdo la snyegs pa dang mtshungs pa dag 'byung ngo / /'od srung ji ltar na dge slong
152b3(dkon brtsegs): khyi rdo la snyegs pa dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na khyi ni rdos 'jigs la rdo de nyid kyi phyir snyegs kyi rdo de sus 'phangs pa de la ni mi snyegs so/ /'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong dang bram ze kha
152b4(dkon brtsegs): cig gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg byas 'jigs shing skrag nas dgon pa'i gnas rnams na gnas shing de dag de na gcig pu gnyis su med par lus rab tu dben par 'dug
152b5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ chags par 'gyur ba'i gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams snang bar gyur na de dag de la btang snyoms su 'jog cing bsod nyams su sbyor ba dang ldan par gnas kyi nang du so sor rtog
152b6(dkon brtsegs): pa la mngon par brtson te/ de dag gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams las cis 'byung ba mi shes shing khong du mi chud do/ /de dag gis de ma shes khong du ma chud pas grong dang grong khyer
152b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu song na yang gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams kyis gnod pa 'gyur ro/ /gal te de dag dgon pa na gnas
152b8(dkon brtsegs): pa las 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na 'jig rten pa'i sdom pa la gnas pa de dag mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te/ der yang de dag lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis gnod par 'gyur ro/ /
153a1(dkon brtsegs): ro/ /de dag de nas shi 'phos nas ngan song bzhi las yongs su ma grol bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma
153a2(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /'od srung de ltar na dge slong khyi rdo la snyegs pa dang / mtshungs pa dag yin no/ /'od srung ji ltar na khyi rdo la snyegs pa dang mi 'dra ba yin zhe na/ 'od srung gang gshe yang slar mi gshe/ khros kyang slar mi khro/ mtshang brus kyang
153a3(dkon brtsegs): slar mtshang mi 'dru/ brdegs kyang slar mi rdeg /bsdigs kyang slar mi sdigs/ smad kyang slar mi smod cing nang du sems la so sor rtog ste/ 'di la gshe ba 'am/ khros pa 'am/ brdegs pa 'am/ bsdigs pa 'am/ smad
153a4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ mtshang brus pa de dag gang yin snyam du so sor rtog pa'o/ /'od srung de ltar na dge slong khyi rdo la snyegs pa dang mi 'dra ba yin no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na khyi ni rdo bas skrag gyur kyang / /sus 'phangs
153a5(dkon brtsegs): mi snyegs rdo la snyegs par byed/ /de bzhin dge sbyong bram ze la la dag /gzugs la sogs pas skrag nas dgon par gnas/ /de dag dgon par gnas gyur kyang / /gzugs la sogs pa sdug pa mthong
153a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ /btang snyoms 'jog cing nang gi tshul mi shes/ /de yi nyes las byung ba gang yin pa/ /mi shes pas na slar yang grong du gnas/ /gzugs la sogs pas der yang gnod par 'gyur/ /'dir yang lha yi longs
153a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod spyad gyur te/ /lha dang mi las kha cig gi 'phos nas/ /de dag ngan song sar ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /blun po de dag shi 'phos sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /de ltar sdug bsngal brgya ldan de dag ni/ /khyi rdo snyegs pa 'dra zhes
153a8(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs gsungs/ /spyos kyang mig gshe brdegs kyang mi rdeg dang / /su zhig smad kyang smod par mi byed dang / /de bzhin mtshang brus mtshang 'dru mi byed dang / /khros kyang des pa khro bar mi byed cing / /nang
153b1(dkon brtsegs): gi sems kyi gnyen por gyur pa dag / tshol zhing yid zhi dran dang ldan gyur pa/ /de 'dra'i tshul khrims brtul bzhugs ldan pa ni/ /rdo snyegs khyi mi 'dra zhes rgyal bas gsungs/ /'od srung 'di lta ste dper na rta'i 'dul
153b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyong la mkhas pas rta de gang dang gang du g.yo byed cing ma byang ba de dang de rab tu sbyong ngo / /'od srung de bzhin du dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa yang gang dang gang du sems 'gyur bar mthong ba de dang der rab tu spyod pa la
153b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug ste/ de ci nas phyis 'khrug par mi 'gyur ba de ltar sems rab tu 'chos so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rta yi 'dul sbyong mkhas pa zhig /byang zhing g.yo med tshul du rab tu 'dul/ /rnal 'byor
153b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang sems ni 'gyur mthong nas/ /ji ltar phyis 'khrug mi 'gyur de ltar 'chos/ /'od srung 'di lta ste dper na klog nad lha 'or gyis ni srog gi dbang po 'gag par byed do/ /'od srung de bzhin du lta bar gyur pa
153b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi nang na bdag tu 'dzin pa ni chos kyi srog gi dbang po 'gag par byed pa'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na lha 'or srog gi dbang po la/ /gnod cing de la bde ba sbyin pa min/ /de bzhin lta gyur nang
153b6(dkon brtsegs): na bdag lta ba/ /de ni chos srog rnam par 'jig par byed/ /'od srung 'di lta ste dper na mi ni gang dang gang du bcings pa de dang de nyid las dgrol bar bya ba yin no/ /'od srung de bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i
153b7(dkon brtsegs): sems gang dang gang la chags pa de dang de las dgrol bar bya ba yin no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mi ni gang du bcings gyur pa/ /de dang de las dgrol bar bya ba yin/ /de bzhin sems rmongs gang
153b8(dkon brtsegs): dang gar chags pa/ /rnal 'byor pas ni de dang de las dgrol/ /'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i nam mkha' la yongs su chags pa ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gsang tshig
154a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su tshol ba dang / lhung bzed dang chos gos lhag par 'chang ba ste/ 'di gnyis so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'jig rten rgyang pan goms byed brtson pa dang / /lhung bzed chos gos lhag
154a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'chang byed pa/ /'di gnyis nam mkha' la ni chags pa ste/ /de dag byang chub sems dpas spang par bya/ /'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i 'ching ba dam po ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ lta bar gyur pa'i
154a3(dkon brtsegs): 'ching ba dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa'i 'ching ba ste/ 'di gnyis so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lta gyur 'ching dang rnyed dang bkur sti dang / /grags pa'i 'ching ba rab tu byung ba yi/ /'ching ba dam
154a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes 'phags pa rnams kyis gsungs/ /de dag rtag tu rab tu byung bas spong / /'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i bar du gcod pa'i chos te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ khyim pa'i phyogs la sten pa dang / 'phags pa'i
154a5(dkon brtsegs): phyogs la smod par sems pa ste 'di gnyis so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ khyim pa'i phyogs la sten par byed pa dang / /'phags pa'i phyogs la rnam par smod byed pa/ /'di gnyis rab byung bar chad bgegs byed
154a6(dkon brtsegs): yin/ /byang chub sems dpas de dag rnam par spang / /'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i dri ma ste/ /gnyis gang zhe na/ nyon mongs pa la mi mjed pa dang / mdza' bo'i khyim dang zas ster ba'i khyim yongs su 'dzin
154a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ste 'di gnyis so/ /de la 'di skad bya ste/ rab tu byung ba'i nyon mongs mi mjed dang / /mdza' bo'i khyim dang zas ster khyim sten pa/ /de gnyis dri mar rgyal ba'i dbang pos gsungs/ /byang chub sems dpas
154a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag rnam par spang / 'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i ser ba 'bab pa ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ dam pa'i chos spong ba'i chos spong pa dang / tshul khrims las nyams kyang dang bas sbyin pa yongs su spyod pa
154b1(dkon brtsegs): ste 'di gnyis so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dam pa'i chos ni spong pa dang / /tshul khrims nyams kyang spyod pa ste/ /ser ba 'bab pa 'di gnyis ni/ /rgyal sras rnams kyis spang bar bya/ /'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab
154b2(dkon brtsegs): tu byung ba'i rma yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ pha rol gyi nyes pa la so sor rtog pa dang / bdag gi nyes pa 'chab pa ste 'di gnyis so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bdag gi skyon ni 'chab byed dang / /pha rol nyes la rtogs byed pa/ /
154b3(dkon brtsegs): de gnyis dug gi me dang 'dra/ /rtogs pa rnams kyi rma 'di spang / /'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i yongs su gdung ba ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ rnyog pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis ngur smrig 'chang ba dang / tshul
154b4(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa las bsnyen bkur dang rim gror bya ba bdag gir byed pa ste 'di gnyis so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rnyog dang bcas pa'i sems kyis ngur smrig 'chang ba dang / /bsnyen
154b5(dkon brtsegs): bkur rim gro byed dang gus par smra ba dag / tshul khrims ldan pa rnams la sten par byed pa ste/ /chos gnyis 'di dag yongs su spang bar bya ba yin/ 'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i zug rngu ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/
154b6(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa'i gzhi las 'gal ba dang / snying po ma blangs par 'chi ba'i dus byed pa ste gnyis so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bslab pa'i gzhi las 'gal bar gyur pa dang / /snying po ma blangs par ni dus byed pa/ /
154b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di gnyis rab tu byung ba'i zug rngu zhes/ /lha mi'i ston pa thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs// // bam po gsum pa/ 'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i nad gsor mi rung ba ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ mngon pa'i
154b8(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal gyis sems nges par sems pa dang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i gang zag rnams kyi 'dun pa zlog pa ste 'di gnyis so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal sems la nges
155a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dang / /sangs rgyas theg pa las ni 'dun pa zlog /'di gnyis rab tu byung ba'i nad yin zhes/ /gang zag mtshungs pa med pa'i rgyal bas gsungs/ /'od srung dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya ba ji
155a2(dkon brtsegs): tsam gyis na dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya zhe na/ 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni dge sbyong ste/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ kha dog dang rtags dang dbyibs kyi dge sbyong dang / cho ga srung zhing tshul 'chos pa'i dge sbyong dang / brjod pa'i
155a3(dkon brtsegs): sgra tshigs su bcad pa'i dge sbyong dang / yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong ngo / /'od srung de la kha dog dang rtags dang dbyibs kyi dge sbyong gang zhe na/ 'od srung 'di la dge sbyong kha cig kha dog dang rtags dang dbyibs dang
155a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gyur te/ chos gos snam sbyar gyon cing mgo bregs te/ lag na lhung bzed thogs mod kyi lus kyi las yongs su ma dag par spyod/ ngag gi las yongs su ma dag par spyod/ yid kyi las yongs su ma dag par
155a5(dkon brtsegs): spyod cing ma dul ba ma zhi ba/ ma bsrungs pa/ ma byang ba/ 'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa/ brkam pa/ le lo can/ tshul khrims 'chal pa/ sdig pa'i las chos can yin te/ 'od srung de ni kha dog dang rtags dang
155a6(dkon brtsegs): dbyibs kyi dge sbyong zhes bya'o/ /'od srung de la cho ga srung zhing tshul 'chos pa'i dge sbyong gang zhe na/ 'od srung 'di la dge sbyong kha cig cho ga dang / spyod yul dang / spyod pa phun sum tshogs shing spyod lam
155a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhir shes bzhin du spyod la/ zas dang skom ngan pa za 'thung / 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi po dag gis chog par 'dzin/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la mngon par dga'/ khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba
155a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang mi 'drel tshig nyung zhing smra ba nyung mod kyi de'i spyod la de dag kyang tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag gis yongs su brtags pa yin te/ sems yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ma yin
155b1(dkon brtsegs): dul bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin gyi/ dmigs par lta ba yin te/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas shing stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa'i chos rnams la g.yang
155b2(dkon brtsegs): sar 'du shes pa yin/ stong pa nyid smra ba'i dge slong rnams la yang dgrar 'du shes pa yin te/ 'od srung de ni cho ga srung zhing tshul 'chos pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o/ /'od srung de la brjod pa'i sgra tshigs su
155b3(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa'i dge sbyong gang zhe na/ 'od srung 'di la dge sbyong kha cig ji ltar bdag tshul khrims dang ldan par gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur snyam du so sor brtags nas tshul khrims srung / ji ltar mang du thos par
155b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur snyam du so sor brtags nas thos pa 'dzin/ ji ltar bdag dgon par gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur snyam du so sor brtags nas dgon pa la gnas shing so sor brtags nas
155b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa nyung la chog shes pa dang / rab tu dben par gyur te/ 'di ltar gzhan la bstan pa'i phyir yin gyi skyo bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'gog par bya ba'i
155b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir ma yin nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i yin phyir ma yin/ dge sbyong gi phyir ma yin/ tshangs pa'i phyir ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ma yin te/ 'od srung de ni brjod
155b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o/ /'od srung de la yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong gang zhe na/ 'od srung gang lus dang srog la yang mi lta ba yin na rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su
155b8(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa la lta ci smos/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams thos nas dga' zhing de bzhin nyid du zhugs pa yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa la yang 'dod pa med par spyad pa spyod na
156a1(dkon brtsegs): khams gsum pa la mngon par dga' ba lta ci smos/ stong pa nyid du lta ba yang mi 'dod pa yin na/ bdag dang sems can dang srog dang skye ba po dang gso ba dang skyes bu dang gang zag tu lta ba lta ci
156a2(dkon brtsegs): smos/ don la rton gyi tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin/ nyon mongs pa rnams las rnam par thar pa nang du tshol gyi phyi rol du rgyug pa ma yin/ chos thams cad shin tu yongs su dag cing rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs
156a3(dkon brtsegs): pa med par mthong bas bdag nyid skyabs yin gyi/ gzhan skyabs ma yin/ de de bzhin gshegs pa la chos nyid du yang mi lta na gzugs kyi skur lta ci smos/ chos la 'dod chags dang bral bar yang mi lta na smra ba'i
156a4(dkon brtsegs): tshig gi lam nas brjod par lta ci smos/ 'phags pa 'dus ma byas pa'i dge 'dun la yang rnam par mi rtog na mang po 'dus par lta ci smos/ chos gang spang bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa ma yin/
156a5(dkon brtsegs): bsgom par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'khor bar yang mi skye/ mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mngon par dga' ba ma yin/ thar pa yang mi dmigs
156a6(dkon brtsegs): so/ /bcing ba yang ma yin la chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par rig nas kun du mi 'khor/ yongs su mya ngan la mi 'da' ba yin te/ 'od
156a7(dkon brtsegs): srung de ni yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o/ /'od srung yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong du 'gyur par brtson par bya'i ming gis gnod par mi bya ste/ 'od srung dge sbyong
156a8(dkon brtsegs): ni bzhi po de dag go/ /de la 'di skad ces ste/ gang zhig lus dang ngag dang sems ma dag /ma dul ma bsrungs ma byang 'dod chen can/ /mgo bregs chos gos lhung bzed lag na
156b1(dkon brtsegs): thogs/ /de ni dbyibs rtags dge sbyong yin zhes bstan/ cho ga spyod pa la sogs ldan gyur cing / /kha zas zan za tshul 'chos la sogs sten/ /'du 'dzi rgyang ring yongs su spong byed cing / /
156b2(dkon brtsegs): spyod lam 'phags pa'i rigs dang ldan gyur kyang / /de'i de kun dul bar bya phyir min/ /zhi phyir ma yin skyo bar bya phyir min/ /stod pa mtshan med g.yang sar 'du shes pa/ /cho ga srung zhing tshul 'chos
156b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa yin/ /tshul khrims ting 'dzin sbyangs pa'i yon tan thos/ /gzhan dag ngo mtshar 'dzin du gzhug phyir byed/ /zhi phyir ma yin skyo bar bya phyir min/ /brjod dang grags 'dod dge sbyong gsum
156b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ /gang zhig lus srog don du mi gnyer zhing / /rnyed dang bkur sti la ni rgyab kyis phyogs/ /rnam par thar pa bskyed pa'i sgo thos nas/ /srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad don mi gnyer/ /
156b5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams shin du stong par yongs brtags nas/ /mya ngan 'das dang ma 'das mthong mi 'gyur/ /chos la 'dod chags bral bar rtag tu rtog /ma byas chos rtogs mya ngan 'das par
156b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper na mi dbul po zhig la/ mdzod 'byor pa zhes ming btags na/ 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi dbul po de dang ming de 'thun pa yin nam/
156b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de bzhin du/ gang dge sbyong dang / bram ze gang dag dge sbyong dang / bram ze'i
156b8(dkon brtsegs): yon tan dang mi ldan pa de dag ni/ /gsung rab 'di la mi dbul po zhes ngas bshad do/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na dbul por gyur pa'i mi zhig la/ /mdzod ldan ming btags de la mdzes ma yin/ /
157a1(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong nyams la dge sbyong ming mi mdzes/ /dbul la phyug ces btags pa'i dpe dang mtshungs/ /'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper mi la la zhig rgya mtsho'i chu chen pos khyer la chus skom bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus
157a2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de bzhin du 'od srung 'di la dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig chos mang po blangs te kun chub par byas kyang 'dod chags la sred pa mi sel/ zhe sdang la sred pa mi sel/ gti mug la sred pa mi sel pa de dag chos kyi rgya mtshos
157a3(dkon brtsegs): khyer la/ nyon mongs pa'i skom pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mi zhig rgya mtsho'i chus khyer la/ /de ni skom bzhin 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur/ /de bzhin chos
157a4(dkon brtsegs): mang sred pas bag med pa/ /chos kyi rgya mtshor gnas kyang ngan song 'gro/ /'od srung 'di lta ste dper na sman pa sman sgro thogs te/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su rgyu ba de nad cig gis btab nas nad de gso mi nus na de'i sman
157a5(dkon brtsegs): de ni don med pa yin no/ /'od srung de bzhin du mang du thos pas nyon mongs pa'i nad du blta ste/ gang mang du thos pa des bdag nyon mongs pa'i nad las gso mi nus na de'i mang du thos pa de ni don med pa yin no/ /de la 'di skad
157a6(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ dper na sman pa'i sman sgror bcug pa'i sman/ /'jig rten kun du yongs su rgyu byed kyang / /nad kyis btab pa bzlog par mi nus na/ /de yi sman de don med gyur pa yin/ /de bzhin dge slong tshul khrims yon tan
157a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan/ /thos dang ldan yang tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i/ /nyon mongs byung ba'i nad de mi sel na/ /de yin thos la brtson pa don med yin/ /'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper na mi nad pa zhig la rgyal po la 'os pa'i sman btang la cho
157a8(dkon brtsegs): ga bzhin ma byas pas 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de bzhin du 'od srung gang mi sdom pa des 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de yang mang du thos pa'i nyon mongs pa'i nad du blta'o/ /de la 'di skad bya ste/ dper na rgyal po 'os pa'i
157b1(dkon brtsegs): sman btang nas/ /cho ga ma byas ming shi bar gyur/ /de bzhin gang mi sdom pas 'dir shi ba/ /de ni mang du thos pa'i nyon mongs nad/ /'od srung 'di lta ste dper na nor bu rin po che mi gtsang ba'i nang du lhung na smad par 'gyur zhing
157b2(dkon brtsegs): mkho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'od srung de bzhin mang du thos pa rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i mi gtsang ba'i nang du lhung bar blta ste/ ci yang med pa la ni lha dang mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rin chen
157b3(dkon brtsegs): mi gtsang lhung ba smad/ /ji ltar sngon bzhin de ni phyis ma yin/ /dge slong mang du thos par gyur pa yang / /bkur sti'i mi gtsang lhung ba de 'drar bshad/ /'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper na mi ro'i mgo la gser gyi phreng ba btags
157b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin du tshul khrims 'chal ba ngur smrig gyon par blta'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mi ro mgo la gser phreng ngam/ /yang na me tog phreng ba btags byas pa/ /de bzhin tshul khrims med ngur smrig gyon
157b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang / /mthong nas de la yid ni dang mi 'gyur/ /'od srung 'di lta ste dper na tshong dpon gyi bu zhig legs par khrus byas te/ legs par rnam par byugs la/ skra dang sen mo bregs nas gos dkar po bgos
157b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ tsan dan mchog gis bskus pa'i mgo la tsam pa ka'i me tog gi phreng ba thogs pa de bzhin du 'od srung tshul khrims dang ldan zhing mang du thos pa ngur smrig gyon par blta'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ legs
157b7(dkon brtsegs): bkrus legs par byugs pa yi/ /tshong dpon bu yi mgo bo la/ /tsam pa ka yi me tog phreng / /dri zhim yid 'ong btags pa mdzes/ /de bzhin tshul khrims ldan gyur cing / /mang thos tshul khrims phun sum tshogs/ /rgyal
157b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sras po yon tan ldan/ /de la ngur smrig de bzhin mdzes/ /'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni tshul khrims 'chal ba tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'od srung 'di la dge slong kha cig tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin te
158a1(dkon brtsegs): so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams shing gnas/ cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs/ kha na ma tho ba phra rab rnams la 'jigs par lta/ yang dag par blangs te bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la slob cing lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las
158a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag pa dang ldan par gnas pas 'tsho ba yongs su dag kyang de bdag tu smra ba yin te/ 'od srung de ni tshul khrims 'chal ba tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa dang po'o/ /'od srung gzhan yang 'di la dge slong kha cig 'dul
158a3(dkon brtsegs): ba 'dzin cing 'dul ba la zhugs te/ 'dul ba'i tshul la gnas pa yin yang 'jig tshogs la lta ba las ma bskyed pa yin te/ 'od srung de ni tshul khrims 'chal ba tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa gnyis pa'o/ /'od srung gzhan yang 'di la/ dge
158a4(dkon brtsegs): slong kha cig byams pa la gnas pa yin te/ sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa yin yang 'du byed thams cad la skye ba med pa thos nas skrag ste kun du dngang bar 'gyur zhing kun du rab dngang bar 'gyur ba de ni 'od srung
158a5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims 'chal ba tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa gsum pa'o/ /'od srung gzhan yang 'di la dge slong kha cig sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis yang dag par blangs kyang dmigs par lta ba yin te/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / ngar yir 'dzin
158a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas pa de ni 'od srung tshul khrims 'chal ba tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa bzhi pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims 'chal ba tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa yin no/ /'od srung tshul khrims tshul khrims shes bya
158a7(dkon brtsegs): ba ni gang la bdag med pa dang / bdag gi ba med pa dang / bya ba med pa dang / mi bya ba yang med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / byed pa med pa yang ma yin pa dang / rgyu ba ma yin pa dang / mi rgyu ba ma yin pa dang / rab tu spyod pa
158a8(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / rab tu spyod pa med pa yang ma yin pa dang / ming med pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa yang ma yin pa dang / rab tu zhi ba ma yin pa dang / rab tu zhi ba ma yin pa yang ma yin pa dang / 'dzin
158b1(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / 'dor ba med pa dang / gzung ba med pa dang / gzung ba med pa yang ma yin pa dang / sems can med pa dang / sems can du 'dogs pa med pa dang / tshig med pa dang / tshig tu 'dogs pa med pa dang / sems med pa dang / sems
158b2(dkon brtsegs): su 'dogs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten med pa dang / 'jig rten med pa yang ma yin pa dang / rten med pa dang / rten med pa yang ma yin pa dang / bdag gi tshul khrims la mi stod pa dang / gzhan gyi tshul khrims la mi smod pa dang / tshul khrims
158b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / tshul khrims la mi rtog pa yin te/ de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi tshul khrims zag pa med pa dang / gtogs pa ma yin pa/ khams gsum pa dang bral ba/ rten thams cad med pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom
158b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /tshul khrims ldan la dri ma med cing ci yang med/ /tshul khrims ldan la rgyags pa med de rten pa med/ /tshul khrims ldan la mun pa med cing 'ching ba med/ /
158b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims ldan la rdul rnams med de nyes pa med/ /zhi ba rab tu zhi ba nyer bar zhi ba'i yid/ /rtog dang rnam par rtog dang bral zhing nyon mongs med/ /g.yo ba dang ni rlom sems kun dang rnam bral ba/
158b6(dkon brtsegs): de ni 'od srung sangs rgyas bstan la tshul khrims ldan/ /lus la mi lta srog la phangs par 'dzin mi byed/ /srid pa rnams su skye ba kun la 'dod pa med/ /yang dag zhugs shing de nyid tshul la rab gnas pa/ /
158b7(dkon brtsegs): de ni 'od srung sangs rgyas bstan la tshul khrims ldan/ /'jig rten ma gos 'jig rten dag la gnas pa med/ /snang ba thob cing bdag gi med de ci yang med/ /bdag tu 'du shes med cing gzhan du 'du shes med/ /'du shes yongs su shes pas tshul
158b8(dkon brtsegs): khrims rnam par dag / gang la tshu rol med cing pha rol dbus kyang med/ /pha rol tshu rol dag la nams kyang mi chags shing / bcings dang chags med tshul 'chos med cing zag pa med/ /de ni 'od srung sangs rgyas bstan la tshul
159a1(dkon brtsegs): khrims ldan/ /ming dang gzugs rnams la yang chags pa med pa'i yid/ /de ni mnyam par bzhag cing shin du dul ba'i sems/ /gang la bdag med bdag gir 'dzin pa med pa ni/ /de tsam gyis na tshul khrims gnas shes brjod pa yin/ /so sor
159a2(dkon brtsegs): thar pa'i slob pas rlom sems byed pa med/ /des ni 'di na de la chags par mi 'gyur te/ /de yi gong du 'phags pa'i lam rnams tshol byed pa/ /de ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mtshan ma'o/ /tshul khrims gtso bor ma yin ting 'dzin der chags med/ /de
159a3(dkon brtsegs): yi gong du shes rab bsgom pa yongs su tshol/ /dmigs pa med pa 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs yin te/ /tshul khrims de ni bde bar gshegs pas rab tu bsngags/ /'jig pa'i tshogs la lta las rnam par grol ba'i yid/ /de 'dir nga dang nga yi snyam
159a4(dkon brtsegs): du 'gyur ba med/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul stong pa nyid la lhag par mos/ /de yi tshul khrims de ni mnyam pa med pa'o/ /tshul khrims la ni gnas nas ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams thob nas shes rab shin du sgom/ /shes rab kyis ni
159a5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes rnam par 'thob/ /ye shes rnam par dag pas tshul khrims phun sum tshogs/ /tshigs su bcad pa mngon par sgrub pa 'di dag gsungs pa'i tshe dge slong brgyad brgya ni len pa med pa zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /
159a6(dkon brtsegs): srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go/ dge slong bsam gtan thob pa lnga brgya ni chos bstan pa zab mo 'di la mi 'jug ste/ ma rtogs ma mos pas stan las langs te dong ngo / /
159a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong bsam gtan thob pa lnga brgya po 'di dag chos bstan pa zab mo la mi 'jug ste/ ma rtogs ma mos pas stan las langs te mchis
159a8(dkon brtsegs): so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung 'di ltar dge slong mngon pa'i nga rgyal can dag ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa zag pa med pa 'di la 'jug ste/ ma rtogs ma mos shing skrag ste kun du dngangs/
159b1(dkon brtsegs): kun du rab tu dngangs so/ /'od srung tshigs su bcad pa mngon par sgrub pa zab pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub zab ste/ de la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/ sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa dang / mos
159b2(dkon brtsegs): pa mi mang ba dag gis mos par mi nus so/ /'od srung dge slong lnga brgya po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi gsung rab la mu stegs can gyi nyan thos su gyur te de dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung las brgal pa'i bsam
159b3(dkon brtsegs): pas chos bstan pa gcig thos so/ /thos nas dang ba'i sems gcig rnyed de/ ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'jam zhing snyan par gsung pa ngo mtshar to snyam mo/ /
159b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas dang ba'i sems gcig rnyed pa des sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ /de dag de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes te/ rgyu de nyid kyis nga'i bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ste/ 'od srung dge slong
159b5(dkon brtsegs): lnga brgya po lta bar bying ba 'di dag ni chos bstan pa zab mo 'di la mi 'jug ste/ ma rtogs ma mos shing skrag ste/ kun du dngangs/ kun du rab tu dngangs so/ /yang 'di dag ni chos bstan pa 'dis yongs su sbyang ba byas te phyis
159b6(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'gro log par ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing phung po 'di dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod song la dge slong de dag kun shes par byos
159b7(dkon brtsegs): shig / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis 'di dag la bshad na yang 'thun par mi bgyid na bdag la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag lam gang nas 'dong ba'i
159b8(dkon brtsegs): lam der dge slong gnyis shig sprul pa sprul to/ /de nas dge slong lnga brgya po de dag sprul pa'i dge slong de gnyis lam gang nas 'dong ba'i lam der dong ste phyin pa dang / 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag
160a1(dkon brtsegs): gar 'dong / de gnyis kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag ni dgon pa'i gnas rnams su bsam gtan gyi bde ba la reg par gnas par bya bar 'dong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kho bo cag ni bcom ldan 'das
160a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos bstan pa gang yin pa'i chos bstan pa de la mi 'jug ste/ ma rtogs ma mos shing skrag ste/ kun du dngangs/ kun du rab tu dngangs par gyur nas kho bo cag dgon pa'i gnas rnams su bsam gtan gyi bde
160a3(dkon brtsegs): ba la reg par gnas pa rnams kyis gnas par bya'o/ /dge slong lnga brgya po de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad pa la mi 'jug ste/ ma rtogs
160a4(dkon brtsegs): ma mos shing skrag ste/ kun tu dngangs ste/ kun tu dngangs/ kun du rab tu dngangs par gyur ro/ /de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang dgon pa'i gnas rnams su bsam gtan gyi bde ba la reg par gnas pa rnams kyis gnas par bya'o/ /sprul pa dag gis smras pa/
160a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa dag de'i phyir bdag cag yang dag par 'gro bar bya'o/ /rtsod par mi bya'o/ /rtsod pa med pa lhur len pa ni dge sbyong gi chos so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag gang 'di yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba gang / yongs su mya ngan
160a6(dkon brtsegs): las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i chos de gang / lus 'di la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba po 'am/ skyes bu 'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes sam/ shed bu 'am/ gang yongs su mya ngan 'das 'da' bar
160a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ gang zad pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'dod chags zad/ zhe sdang zad/ gti mug zad pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /sprul pa gnyis kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dod chags
160a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug yod pa yin nam/ ci nas de zad par bya/ de dag gis smras pa/ de dag ni nang na yang med/ phyi rol na yang med/ gnyis ga med pa la yang mi dmigs te/ de dag ni yongs su ma brtags pa las
160b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi skye'o/ /sprul pa gnyis kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de lta bas na ma rtog rnam par ma rtog shig /tshe dang ldan pa dag nam mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ni chags par yang mi 'gyur/ chags pa dang bral bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /
160b2(dkon brtsegs): chags pa med cing chags pa dang bral ba yang med pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag tshul khrims ni mi 'khor zhing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par
160b3(dkon brtsegs): grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang mi 'khor zhing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag chos de dag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ston na chos de dag kyang stong pa/ dben pa gzung du med pa'o/ /
160b4(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di lta ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes spongs shig /'du shes la yang 'du shes su ma byed cig / 'du shes la 'du shes kyis yongs su shes par ma byed cig / /gang 'du shes la 'du shes kyis yongs su shes pa de ni de'i 'du shes kyis bcings pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan
160b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dag 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs shig / tshe dang ldan pa dag 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs pa las gong na bya ba med do zhes
160b6(dkon brtsegs): smra'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe dge slong lnga brgya po de dag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de dag sems rnam par grol nas bcom ldan 'das
160b7(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang
160b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dag gar dong dong / gang nas lhags/ de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang du yang 'gro ba med pa dang / gang nas 'ong ba med pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan to/ /smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag khyod kyi ston pa gang yin
161a1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ gang ma skyes shing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'o/ /smras pa/ khyed kyis ji ltar chos thos/ smras pa/ bcings pa'i phyir yang ma yin/ thar pa'i phyir yang ma yin no/ /smras pa/ khyod sus btul
161a2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ su la lus med cing sems med pas so/ /smras pa/ khyed ji ltar brtson/ smras pa/ ma rig pa spang pa'i phyir yang ma yin rig pa bskyed pa'i phyir yang ma yin no/ /smras pa/ khyed ji ltar rnam par grol/ smras pa/
161a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba'i phyir yang ma yin spang ba'i phyir yang ma yin no/ /smras pa/ khyed su'i nyan thos/ smras pa/ gang gis thob pa med cing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa med pa'i 'o/ /smras pa/ khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa
161a4(dkon brtsegs): gang / smras pa/ gang dag khams gsum ni mi rgyu ba rnams so/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed ji srid cig na yongs su mya ngan las 'da'/ smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa nam yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
161a5(dkon brtsegs): ba na'o/ /smras pa/ khyed kyis bya ba byas sam/ smras pa/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa yongs su shes pas so/ /smras pa/ khyed nyon mongs pa zad dam/ smras pa/ chos thams cad gtan du zad pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/
161a6(dkon brtsegs): khyed kyis bdud btul lam/ smras pa/ phung po'i bdud mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ khyed kyis ston pa la bsnyen bkur byas sam/ smras pa/ lus kyis kyang ma byas/ ngag gis kyang ma byas/ sems kyis kyang ma byas so/ /
161a7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ khyed kyis sbyin pa'i gnas kyis sbyangs sam/ smras pa/ 'dzin pa med cing sdud pa med pas so/ /smras pa/ khyed la 'khor ba las rgal tam smras pa/ chad pa med cing rtag pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ khyed sbyin pa'i gnas
161a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi sar zhugs sam/ smras pa/ 'dzin pa thams cad las rnam par dgrol ba'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gar 'gro/ smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa gang du bzhud par ro/ /de ltar tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yongs su dris te/
161b1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong de dag gis lan btab nas 'khor de'i dge slong brgyad brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /
161b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du snang ba zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par 'gyur te 'dug pa de stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
161b3(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la slob par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpas ji ltar
161b4(dkon brtsegs): bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu tshar gcad cing tshar bcad nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir bslab pa bstan te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni skyes bu dam pa nan tan snying por byed pa rnams kyi don chen por
161b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na mi la la zhig kham pa'i grur zhugs te/ gang gA'i klung chen po rgal bar 'dod par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi des ci 'dra ba'i brtson 'grus kyi gru de btsal bar bya/ gsol
161b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bcom ldan 'das stobs dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bdag ni chu bo chen po'i nang du zhugs kyi bdag 'gram du ma phyin par bar ma dor gru zhig tu 'ong ngo snyam du sems pa'i slad du'o/ /
161b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun du snang ba de ltar byang chub sems dpas de bas ches stobs dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bslab par bya ste/ stobs chen po dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis
161b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o/ /kye ma'o lus 'di ni mi rtag pa ste/ bdag gis snying po ma blangs par bar ma dor 'chi ba'i dus byas su 'ong ngo zhes yid la byed pa de lta bus bdag ni chu bo chen por zhugs kyis/ chu bo
162a1(dkon brtsegs): b zhir zhugs pa'i sems can rnams chu bo chen por zhugs pa las bsgral ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos kyi gru gang gis sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshos khyer ba thams cad bsgral bar bya ba'i dam pa'i chos kyi gru
162a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po sbyar bar bya'o/ /kun du snang ba de la byang chub sems dpas dam pa'i chos kyi gru chen po sbyar bar bya ba de ci 'dra zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid de/ bsod nams kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa
162a3(dkon brtsegs): bsags pa/ tshul khrims kyi snam gyis sbyar ba/ sbyin pa'i 'khor gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bcing ba sra pas dam por sbrel pa/ bzod pa dang nges pa dang dran pa'i sbyor kas legs par sbyar ba/ byang chub kyi yan
162a4(dkon brtsegs): lag bdun gyi tshogs can/ brtson 'grus brtan pa dang dge ba'i chos kyi shing gis yang dag par sbyar ba/ bsam gtan gyi sems kyis las su rung bar byas pa/ dul ba dang zhi ba dang cang shes kyi dge ba'i bzos legs par zin
162a5(dkon brtsegs): par byas pa/ shin du mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po dang dpa' bar 'gro bas bstar pa/ shes rab dang ye shes kyis phyir rgol ba legs par bsrungs ba/
162a6(dkon brtsegs): thabs mkhas pas rnam par bsags pa legs par byas pa/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhis legs par yongs su sbyangs pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhis legs par rnam par bsams pa'i lus
162a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis bsten pa/ yang dag pa'i spong bas 'gro ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa/ dbang pos legs par brtags pas lta ba ngan pa'i shing yon po med pa/ stobs kyi shugs
162a8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'byung bas par shag shig med pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag gis 'gro ba rnam par dag pa/ gtsugs can dgra nyon mongs pa'i 'dud kyi lam 'dor bar byed pa/ lam du 'jug par byed pa/ pha rol gyi dogs
162b1(dkon brtsegs): su phyin pa byed pa/ mu stegs can ngan pa'i mu stegs 'dor bar byed pa/ zhi gnas kyi nges par sems pa brtan pa/ lhag mthong gis sbyor ba mtha' gnyis la ma chags par 'jug pa/ rgyu'i chos dang yang dag par ldan pa/
162b2(dkon brtsegs): sgra grags pa yangs shing rgya che la mi zad cing tshad med pa tshur shog /dam pa'i chos kyi gru chen po mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba bde bar 'gro ba/ 'jigs pa med par 'gro ba/ lam du 'gro ba/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba
162b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dor bar zhugs la tshu rol gyi 'gram nas pha rol gyi 'gram nas pha rol gyi 'gram du lta ba thams cad sel ba/ gtse ba med pa'i mya ngan las 'das par myur du song shig /ces phyogs bcur sgras go bar byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad kyi
162b4(dkon brtsegs): don gyi phyir bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par yid yongs su mi skyo bar byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos kyi gru chen po 'di 'dra ba de sbyar bar bya'o/ /dam pa'i chos kyi gru 'dis chu bo bzhis khyer ba'i
162b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya'o/ /kun du snang ba de la 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa myur ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di sems can thams cad la bcos ma ma yin pa'i sbyor ba ste/ bsam pa dag pas rab tu
162b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dun pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir brtson 'grus 'bar ba dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pas dge ba la 'dun pa dang / shes pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir
162b7(dkon brtsegs): thos pas mi ngoms pa dang / ye shes brtan par bya ba'i phyir nga rgyal med pa dang / yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rab tu 'byung ba la gzhol ba dang / lus dang sems dben par dgon pa na gnas pa dang /
162b8(dkon brtsegs): skye bo mi srun pa rnam par spangs pas 'du 'dzi med pa dang / don dam pa la rton pas chos don du gnyer ba dang / shin du mi 'khrugs pas ye shes kyi don dang / ye shes kyi don yin pas chos kyi don dang / mi 'khrugs
163a1(dkon brtsegs): pas bden pa'i don dang / yang dag par sbyor bar bya bas stong pa nyid kyi don dang / shin du nye bar zhi ba'i don yin pas dben pa'i don yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i
163a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa myur ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'di ltar dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di theg pa chen po
163a3(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams la phan 'dogs par gyur pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos
163a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam bstan na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam skyed par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
163a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te de bzhin gshegs pa
163a6(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i gtsug lag khang rin po che sna
163a7(dkon brtsegs): bdun las byas pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed brtsigs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dag la bskal
163a8(dkon brtsegs): pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bas rigs kyi bu 'am
163b1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa gzhan zhig gis dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam lung mnos te/ lung mnos nas kyang mi spong na de ni de bas
163b2(dkon brtsegs): ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/ /bud med gang zhig lung 'bog na de nam yang log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/ de nyid de'i bud med kyi lus kyi tha ma yin no/ /sa phyogs gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa 'am/
163b3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'am/ yi ger 'dri ba 'am/ yi ger bris nas glegs bam du byas te bzhag pa'i sa phyogs de lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /su zhig chos smra ba las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa 'am/ 'dzin pa 'am
163b4(dkon brtsegs): yi ger 'dri ba de la 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar bya ba de bzhin du gus par bya'o/ /'od srung rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos smra ba la bkur stir byed pa dang / btsun par byed pa dang / ri mor
163b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa de la nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to/ /de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mthong nas kyang lus kyi las yongs su dag pa
163b6(dkon brtsegs): bcu 'thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshor bas sems kun du ma zin par 'chi ba'i dus byed pa dang / de mig 'khrul bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lag pa g.yob bar mi byed pa dang / rkang pa 'phra bar mi byed pa dang / gcin mi
163b7(dkon brtsegs): gtor ba dang / phyi sa mi 'byung ba dang / de'i snying khar rdul mi 'byung ba dang / khyu tshur mi 'chang ba dang / nam mkha' la mi snyeg pa dang / ji ltar 'dug pa de bzhin du tshe'i 'du byed 'dor bar 'gyur ba ste/ lus kyi las yongs su dag pa bcu po de
163b8(dkon brtsegs): dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /ngag gi las yongs su dag pa bcu 'thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ gdangs snyen pa'i tshig dang / mnyen pa'i tshig dang / 'jam pa'i tshig dang / dga' ba'i tshig dang / snum pa'i tshig dang /

164a2(dkon brtsegs): dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /yid kyi las yongs su dag pa bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa med pa dang / 'chab par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'tshig par mi 'gyur ba dang / nyes pa la mi dga' ba
164a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'khon gcugs la mi dga' ba dang / 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ba dang / spong ba la bag yod par 'gyur ba dang / ma zhum pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'dzin pa dang / nga rgyal dang che ba'i nga

164a8(dkon brtsegs): de yi 'du shes phyin ci log mi 'gyur/ /bslab pa yang dag blangs la sems mi zhum/ /spong ba la ni bag med mi 'gyur te/ /zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis zhing sbyong byed/ /nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal yongs spangs nas/ /ting 'dzin 'byor

168a2(dkon brtsegs): cad 'bar rab tu 'bar te kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar la de mir gyur te/ dge sbyong gi kha dog dang gzugs kyis gnod pa de dag myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las yongs su ma dag pa dang

168a4(dkon brtsegs): la tshangs par spyad par khas 'che ba gang zhig tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams dang / yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyi phyag byas pa bdag gir byed na de mi dge ba'i las des brnyas pa brgyad 'thob te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ bems
168a5(dkon brtsegs): po lta bur 'gyur ba dang / go dka' zhing le lo can du 'gyur ba dang / skye bo mang pos bgad pa'i bud med du 'gyur ba dang / rang dbang med cing bran du 'gyur ba dang / mdog ngan zhing mi sdug par 'gyur ba dang / mdog
168a6(dkon brtsegs): ngan zhing dbang chung bar grags par 'gyur ba dang / de la su yang stsu bar mi 'gyur ba dang / sbyin gnas rnams la mgu bar mi byed pa ste/ brnyas pa brgyad po de dag 'thob bo/ /'od srung de lta bas na bzang po ma yin pa'i
168a7(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas dge sbyong sdig pa can gyis gzhan gyis phyag byas pa dag gir mi bya'i/ 'od srung gang dge sbyong ma yin la dge sbyong du khas 'che ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa ma yin la tshangs par spyod par
168a8(dkon brtsegs): khas 'che ba ni tha na sa chen po 'di la mchil ma'i thal ba tsam 'dor ba de yang ngas rnyed par mi 'gyur na gom pa 'deg pa dang 'jog pa lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung sa chen po 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal po rnams kyis tshul khrims dang ldan
168b1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams dang / yon tan dang ldan pa rnams dang / sbyin gnas rnams la kun tu spyad pa'i don du phul ba'i phyir ro/ /'od srung de la mi blun po de ni gom pa 'jog pa dang 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni thams cad kyang dad pas byin pa la mi dbang bzhin du gom pa
168b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dor zhing 'jog pa yin na dge 'dun gyi 'am/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi khri 'am/ khri'u 'am/ 'chags 'am/ gding ba 'am/ gnas khang ngam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ kun dga' ra ba'i gzhi 'am/
168b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spyad pa 'am/ lhung bzed dam/ chos gos sam/ bsod snyoms sam/ mal cha 'am/ na pa'i gsos sman nam/ yo byad kyang rung ste/ thams cad dad pas byin pa la mi dbang bar spyod pa yin pa lta ci smos/ 'od
168b4(dkon brtsegs): srung khyod mos par bya'o/ /khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o/ /'od srung dge sbyong ma yin la dge sbyong du khas 'che ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa ma yin la tshangs par spyod par khas 'che bas ni dad pas byin pa skra'i rtse mo'i cha tsam yang yongs su
168b5(dkon brtsegs): dag par bya mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung 'phags pa'i dge 'dun ni ngas rgya mtsho chen po lta bu dang / bsod nams kyi zhing dang / sbyin gnas rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /'od srung bram ze 'am khyim bdag dad pa
168b6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag de la yon 'bul ba de dag tshad med pa'i 'du shes kyis 'bul ba de la 'od srung mi blun po tshul khrims 'chal bas tha na skra'i rtse mo brgyad gshegs pa'i cha tsam zhig dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad na yang sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag de'i
168b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir dad pas byin pa skra'i rtse mo'i cha tsam ji snyed la spyad pa de snyed kyi las kyi rgya mtsho chen po sogs par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung de lta bas na tshul khrims yongs su dag pas dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad par bya'o zhes khyod kyis de ltar
