232b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyod pa la chags pa dang / theg pa dman par bsngo ba la chags pa ste/ gsum po de dag las shin du 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /de 'jigs pa gsum las shin du 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ gsum
232b3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyi 'jigs pa dang / rlom sems kyi 'jigs pa dang / bdud kyi las kyi 'jigs pa ste/ gsum po de dag las shin du 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /de rgya bzhis btab nas sbyin pa sbyin
232b4(dkon brtsegs): par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang / sems can stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang / byang chub stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa ste/ rgya bzhi po de dag gis btab
232b5(dkon brtsegs): nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /de brtson 'grus rtsom pa bzhi dang mi 'bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
232b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa ste/
232b7(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus rtsom pa bzhi po de dag dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /de dran pa bzhi dang mi 'bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems dran pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba dran pa dang /
232b8(dkon brtsegs): byams pa chen po dran pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong pa dran pa ste/ dran pa bzhi po de dag dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /de 'khor gsum yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/
233a1(dkon brtsegs): gsum gang zhe na/ bdag gi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / sems can gyi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa ste/ 'khor gsum po de dag yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par
233a2(dkon brtsegs): byed do/ /de shes pa yongs su dag pa bzhi yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /
233a3(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma'i chos su so sor rtog pa shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / bsngo ba la so sor rtog pa shes pa yongs su dag pa ste/ shes pa yongs su dag pa bzhi po de dag gis yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /
233a4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i chos la zhugs pa de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa shin du yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin
233a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu des byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i
233a6(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni rnam pa gcig ste/ rnam pa gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mnyam pa med pa'i sems/ thun mong ma yin pa'i sems/ 'jig
233a7(dkon brtsegs): rten gsum po thams cad las mchog tu bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i sems/ bdud thams cad 'dul ba'i sems/ las dang nyon
233a8(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa'i sgrib pa yongs su zad par byed pa'i sems/ sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i sems/ yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pa thams cad kyi sems de nyid mi 'dor zhing srung ba dang / sbed pa dang ma brjed
233b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gcig go/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin
233b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/ rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la 'od zer thogs pa med pa dang / sems can de dag kyang byang chub kyi bsam pa'i tshul khrims
233b3(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa gnyis so/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gsum ste/ rnam pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus
233b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi gnod pa thams cad bsal bas lus yongs su dag pa dang / kha gsag dang gzhogs slongs dang / ngag gi skyon thams cad bsal bas/ ngag yongs su dag pa dang / 'dod pa dang gnod sems dang /
233b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa bsal bas sems yongs su dag pa ste 'di ni rnam pa gsum mo/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa
233b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa bzhi ste/ rnam pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bslab pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / bslab pa yang dag par bzung ba ma nyams pa dang / sems can tshul khrims 'chal ba yongs su smin par byed pa
233b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la ston pa bzhin du gus par byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa bzhi'o/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga ste/
233b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag la mi stod pa dang / gzhan la mi smod pa dang / ma bslabs pa la mi brnyas pa dang / nyan thos kyi sems la mi re ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi 'dod pa ste/
234a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni rnam pa lnga'o/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa drug ste/ rnam pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bslab pa las mi 'da' bas sangs rgyas
234a2(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims la 'gyod pa med pas chos rjes su dran pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la lta bas dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su spong bas gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /
234a3(dkon brtsegs): skye ba thams cad la mi gnas pas tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas lha rjes su dran pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa drug go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims
234a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa bdun te/ rnam pa bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon par dad pa dang / bdag nyid dbang du byas te ngo tsha shes pa dang / sangs rgyas
234a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mngon sum du byas te khrel yod pa dang / nga rgyal med pas gus pa dang / bdag dang gzhan la gdung ba med pas nges pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol du kha na ma mtho ba la 'jigs par lta bas rnam par 'tshe ba med
234a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems kyi yongs su gdung ba nye bar zhi bas 'khon du mi 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni rnam bdun no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa brgyad
234a7(dkon brtsegs): de/ rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis tshul mi 'chos pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor bas kha gsag med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis chog shes pas thob kyis 'jal ba mi
234a8(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pas 'phags pa'i rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dgon pa la gnas pa rjes su mi gtong bas lus la mi lta ba dang / dam pa'i
234b1(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su 'dzin pas srog la mi lta ba dang / 'du 'dzi spong bas gcig pu na dga' ba dang / khams gsum thams cad kyis 'jigs pas chos kyi dga' ba la mos pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa brgyad do/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub
234b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa dgu ste/ rnam pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu po rnams 'dul ba dang / sems can gyi gnas dgu
234b3(dkon brtsegs): po rnams las shin du 'da' ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po rnams kyi rtsa ba yongs su sbyong pa dang / yongs su gdung ba med pas sems zhi ba dang / sems las su rung bas zhi gnas kyi
234b4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kun du tshol ba dang / cho ga dang tshul khrims dang lta ba nyams pa las shin du 'das pas mi lhod pa dang / theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs pas sems can thams cad la mi slu ba dang / tshul khrims la skyon
234b5(dkon brtsegs): med pas shin du mthar thug pa dang / yongs su sngo ba la mkhas pas sems phyad pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa dgu'o/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam
234b6(dkon brtsegs): pa bcu ste/ rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi las rnam gsum yongs su dag pa dang / ngag gi las rnam bzhi yongs su dag pa dang / yid kyi las rnam gsum yongs su dag pa dang / g.yo sgyu dang bral
234b7(dkon brtsegs): te drang zhing tshul 'chos pa med pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / bslab pa thams cad dang mi 'gal ba dang / phan par sbyor ba'i dngos po'i sngon du 'gro bas rjes su ston pa dang / dul zhing cang shes kyi sa'i phyir sems
234b8(dkon brtsegs): dmu rgod ma yin pa dang / bdag nyid byed pas sems can thams cad kyi slob mar gyur pa dang / nga rgyal med pas sbyin pa'i gnas rnams la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal ba dang / srog gi dbang por chos mdun du byed kyi
235a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi zang zing mdun du mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa bcu'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/ rnam pa
235a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan ma dang bcas shing 'bad pa dang bcas pa'i tshul khrims ni srog gi phyir yang mi 'bral ba dang / mtshan ma med pa dang lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul khrims ni chos thams cad la sgro mi 'dogs
235a3(dkon brtsegs): par slob pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa gnyis so/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang rnam par dag pas
235a4(dkon brtsegs): skye mched rnam par dag pa dang / phyi rnam par dag pas yul thams cad spangs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang
235a5(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pas tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid de/ gnyis po de dag go/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i
235a6(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni ngag
235a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pas 'di ltar gshe yang slar mi gshe'o/ /lus yongs su dag pas brdeg kyang slar mi rdeg go/ sems yongs su dag pas khros kyang slar mi khro'o/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas 'tshig
235a8(dkon brtsegs): par byas kyang slar mi 'tshig go/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can la lta ba'i phyir gzhan gyis ngan du smras sam/ ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam thos kyang mi gshe'o/ /'jig rten pha
235b1(dkon brtsegs): rol la lta ba'i phyir lag pa dang / bong ba dang dbyug pas brdegs kyang khong khro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kun du srung ba'i phyir yan lag dang nying lag bcad kyang khong khro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
235b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ni bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir slong ba la mi gshe'o/ /byang chub kyi lam gyis nye bar brtan pa'i phyir de dag la byams pa nye bar sgrub bo/ /smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir de dag la snying rje skyed do/ /
235b3(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad spang pa'i phyir gang slong yang de la phan par sems shing snying rje dang ldan te byang chub kyi yan lag tu nges par sbyin par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs
235b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing bzod do/ /stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub rjes su dran zhing bzod do/ /dus gsum la chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong
235b5(dkon brtsegs): ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ye shes rjes su dran zhing bzod do/ /byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir phan par 'dod pa rjes su dran zhing bzod do/ /snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir
235b6(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu yod pa rnam par gnon pa rjes su dran zhing bzod do/ /mi 'jigs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir seng ge bsgyings pa rjes su dran zhing bzod do/ /sems can thams cad la 'dud pa'i phyir spyi gtsug
235b7(dkon brtsegs): bltar mi snang ba rjes su dran zhing bzod do/ /'jig rten thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i phyir mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rjes su dran zhing bzod do/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes myang ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos
235b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rjes su dran zhing bzod do/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa ni stobs gnyis kyis yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ so sor rtog pa'i stobs dang
236a1(dkon brtsegs): sgom pa'i stobs so/ /de la gang lus dang sems la gnas te bzod pa ni so sor tog pa'i stobs so/ /gang chos thams cad la gnas te bzod pa ni sgom pa'i stobs so/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub
236a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni gang sems can thams cad la bdag med par bzod cing chos thams cad la dben par bzod de/ gang chos thams cad la mi bzod pa de ni bzod
236a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la don dam par gang bzod pa 'am/ mi bzod pa'i chos gang yang med do/ /gang chos thams cad khas mi len pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ chos khas len pa
236a4(dkon brtsegs): la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do/ /gang chos thams cad la zhum pa med pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ zhum pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do/ /gang chos thams cad
236a5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dzin pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ 'dzin pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do/ /gang la bdag med pa dang sems can med pa dang / chos med pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/
236a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang sems can dang / chos la gnas pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa
236a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lus rnam par 'phrul pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ gnyis po de dag go/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni
236a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/
236b1(dkon brtsegs): gang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba/ dgos pa dang dgos pa ma yin pa la zhum pa med pa/ rtsom pas mi ngal ba dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs pa la mi zhan pa/ pha rol du phyin pa 'di dag las phyir mi ldog pa/ chos thams cad yongs
236b2(dkon brtsegs): su tshol ba la brtson pa/ chos thams cad ston par rtsom pa/ chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa la spro ba/ mchod sbyin chen po las sgrol ba/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa la yongs su mi skyo ba/ sangs rgyas
236b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing rnam par sbyong ba/ theg pa dman pa las shin du 'da' ba/ sngon dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang thos pa'i tshogs sogs pa/ sngon gyi bsod nams bsags pa chud
236b4(dkon brtsegs): mi gzon pa/ nga rgyal med pas sems can thams cad la rim gro bya'o cog byed pa ste/ 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /de'i yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang lus la mig yor dang gzugs brnyan du
236b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa/ tshig la brjod du med par shes pa sems la shin du nye bar zhi bar shes pa/ zad pa shes pa rnam par rig pa/ zad pa shes rab tu shes pa/ mi skye ba shes pa nges par rtogs pa'o/ /de rtsom pa gsum las rnam
236b6(dkon brtsegs): par grol bar brtson 'grus rtsom ste gsum gang zhe na/ gnas pa'i rtsom pa dang / dmigs pa'i rtsom pa dang / yongs su rtog pa'i rtsom pa ste/ gsum po de dag go/ de chags pa gsum la mi chags par brtson 'grus
236b7(dkon brtsegs): rtsom ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ mig dang gzugs dang mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ rna ba dang / sgra dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ sna dang dri dang sna'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ lce dang ro dang
236b8(dkon brtsegs): lce'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ lus dang reg bya dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa'o/ /de 'dzin pa med cing 'dor ba med pa'i brtson 'grus
237a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pas sbyin pa mi len/ ser sna mi 'dor tshul khrims mi len/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims mi 'dor/ bzod pa mi len/ gnod sems mi 'dor/ brtson 'grus mi len/ le lo mi 'dor bsam gtan
237a2(dkon brtsegs): mi len/ g.yeng ba mi 'dor shes rab mi len/ 'chal ba'i shes rab mi 'dor/ dge ba mi len mi dge ba mi 'dor sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi len/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi 'dor ro/ /de len
237a3(dkon brtsegs): pa med cing 'dor ba med pas gnyis yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de la gnyis gang zhe na/ gang nang gi kun du ldang ba las dmigs pa kun du ldang ba dang / phyi rol du rnam par shes pa mtshan
237a4(dkon brtsegs): ma'i rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ba de ni gnyis shes bya'o/ /de la gnyis yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang nang nye bar zhi bas phyi rol du mi rgyu ba dang / spros pa med pa ste/ 'di ni gnyis yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/ /gang
237a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ba med cing ma spros pa/ spros pa med pa'i brtson 'grus 'di lta bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i bsam
237a6(dkon brtsegs): gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams yang dag par sgrub cing yang dag par bsgrubs nas so sor rtog pa dang / so sor brtags nas kyang
237a7(dkon brtsegs): snyoms par 'jug pa yin te/ de bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bsam gtan byed kyang tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam
237a8(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do/ /de bsam gtan byed kyang mig la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bsam gtan byed kyang rna ba la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ sna la ma yin/ lce
237b1(dkon brtsegs): la ma yin/ lus la ma yin/ yid la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do/ /de bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ sgra la ma yin/ dri la ma yin/ ro la ma yin/ reg bya la ma
237b2(dkon brtsegs): yin/ chos la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do/ /de bsam gtan byed kyang lus su rnam par rtog pa la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bsam gtan byed kyang sems su rnam par rtog pa la gnas te bsam
237b3(dkon brtsegs): gtan mi byed/ de bsam gtan byed kyang sa la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bzhin du chu la ma yin me la ma yin/ rlung la ma yin/ nam mkha' la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do/ /de bsam gtan byed
237b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang zla ba la ma yin/ nyi ma la ma yin/ brgya byin la ma yin/ tshangs pa la ma yin/ skye dgu'i bdag po la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do/ /'dod pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ gzugs
237b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi khams la ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do/ /de bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten 'di la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ 'jig rten pha rol la gnas te bsam
237b6(dkon brtsegs): gtan mi byed do/ /de bsam gtan byed kyang mi mtho mi dma' bar gnas te mi g.yo bar gyur cing bsam gtan byed do/ /de bsam gtan byed kyang bdag nye bar len pa'i lta ba la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do/ /
237b7(dkon brtsegs): de bsam gtan byed kyang sems can la ma yin/ srog la ma yin/ gso ba la ma yin/ gang zag la ma yin/ shed las skyes pa ma yin/ shed bu nye bar len pa'i lta ba la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do/ /
237b8(dkon brtsegs): de bsam gtan byed kyang chad par lta ba khas blangs te bsam gtan mi byed do/ /de bsam gtan byed kyang rtag par lta ba ma yin/ 'byung bar lta ba ma yin/ 'jig par lta ba khas blangs te bsam gtan
238a1(dkon brtsegs): mi byed do/ /de bsam gtan byed kyang zag pa shin du zad par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do/ /de bsam gtan byed kyang skyon med pa la 'jug pa dang 'bras bu thob pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam
238a2(dkon brtsegs): gtan mi byed do/ /de bsam gtan byed kyang shin du mngon par 'du mi bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do/ /de stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin 'dris par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin
238a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do/ /de mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dris par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed
238a4(dkon brtsegs): do/ /de smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dris par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do/ /de byams pa chen po'i go bgos
238a5(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po'i byin gyi brlabs la gnas te rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa bsam gtan du byed do/ /de la rnam pa thams cad kyi
238a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ sbyin pa ma tshang ba med pa/ tshul khrims ma tshang ba med pa/ bzod pa ma tshang ba med pa/ brtson 'grus ma tshang ba med pa/ bsam gtan ma tshang ba
238a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ shes rab ma tshang ba med pa/ thabs ma tshang ba med pa/ byams pa ma tshang ba med pa/ snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms ma tshang ba med pa/ bden pa shes pa la 'jug pa ma tshang
238a8(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa/ byang chub kyi sems sems can la lta ba ma tshang ba med pa/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sbyor ba ma tshang ba med pa/ sbyin pa dang snyan par smra ba dang / don byed pa dang don 'thun pa ma
238b1(dkon brtsegs): tshang ba med pa/ dran pa shes bzhin ma tshang ba med pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags
238b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma tshang ba med pa/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ma tshang ba med pa/ sbyin pa dang dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / nges pa ma tshang ba med pa/ ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod
238b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ ma tshang ba med pa/ mi dge ba'i chos dang mi ldan pa/ dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ chos kyi tshul 'bar bas
238b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bsdus pa/ dge 'dun gyi tshul yongs su sdud pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la lta bas byin gyis brlabs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su bsgrubs pas legs
238b5(dkon brtsegs): par brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi dbyings yongs su rdzogs par bsngos pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
238b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs kyis yang dag par bzung ba/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang rjes su 'thun pa/ nyan thos dang
238b7(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ma 'dres pa/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa bsal ba/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes dang ma bral ba/ sems can thams cad kyi ston par
238b8(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa ston pa bzhi thob pa/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pas ma smad pa/ drang ba mkhas pa/ sems can
239a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel ba/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sbyong ba/ chu bo las sgrol ba 'dzin pa thams cad gcod pa rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi ba las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis nye
239a2(dkon brtsegs): bar zhi ba/ chos nyid kyis btang snyoms pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lta ba/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis bems po byin gyis brlabs bya ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba med pa/ rang gi ngang gis lung
239a3(dkon brtsegs): du ma bstan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bya ba la rtag tu brtson pa/ nye bar zhi bas bsil bar gyur pa/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la rtag tu 'bar ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan
239a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad
239a5(dkon brtsegs): ri mo mkhan bzo tha dad par bslabs pa/ yan lag rnam par phye ba tha dad du bslabs par gyur te/ de la la la ni sa gcod pa la mkhas kyang 'dri ba la mi mkhas/ la la ni gtan la 'bebs
239a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la mkhas kyang yan lag dang nying lag la mi mkhas/ kha cig ni rkang lag 'dri ba la mkhas kyang mig dang mgo dang rna ba 'dri ba la mi mkhas pa dag cig yin la/ rigs kyi bu de ltar rnam
239a7(dkon brtsegs): pa tha dad du bslabs pa/ yan lag rnam par dbye ba la tha dad du bslabs pa/ gzugs tha dad du bslabs pa'i ri mo mkhan de dag thams cad la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas
239a8(dkon brtsegs): ras shig byin te/ khyed rnams kyis ras 'di la nga'i gzugs bris te 'on cig khyed cag thams cad kyis kyang 'di la ri mo bris shig /de nas ri mo mkhan de dag tshogs nas ras de brgyangs pa las ri mo
239b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhan de dag gi nang nas ri mo mkhan gcig cig yul gzhan zhig tu song bar gyur la/ de nas ri mo mkhan phyi ma de dag gis de la rgyal po de'i gzugs bris na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ri mo
239b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhan gcig po de'i lag tu ma blangs na ras de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
239b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de ltar na ji tsam du don rnam par rig par bya ba'i phyir 'di dper byas te/ 'di'i don cir blta zhe na/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar ri mo mkhan gcig po de med na ras de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan
239b4(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du rigs kyi bu rnam pa ji snyed dang / spyod pa ji snyed dang / brtson pa ji snyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de dag las gal te rnam pa gcig ma
239b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan na yang rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /nam sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rnam pa yang dag par bsdus shing lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i kun nas ldang
239b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mtshan ma la dmigs pa'i spros pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid yin no/ /bstan pa 'di nges par
239b7(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong gis rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid la bzod pa rab tu thob bo/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du
239b8(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab yongs
240a1(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sngon gyi mtha' la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa
240a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / phyi ma'i mtha' la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / da ltar byung ba la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par
240a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang / 'dus byas la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'dus ma byas la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs
240a4(dkon brtsegs): pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas thams cad la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das
240a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shes pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs
240a6(dkon brtsegs): pa med par 'jug pa dang / bden pa shes pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / kun rdzob bstan pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba
240a7(dkon brtsegs): chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / don dam pa bstan pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po dang
240a8(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir rab dang / 'bring dang tha ma'i dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas sems can thams cad la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs
240b1(dkon brtsegs): pa med par 'jug pa yin te/ de'i shes rab de yang 'phags pa zag pa med pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa/ nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang 'thun pa sems can gyi bsam pa'i rjes su zhugs pa/ gting
240b2(dkon brtsegs): dpag dka' ste mthong bar dka' zhing zab la khong du chud par dka' ba bye phrag phyed cing nges par rtogs pa/ lta ba dang bral ba/ bag chags bsal ba/ bdag stong pa nyid du rtogs pa/ thams cad stong pa
240b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa/ chos stong pa nyid kyi tshul shes pa/ don la nges par rtogs pa/ shin du lcigs pa shin du sbyangs pa/ ci yang snang ba med pa 'gal ba med pa ma 'gags pa/ dus dang dus
240b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa la rtog pa/ dus las mi 'da' ba skyon med pa/ legs par bsrungs pa/ skyon med pa la dga' ba/ bden pa khong du chud pa/ 'gog pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs pa/ shin du rgal ba
240b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa/ gcig tu spyod pa med pa spyod pa/ legs par spyad pa spyod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la spyod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las
240b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir log kyang gang nas kyang 'ongs pa med pa/ yul thams cad las shin du 'das kyang sangs rgyas kyi yul las phyir ma log pa/ rtsom pa thams cad las shin du 'das kyang sems
240b7(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su smin par byed pa las phyir ma log pa/ spyod pa thams cad las shin du 'das kyang dge ba'i spyod pa las phyir ma log pa/ sems kyi dmigs pa thams cad las
240b8(dkon brtsegs): shin du 'das kyang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa las phyir ma log pa/ nye bar len pa la spyod kyang nye bar len pa med par 'bar ba/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad
241a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis ma gos kyang 'jig rten dang ma bral ba/ lus med kyang sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang bsam pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'o/ /de'i shes rab de yang de'i ngang tshul la spyod pa myur du
241a2(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud pa/ dbang po smin par 'gyur ba/ yun ring por lta ba rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i chos la brtson pa/ byang chub kyi snying po la gzhol ba/ dge ba sbyin pa la spyod pa nye bar len pa
241a3(dkon brtsegs): med par 'bar ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ bdud thams cad 'dul ba/ sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba/
241a4(dkon brtsegs): don thams cad rjes su rtogs pa/ chos thams cad ro mtshungs pa/ thabs thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni srid pa'i pha rol du song ba
241a5(dkon brtsegs): dang dpag tu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /mtshan ma thams cad dang dmigs pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi pha rol du
241a6(dkon brtsegs): song bas de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /de'i shes rab yongs su dag pa ni gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su dag
241a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa ste/ de dag ni yongs su dag pa gnyis so/ /gzhan yongs su dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/
241a8(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / lta ba yongs su dag pa ste/ de dag ni yongs su dag pa gnyis so/ /de'i shes rab de yang thams cad kyi rjes su song ba/ sems can kyi rjes
241b1(dkon brtsegs): su song ba/ chos kyi rjes su song ba'o/ /de'i shes rab de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis phyir mtshams sbyor ba yang med la skye ba'i gnas thams cad kyi mtshams kyang sbyor ro/ /de'i shes
241b2(dkon brtsegs): rab de gnas pa yang med la yul thams cad dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la yang gnas so/ /de'i shes rab de ni mtha' dang yang bral la dbus la yang mi gnas so/ /
241b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i shes rab de ni phyogs bcur rnam par lta bas sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul la 'byung ba shin du mthong ba'i phyir sgrib pa med pa yang rnyed pa'o/ /de'i shes rab de ni chos thams cad shes shing mngon
241b4(dkon brtsegs): par rtogs pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /de'i shes rab de ni chos kyi don thams cad dang ldan yang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin te sbyor ba 'am/ mi sbyor
241b5(dkon brtsegs): ba 'am/ chos gang gis kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi 'byung gnas ni ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin no/ /bsod nams kyi
241b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung gnas yin no/ /thos pa'i 'byung gnas yin no/ /yon tan gyi 'byung gnas yin no/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas yin no/ /gzungs dang spobs pa'i 'byung gnas yin no/ /
241b7(dkon brtsegs): so so yang dag par rig pa'i 'byung gnas yin no/ /yon tan dang ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems
241b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa 'di bstan pa na 'khor de'i nang nas lha dang mi srog chags
242a1(dkon brtsegs): nyi khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par
242a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/ /dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /lha'i bu khri ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam
242a3(dkon brtsegs): par dag nas de dag tshig 'di skad ces 'dzer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di thos par 'gyur ba'i sems
242a4(dkon brtsegs): can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba lags na/ gang dag thos nas mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / de bzhin nyid
242a5(dkon brtsegs): du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes smras so/ / // bam po gnyis pa/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che
242a6(dkon brtsegs): la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lus
242a7(dkon brtsegs): la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas te/ lus la rnam pa gnyis su so sor rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i dran pa nye bar 'jog go/ rnam pa gnyis su so sor rtog pa dang ldan
242a8(dkon brtsegs): pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa dang / sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'o/ /de la mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na/
242b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ kye ma lus 'di ni mi gtsang ba ste/ btsog pas yongs su gang ba/ yun thung zhing byis pa 'drid pa yin no zhes bya ba de ni mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'o/ /de la
242b2(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang lus mi gtsang ba grogs med pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ chos kyi sku bsod nams kyi sku/ ye shes kyi sku/
242b3(dkon brtsegs): rdo rje'i sku/ mi shigs pa'i sku/ zag pa med pa'i sku/ 'jig rten gsum las bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sku/ gzugs mthong na sems can thams cad tshim par 'gyur pa'i sku thob
242b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa gnyis su so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag
242b5(dkon brtsegs): pa sgom pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa ni chos gnyis yongs su sbyong ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/
242b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / rtag pa'i rnam pa'o/ //de la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na/ kye ma lus 'di ni mi rtag pa'i rnam pa ste/ ring por mi gnas pa/ tha mar
242b7(dkon brtsegs): 'chi ba yin par shes nas lus kyi phyir mi mthun pa'i 'tsho ba mi spyod cing snying po nyid len to/ /de snying po gsum len te/ gsum gang zhe na/ lus kyi snying po dang longs spyod kyi snying
242b8(dkon brtsegs): po dang / 'tsho ba'i snying po dang gsum mo/ /de lus mi rtag go snyam nas sems can thams cad kyi bran dang slob mar khas blangs te ci bya'o cog la 'bad pa yin/ lus mi rtag go snyam
243a1(dkon brtsegs): nas lus kyi nyes pa yon po dang / g.yo dang tshul 'chos pa thams cad mi byed do/ /lus mi rtag go snyam nas srog la bag mi rton par 'gyur te/ srog gi phyir yang sdig pa mi byed do/ /lus
243a2(dkon brtsegs): mi rtag go snyam nas longs spyod la sred cing chags par mi byed de/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi rtag pa'i rnam pas lus la
243a3(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ de las yon tan gyi phan yon rab tu 'thob bo/ /de la rtag pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na/ gang lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
243a4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyi dpyod pa'i ye shes skyes shing byung ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang / chos kyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang / sems can gyi
243a5(dkon brtsegs): khams mtha' dag yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ste/ sems can thams cad la btang ba sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byed pa 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes
243a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /gang mi zad pa ni rtag pa zhes bya ste/ 'dus ma byas ni mi zad pa zhes bya'o/ /'dus ma byas ni rtag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba rtsom pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i
243a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o/ /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni rtags zhes bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi spyod
243a8(dkon brtsegs): yul dang / mtshan ma med pa nges par brtags pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rgyu 'thun pas brtson 'grus brtsam pa thams cad rtsom pa 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o/ /nam mkha' ni rtag pa
243b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems rnam par mi rtog pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang
243b2(dkon brtsegs): b yang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa de bdag gis lus de la sems can thams cad kyi lus nye bar 'dogs shing bdag gis sems can thams
243b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gnas la gnas par bya'o snyam ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zag pa med pa ltar rang gi lus kyi chos nyid la yang de bzhin du rtog go/ de zag pa
243b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i chos la mkhas pas sems can thams cad kyi lus kyang de'i mtshan nyid du rab tu shes so/ /de zag pa med pa'i lus kyis zag pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sogs
243b5(dkon brtsegs): so/ /de zag pa med pa'i sems kyis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zag pa med pa'i thams cad mkhyen par yongs su sngo'o/ /de zag pa med pa'i chos thob pas zag pa las 'byung bar mi byed
243b6(dkon brtsegs): do/ /zag pa rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i zag pa dang srid pa'i zag pa dang / ma rig pa'i zag pa dang / lta ba'i zag pa'o/ /de 'dod pa'i zag pa yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas sems
243b7(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du 'dod pa'i khams su skye'o/ /srid pa'i zag pa yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i phyir bsams bzhin du srid pa
243b8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin to/ /ma rig pa'i zag pa dang lta ba'i zag pa de gnyis rtsa ba nas gdon pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la 'jug go/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
244a1(dkon brtsegs): sgom pa de lus la sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang ma byung bar so sor rtog go/ lus la phyi ma'i mthar yang mi 'pho bar so sor rtog go/ lus la da lta byung ba na rang bzhin gyis dben par yang so
244a2(dkon brtsegs): sor rtog go/ de de ltar lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas pas lus dang ldan pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba mi skyed do/ /'jig tshogs la lta ba dang bral bas bdag gir mi byed do/ /bdag gir byed pa med
244a3(dkon brtsegs): pas yongs su 'dzin pa la yongs su mi 'dzin to/ /yongs su 'dzin pa med pas rtsod pa med pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /rtsod pa spangs pas gnod sems med do/ /gnod sems med pas bzod pa
244a4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'thob bo/ /bzod pa rab tu thob pas phyir khengs par yang mi 'gyur 'dud par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /khengs par mi 'gyur 'dud par mi 'gyur bas chos nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /chos
244a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid la gnas pas phyir yang chos ma yin pa spyod par mi 'gyur ro/ /chos spyod pas chos dang ldan pa'i 'gros su song ngo / /chos kyi 'gros su song bas chos dang ldan pa'i grogs po rab tu
244a6(dkon brtsegs): rnyed do/ /chos dang ldan pa'i grogs pos yongs su bzung bas chos dang ldan pa'i mnyan pa thos par 'gyur ro/ /chos thos pa dang ldan pas phyir yang yul rnams la zag par mi 'gyur ro/ /
244a7(dkon brtsegs): de yul la bsrungs pas ting nge 'dzin sgrub bo/ /mnyam par bzhag pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pas phyir yang rtog par mi byed do/ /
244a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog par mi byed do/ /rnam par mi rtog pas mi 'gyur ro/ /mi 'gyur bas phyir yang mi byed do/ /rnam par mi byed do/ /nam mi byed rnam par mi byed pa de ni chos mnyam pa nyid kyis chos ji lta ba
244b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin thob nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems
244b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa na tshor ba
244b3(dkon brtsegs): la bde bar gnas pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /de 'di ltar gang la tshor ba med pa de ni bde ba yin no zhes slob ste/ de sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba spang pa'i phyir tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su
244b4(dkon brtsegs): lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom mo/ /de sems can rnams kyi tshor ba 'gog pa'i phyir go cha bgos kyang bdag gi tshor ba 'gog par yang mi byed do/ /des tshor ba gang ci myong yang tshor ba de dag thams cad snying rje chen pos yongs
244b5(dkon brtsegs): su bzung zhing myong bar byed de/ de nam bde ba'i tshor ba myong ba de na 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed de/ bdag gi 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal ba yang rab tu spong ngo / /nam sdug bsngal gyi tshor myong ba
244b6(dkon brtsegs): de na zhe sdang la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed de/ bdag gi zhe sdang gi bag la nyal yang rab tu spong ngo / /nam bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba myong ba de na gti mug la spyod pa'i sems
244b7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed de bdag gi gti mug gi bag la nyal yang rab tu spong ngo / /de bde ba'i tshor ba la rjes su chags par mi 'gyur te/ rjes su chags pa legs par 'joms par yang byed do/ /de sdug bsngal
244b8(dkon brtsegs): gyi tshor ba la khong khro bar mi 'gyur te/ khong khro ba legs par 'joms par yang byed do/ /sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la ma rig pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur te/ ma rig pa legs par 'joms par yang byed do/ /
245a1(dkon brtsegs): des tshor ba gang ci myong ba de dag thams cad kyang mi rtag par shes shing myong bar byed do/ /sdug bsngal du shes shing myong bar byed do/ /bdag med par shes shing myong bar byed do/ /de bde ba'i tshor ba la ni mi rtag par shes par 'gyur ro/ /
245a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la ni zug rngur shes par 'gyur ro/ /sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la ni zhi bar shes par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na gang bde ba de ni mi rtag pa'o/ /gang sdug bsngal ba de ni sdug bsngal nyid do/ /gang bde
245a3(dkon brtsegs): ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa de ni bdag med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de ltar tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de chos thams cad skyes pa dang / zhig pa dang zhu ba dang / gnas pa
245a4(dkon brtsegs): med par shes so/ /chos thams cad la skye ba dang 'jig par yang so sor rtog go/ so sor rtog pa na chos skye ba de dag gang nas 'ong / 'gag pa rnams gang du sogs par 'gyur snyam du chos rnams kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa
245a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /des chos rnams gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro bar shes nas tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad par sgrub bo/ /bsgrubs nas kyang nan tan du mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems
245a6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi tshor ba 'gag par byed kyi/ bdag 'ba' shig gi tshor ba 'gag par byed pa ni ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
245a7(dkon brtsegs): thabs mkhas pa dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su zin pa'o/ /gang tshor ba 'gag pa yang rab tu shes la tshor ba 'gag pa mngon sum du yang mi byed de/ tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nyer bar gzhag pa sgom
245a8(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas pa de tshor ba rnams la dben pa dang / rnam par dben par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so/ /'di la ni myong ba gang yang med do/ /'di la ni tshor bar byed pa gang yang med do/ /chos de dag thams cad ni stong pa ste/ bdag
245b1(dkon brtsegs): dang bdag gi dang bral ba'o/ /byed pa po dang tshor ba po dang mi ldan pa'o/ /rgyu dang rkyen la rag lus pa'o bdag po med pa'o nga'i ba med pa'o yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o/ /des yang dag par na rgyu dang rkyen de dag gi dngos po mi dmigs so/ /
245b2(dkon brtsegs): de ma dmigs nas 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar rkyen stong pa yin pa de bzhin du rkyen las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang stong pa'o snyam nas de stong pa nyid kyi don rig pas lus dben pa dang / sems dben pa dang don shes pa dang chos
245b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams shes pa dang / ye shes rig pas tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs
245b4(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems la sems
245b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pas gnas pa byang chub kyi sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shin du nye bar bzhag ste/ sems dran pa'i ye shes kyis sems kun du tshol lo/ /de sems kun du tshol ba na sems
245b6(dkon brtsegs): nang na yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sems phyi rol na yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sems phyi dang nang na yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong phung po rnams la yang sems yang dag par
245b7(dkon brtsegs): rjes su mi mthong / khams rnams la yang sems yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / skye mched rnams la yang sems yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /des sems yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas
245b8(dkon brtsegs): sems ga las byung zhes sems kyi rgyun kun du tshol zhing de 'di snyam du sems te/ dmigs pa yod pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ ci dmigs pa de yang gzhan la sems de yang gzhan nam
246a1(dkon brtsegs): 'on te dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid sems yin/ gal te dmigs pa yang gzhan la sems kyang gzhan yin na ni sems de gnyis su 'gyur ro/ /'on te dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid sems yin na ni sems kyis
246a2(dkon brtsegs): sems de ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur te/ sems kyis sems mthong bar mi rung ngo / /'di lta ste dper na ral gri'i so de nyid kyis ral gri'i so de nyid gcad par mi nus pa dang / sor mo'i rtse mo de nyid kyis sor mo'i rtse mo de
246a3(dkon brtsegs): nyid la reg par mi nus pa de bzhin du sems de nyid kyis kyang sems de nyid mthong bar mi nus so snyam nas/ de 'di ltar tshul bzhin du rab tu sbyor ba las gang sems mi gnas pa chad pa ma yin pa/ rtag par ma
246a4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa/ ther zug tu mi gnas pa/ rgyu med pa ma yin pa/ rkyen dang mi 'gal ba/ de las kyang ma yin gzhan las kyang ma yin pa/ de nyid kyang ma yin gzhan yang ma yin pa'i sems kyi rgyud sems kyi 'khri shing
246a5(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi chos nyid sems mi gnas pa dang / sems rgyu med pa dang / sems snang ba med pa dang / sems kyi rang gi mtshan nyid ji ltar de bzhin nyid 'khrug par mi byed pa de ltar shes so/ /de ltar mthong ngo / /de
246a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sems de dag dben pa nyid du rab tu shes/ de bzhin du mthong ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su
246a7(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sems la cung zad tsam yang mi mthong / rnam par mi mthong / mi rtog rnam par mi rtog g.yo med rlom sems med/ spros pa med pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems la
246a8(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ji ltar sems gzugs med pa de bzhin du sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang gzugs med pa'o/ /ji ltar
246b1(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gzugs med pa de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems su bsngos pa yang gzugs med pa'o/ /ji ltar byang chub kyi sems su bsngos pa gzugs med pa de bzhin du
246b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub de yang gzugs med de de'i phyir sems ji ltar spyod pa yang de bzhin no/ /spyod pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin no/ /byang chub ji lta bar yongs su bsngo ba yang de bzhin zhes bya ste/ sems kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub
246b3(dkon brtsegs): bo/ /byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni chos thams cad de/ gang 'di ltar sems rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shes pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang
246b4(dkon brtsegs): gang mgyogs pa/ rab tu mgyogs pa mi gnas par rgyu ba/ spre'u dang rlung 'dra ba/ 'bab chu'i rgyun dang 'bru mar gyi mar me dang 'dra ba rgyang ring por 'gro ba lus med pa/ yul la brkam pa skye mched drug la spyod yul pa/
246b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dang gzhan gyi shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems gnas pa/ rtse gcig pa mi 'phro ba rnam par mi 'phro ba zhi gnas la rtse gcig pa/ g.yeng ba med pa 'di ni sems gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
246b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs pa gang zhe na/ gang sems la rnam par 'byed par shes pa dang / sems la chos kyi dbyings su gnas par shes pa dang / sems la sems gnas par shes pa dang / sems la rang bzhin
246b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis 'od gsal bar shes pa dang / sems la ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang / sems la mngon sum gyi shes pas rab tu shes pa dang / sems la sgyu ma'i chos su shes pa dang / sems la dus gsum
246b8(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / sems la de kho nar shes pa dang / sems la g.yo ba med cing gzung ba med par shes pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o/ /de rang gi sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin
247a1(dkon brtsegs): pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rang bzhin yang de yin par rab tu shes so/ /sems kyi rang bzhin de yongs su shes nas de bzhin du chos ston to/ /rang gi sems kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa sems can thams cad
247a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yin par rab tu shes so/ /sems kyi ngo bo nyid du shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to/ /rang gi sems kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyang de
247a3(dkon brtsegs): yin par rab tu shes so/ /sems kyi mtshan nyid de shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to/ /ji ltar rang gi sems stong pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang stong par rab tu shes so/ /sems de dag stong pa
247a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid du shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to/ /de rang gi sems yang dag par 'du ba gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems yang dag par 'du ba yang de yin par rab tu shes so/ /sems yang dag par 'du ba de dag shes
247a5(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to/ /de rang gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid du rab tu shes so/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam
247a6(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid du rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid du rab tu shes shing sems kyis 'gyur bar mi byed de rnam par mi 'gyur ro/ /sems gnas pas chos kyi dbyings gnas pa rjes
247a7(dkon brtsegs): su shes kyang sems gnas pa'i chos nyid de las kyang mi g.yo ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu
247a8(dkon brtsegs): de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la chos kyis rjes su lta ba'i dran
247b1(dkon brtsegs): pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas pa 'di snyam du sems te/ chos kho na skye ba rnams skye/ chos kho na 'gag pa rnams 'gag ste/ 'di la bdag gam sems can nam/ srog gam skye ba po 'am/ gso ba 'am skyes bu 'am/ gang zag gam/
247b2(dkon brtsegs): shed las skyes pa 'am/ shed bu 'am gang skye ba 'am/ rga ba 'am 'chi ba 'am/ 'pho ba 'am skye bar 'gyur ba gang yang med do/ /'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gal te bsgrubs na ni 'grub ma bsgrubs na ni mi
247b3(dkon brtsegs): 'grub ste/ dge ba yang rung mi dge ba yang rung / mi g.yo ba yang rung ji lta bur bsgrubs pa de lta bur 'grub mod kyi/ chos rnams la sgrub par byed pa yang med la chos rnams rgyu med par yang gang kyang mi
247b4(dkon brtsegs): skye'o snyam du nye bar brtags na 'di ltar chos dran pa'i ye shes skye ste/ gang bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dang / mi g.yo ba mngon par 'du byed pa dang gsum mo/ /de la bdag gis ni bsod nams
247b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du byed pa la brtson par bya'o/ /de ni bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa/ mchog dam pa rab khyad par du 'phags pa bcu'i rgyur 'gyur te/ bcu po de dag gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lus yongs su
247b6(dkon brtsegs): dag pas mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba dang / pha rol gyi gnod par bya ba thams cad las shin du 'das pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems
247b7(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad tshim par byed pa rnam pa drug bcu shin du yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med cing rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par ting nge 'dzin mi
247b8(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa yongs su dag pas don dang / chos dang nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa mi zad pa dang / byams pa chen po yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i
248a1(dkon brtsegs): lam la rab tu 'god pa dang / snying rje chen po yongs su dag pas bskal pa dpag tu med par 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba dang / stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs pas sems can thams cad kyi dbang po
248a2(dkon brtsegs): mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / mi 'jigs pa yongs su rdzogs pas par du gcod pa dang bar du gcod pa'i chos ma yin pa rab tu rtogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs
248a3(dkon brtsegs): pas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba dang / dus gsum la mi chags pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas rang byung gi ye shes rab tu rtogs
248a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa dam pa bzang po mchog rab/ bye brag tu 'phags pa bcu po de dag gi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /des don gyi dbang 'di mthong bas bsod nams kyi tshogs sogs pa
248a5(dkon brtsegs): la chog mi shes par 'gyur ro/ /de bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'du byed rnams mngon par 'du mi bya ba'i phyir ji ltar bdag la mi dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du bag chags su yang mi 'gyur bar
248a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o snyam nas brtson par byed do/ /de mi g.yo ba'i 'du byed rnams rab tu shes nas mi g.yo ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa skyed kyang ting nge 'dzin de la snying por 'du shes par yang mi 'gyur la ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis kyang
248a7(dkon brtsegs): mi skye ste/ bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi dbang gis 'dod pa'i khams su yang skye'o/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs
248a8(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas shing byang chub tu sgrub pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag sgom la/ byang chub kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa de dag spong yang
248b1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos mngon par 'du byed pas rtag par lta bar yang mi ltung mi dge ba'i chos spong yang chad par lta bar yang mi ltung ste/ gang la chad pa med cing rtag pa med pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtag pa dang chad pa yongs su sbyangs
248b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dbu ma'i lam mo/ /de yang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ gang tshul bzhin ma yin par yid la byed pa dang / ma rig pa de gnyis ga yang mtha' ste/ gang de gnyis kyi dbu ma de ni btags pa med cing gdags par 'gyur ba ma
248b3(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ 'di ni chos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du ma rig pa dang ma rig pa med pa dang / 'du byed rnams dang 'du byed med pa rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang rnam par shes pa med pa dang / ming dang gzugs
248b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ming dang gzugs med pa dang / skye mched drug dang skye mched drug med pa dang / reg pa dang reg pa med pa dang / tshor ba dang tshor ba med pa dang sred pa dang sred pa med pa dang / len pa dang len pa med pa dang / srid pa dang
248b5(dkon brtsegs): srid pa med pa dang / skye ba dang skye ba med pa dang / rga shi dang rga shi med pa dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa zhes bya ba de gnyis ga yang mtha' ste/ gang de
248b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyi dbu ma de ni btags pa med cing gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ 'di ni chos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'o/ /chos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam de ni 'di 'dra'o/ /de 'dra'o zhes bstan par mi rung
248b7(dkon brtsegs): ste/ dbu ma'i lam ni btags pa med pa gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin pa mtshan ma med pa/ gnas med pa gzung ba med pa kun gzhi med pa zhi ba rab tu zhi ba nye bar zhi ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na mda' gang nas
248b8(dkon brtsegs): 'phangs pa dang / gang du phog pa de gnyis ga yang mtha' ste/ gang phigs pa dang phog pa de'i dbu ma de ni btags pa med cing gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ blta ba 'am reg par mi nus pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu dmigs pa gang gis
249a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa skye ba dang / gang du so sor rnam par rig pa gnas pa de gnyis ga yang mtha' ste/ gang de gnyis kyi dbu ma bstan par mi nus pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu brda tsam du dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'i don
249a2(dkon brtsegs): dam par ni ma yin no/ /don dam pa gang yin pa de ni brjod du med de/ de la ni nyung ngu yang med mang po yang med do/ /gang la nyung ngu yang med mang po yang med pa de ni dbu ma'i lam mo/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bdag dang bdag med
249a3(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba de gnyis ga yang mtha' ste/ bdag dang bdag med pa'i ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo/ /srog dang gang zag ces bya ba de gnyis ga yang mtha' ste/ srog dang gang zag gi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa
249a4(dkon brtsegs): ni dbu ma'i lam mo/ /mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba de gnyis ga yang mtha' ste/ mtshan ma med par rtog pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo/ /dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba de gnyis ga yang mtha' ste/ rtog
249a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang 'jig pa med pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo/ /brdzun pa dang bden pa zhes bya ba de gnyis ga yang mtha' ste/ brjod du med pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo/ /tshu rol dang pha rol zhes bya ba de gnyis ga yang mtha' ste/ 'jig
249a6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs 'gag pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo/ /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas shes bya ba de gnyis ga yang mtha' ste/ spyod pa med pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo/ /'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de gnyis ga yang
249a7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' ste/ rnam par rig pa med pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i phyir dran
249a8(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas te/ de chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su 'du bar rab tu shes so/ /chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de nyid sems can gyi khams so/ /de chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pas sems can gyi khams dbyer med par
249b1(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud do/ /chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang sems can gyi khams gang yin pa de gnyis ga yang nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs par rab tu shes so/ /des chos thams cad dbyings gcig tu shes nas chos
249b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas kyang chos la mngon par chags shing lta bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /de nam mthong ba de ni chos rnams la tha dad du mi byed do/ /des chos rnams
249b3(dkon brtsegs): mthong yang sha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin/ lha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin shes rab kyi mig gis mthong ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i mig mtshan mar 'du shes pa ma yin te/
249b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir de sha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin no/ /de'i mig mngon par 'du byed par lhung ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir de lha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin no/ /de'i mig spros pa la spyod pa ma yin te/ de'i
249b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir de shes rab kyi mig gis mthong ba ma yin no/ /chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mthong nas chos gang la yang mi gnas so/ /des
249b6(dkon brtsegs): c hos thams cad mi gnas par shes nas chos rjes su dran pa des sngon gyi smon lam mi gtong ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su dran pa sangs rgyas kyis
249b7(dkon brtsegs): gnang ba'o/ /gang cung zad chos zab mo la so sor rtog kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa de yang mi 'dor ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams chos
249b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po de dag la gnas pa de phyin ci log bzhi rab tu spong ste/
250a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pas mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log pa rab tu spong ngo / /tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas pas
250a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo / /sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pas mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo / /chos
250a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pas bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo / /de phyin ci log med pas yang dag pa nyid sgrub bo/ /yang dag pa nyid la zhugs
250a4(dkon brtsegs): nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa de yang dag par spong ba'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa
250a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'thob ste/ yang dag par spong ba'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' de 'bad pa med cing lhun gyis grub pas dge ba'i chos la sbyor ba la sems 'jug gi mi dge ba
250a6(dkon brtsegs): la ni ma yin no/ /de phyir zhing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa
250a7(dkon brtsegs): dang dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang / nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / phyir zhing 'byung ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya
250a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de sngon gyi las yongs su dag pa'i phyir rang gi ngang nyid kyis dge ba'i chos rnams mngon du 'gyur te/ 'bad pa med cing lhun gyis grub
250b1(dkon brtsegs): pas dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams ni skye'o/ /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams ni nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa de yang dag par spong ba bzhi po 'di
250b2(dkon brtsegs): dag sems kyis dbang sgyur bar 'gyur gyi/ brtson 'grus kyis dbang sgyur bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin no/ /de dag pa dang dri ma med pa dang kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gnang ba'i byams
250b3(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba 'jug ste/ yang dag pa la zhugs pa yang dag par spong ba la gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i spong ba mnyam pa yin gyi
250b4(dkon brtsegs): mi mnyam pa ma yin no/ /de'i sbyor ba mnyam pa yin gyi mnyam pa ma yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par sbyor ba dang / mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par sgrub pa ste/
250b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir yang dag par spong ba zhes bya'o/ /de ltar yang dag par zhugs pa de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin
250b6(dkon brtsegs): spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i
250b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/ /de byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dun pa yang bar 'gyur ro/ /mi dge
250b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos spong bas brtson 'grus yang bar 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po rab tu thob pas sems yang bar 'gyur ro/ /thabs mkhas pa rab tu thob pas dpyod pa yang bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi
251a1(dkon brtsegs): bu byang chub sems dpa' de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po de dag gis byang chub kyi rnam pa mngon par bsgrubs pas dbang bzhi rab tu 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ tshe la dbang ba 'thob bo/ /
251a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe la dbang ba des 'dod na sems can tshe thung ngu rnams kyi nang du tshe ring po yongs su 'dzin cing sems can de dag yongs su smin par byed pa dang sems can tshe ring po chos bstan na yongs su skyo ba rnams la chos
251a3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pas yongs su tshim par bya ba'i phyir tshe thung ngu yongs su 'dzin pa dang / lha 'am mi gang dang gang du skye ba thams cad du tshe'i tshad la dbang sgyur ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas dbang dang po 'di
251a4(dkon brtsegs): 'thob bo/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas lus la dbang 'thob ste/ lus la dbang ba des yid kyi lus rab tu thob nas lus ci 'dra ba dang / gzugs ci 'dra ba dang / kha dog dang mtshan dang dbyibs dang /
251a5(dkon brtsegs): spyod lam ci 'dra bas sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang / 'dul bar 'gyur ba de 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' de lus dang / gzugs dang kha dog dang mtshan dang dbyibs dang spyod lam kun du ston te/
251a6(dkon brtsegs): de 'dod na sems can thams cad kyi lus dang gzugs dang / kha dog dang mtshan dang dbyibs dang / spyod lam mtshungs par 'gyur ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas dbang gnyis pa 'di 'thob bo/ /rigs kyi
251a7(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas chos la dbang 'thob ste/ chos la dbang ba des 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la rton par 'gyur gyi/ 'jig rten gyi chos la rton par mi 'gyur ba dang / de 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
251a8(dkon brtsegs): la rton kyang 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad du yang snang la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes de las kyang mi g.yo ba dang / gang 'di shes rab dang ye shes chags pa med pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo'i ye shes kyi bdag
251b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang / chos rnam par bsgrubs pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mos par byed cing / gang gis sems can tshad med pa rnams la bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i chos kyi gtam byed pa yin
251b2(dkon brtsegs): te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas dbang gsum pa 'di 'thob bo/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byin gyi rlabs kyi dbang thob ste/ byin gyi rlabs la dbang ba des gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
251b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po de dag thams cad rgya mtsho gcig tu byin gyis brlabs kyang 'dres pa yang med la spyod pa de yang kun tu ston pa dang / gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri'i rgyal po ri rab de dag
251b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ri gcig tu byin gyis brlabs kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu rnams phan tshun 'phros par yang mi shes la spyod pa de yang kun du ston pa dang / stong gsum gyi
251b5(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag ji ltar rin po che'i sa gzhi 'am/ tsan dan gyi sa gzhi 'am/ spos kyi sa gzhi 'am/ me tog gi sa gzhi 'am/ nam mkhar gyur pa 'am/ chus yongs su gang ba 'am/ mes yongs su gang ba 'am/ rin po che
251b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis yongs su gang bar gyur cig ces de ltar byin gyis brlabs na yang de 'dra bar gnas pa dang / de bzhin du byin gyi rlabs thams cad kyis gang ji ltar byin gyis brlabs pa de'i de de ltar 'gyur ba dang / de'i
251b7(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed ma thag tu byin gyi rlabs thams cad de bzhin du kun du gnas pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas dbang bzhi po 'di 'thob bo/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi
251b8(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa bzhi la gnas pa ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig tu gnas shing 'dug cing gtam zer ro/ /de bzhin du tshangs pa thams cad dang / brgya byin thams cad dang 'jig rten skyong ba
252a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad lhan cig tu gnas shing 'dug ste gtam zer ro/ /de ci'i phyir
252a2(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag shin du yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i phyir ro/ /de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus yang bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma dang sbyin
252a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas rnams la ldang ba dang / rim gro byed pa dang gus par sma ba dang phyag 'tshal ba dang / thal mo sbyor zhing 'thun par byed pa dang / ngag yang par bya ba'i phyir bka' blo bde zhing 'thun par 'dzin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin
252a4(dkon brtsegs): du byed pa dang sems yang bar bya ba'i phyir nga rgyal med pa dang / zhe 'gras pa med pa dang bla ma la rim gro byed cing gus pa dang 'dud pa dang rab tu 'dud pa dang / sems las su rung ba dang sems la yongs su gdung ba med pa
252a5(dkon brtsegs): dang spong ba rnams la brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang / bden pa'i brtul zhugs rdzogs par byed pa dang / mi lhod par brtson pa dang dgos pa grub par byed pa dang / snyom las mi byed pa dang sems mi zhum pa dang / 'dod chags rnam par
252a6(dkon brtsegs): sel ba dang / zhe sdang nye bar zhi bar byed pa dang gti mug gi mun pa sel ba dang / 'dod pa med pa dang phrag dog med pa dang / ser sna dang bral ba dang bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa la sbyor ba dang / gzhan gyi dgos pa sgrub cing
252a7(dkon brtsegs): khur khyer ba dang nyam chung ba rnams kyi khur sgrol ba dang / 'dam rdzab la stegs 'dogs pa dang klung la zam pas sgrol ba dang / chu bo la gru sbyor ba dang sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / dga' ba'i
252a8(dkon brtsegs): tshig thos par byed pa dang / gzhan gyi nyes pa mi gleng ba dang / nyes pa byung ba rnams gso bar byed pa dang / 'gyod pa rnams sel ba dang kun nas ldang ba rnams rnam par sel ba dang / khams gang gis 'byung ba khong
252b1(dkon brtsegs): du chud pa dang / phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / byin nas kyang 'gyod pa med pa dang sems can thams cad la lta ba'i phyir byang chub tu sngo ba dang / dad pa sngon du 'gro ba dang gzhan dag dge ba'i rtsa ba yang
252b2(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / bdag bde ba la mi chags pa dang bde ba gzhan la stobs pa dang / bdag gi rnyed pas chog shes pa dang gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog med pa dang / rab tu 'byung ba la gzhol ba dang gzhan dag kyang rab
252b3(dkon brtsegs): tu 'byung ba la mos par byed pa dang / byas pa gzo ba dang byas pa shes pa dang / mdza' ba brtan pa dang mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba la sems mnyam pa dang / rta dang glang po che dang shing rta dang / dpung bu chung sbyin pa dang / ngal ba
252b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams yang dag par spro bar byed pa dang sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / bslabs pa rnams la ston pa tsam du phangs par 'dzin pa dang / ma bslabs pa rnams la mi brnyas pa dang / dbul po rnams la
252b5(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod 'ged pa dang / nad pa rnams kyi g.yog byed pa dang sman sbyin pa dang / byas pa rnams la mi smod pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la rim gro byed pa dang / sti stang mi byed pa rnams la btang snyoms pa dang / 'jig rten
252b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi chos las shin du 'da' ba dang / sdig pa thams cad shin du mi byed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos pa dang / yon tan thams cad bsgrub pa dang / byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba dang dran pa mi
252b7(dkon brtsegs): nyams pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su sbyangs na byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du nyams par mi 'gyur/ yongs su
252b8(dkon brtsegs): nyams par mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na 'di
253a1(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ mi 'phrogs pa dad pa'i dbang po dang / gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa dran pa'i dbang po dang / snying rje chen po mi gtong ba ting nge 'dzin
253a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi dbang po dang / chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin par brtson pa shes rab kyi dbang po'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mos shing dad pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po'o/ /
253a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pas yongs su mi skyo ba ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mi brjed pa ni dran pa'i dbang po'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin
253a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mngon par sgrub pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcad par yongs su bsngos pa ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
253a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dang bsam pa mi phyed par gyur pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po'o/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa khyad par du 'gro ba ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o/ /yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa ni dran pa'i dbang
253a6(dkon brtsegs): po'o/ /sems can thams cad la 'od zer mnyam par gtong ba ni ting 'dzin gyi dbang po'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su shes pa ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang
253a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad chags pa las shin du 'da' bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po'o/ /sems can thams cad chags pa las shin du thar par byed pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o/ /
253a8(dkon brtsegs): gang la yang mi chags pa ni dran pa'i dbang po'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi chags pa mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o/ /gang chags pa dang mi chags pa thams cad shes pa 'di ni shes
253b1(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi dbang po'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang rnyog pa med par 'gyur ba 'di ni dad pa'i dbang po'o/ /sems rnyog pa can dang bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o/ /gang rnyog pa med pa'i chos nyid kyi dran pa mi
253b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dor ba 'di ni dran pa'i dbang po'o/ /gang sems rnyog pa med par ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldang ba shes pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o/ /gang rnyog pa med pa'i chos thob pas rnyog pa can du gyur pa rnams
253b3(dkon brtsegs): rnyog pa med pa'i chos nyid la rab tu 'god pa 'di ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po'o/ /dge ba'i chos thams cad
253b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par sgrub pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o/ /dge ba'i chos bsgrubs pa dang ma bsgrubs pa rnams mi brjed pa ni dran pa'i dbang po'o/ /gang ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba dang bde ba mi 'dod cing sems can
253b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o/ /gang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du so so rang gis shes pa 'di ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o/ /rigs kyi bu
253b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pas ni 'dor ro/ /brtson 'grus kyis ni yang dag par sgrub bo/ /dran pas ni chud mi gzon to/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis ni srung ngo / /shes rab kyis ni rnam par 'byed do/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang
253b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dad pas ni bdag tu 'dzin pa rab tu spong ngo / /brtson 'grus kyis ni bdag gir 'dzin pa 'dor ro/ /dran pas ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba las shin tu 'da'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis ni lta bar gyur pa drug bcu rtsa
253b8(dkon brtsegs): gnyis 'dor ro/ /shes rab kyis ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor bar gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams rab tu spong ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la
254a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang dbang po de dag gis nye bar brtan nas bdud thams cad kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gnyis kyis
254a2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba dang / theg pa chen po 'di las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi thul bar 'gyur ba dang / sngon gyi dam bcas pa la brtan par 'gyur ba dang / sems kyis shin du
254a3(dkon brtsegs): brtan par 'gyur ba dang / lus kyis stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rnams sbed par 'gyur ba dang / dgra rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi bskyod par 'gyur ba'o/ /
254a4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i stobs kyis ni bya ba ma yin pa mi byed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni bya ba byed do/ /dran pa'i stobs kyis ni byas pa'i las chud mi gzon to/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs
254a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa rnams kyis rma mi phyin to/ /shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni 'gyod pa dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad las shin du 'da'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i dad
254a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs kyis ni yang gzhan la dad pas mi 'gro'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni bar ma dor zhum par mi 'gyur ro/ /dran pa'i stobs kyis ni gzungs dang spobs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis
254a7(dkon brtsegs): ni mtshungs par chos ston to/ /shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi the tshom thams cad gcod do/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i stobs kyis ni mos pa'i stobs yongs su
254a8(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni rnam par grol ba'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dran pa'i stobs kyis ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par
