276a2(dkon brtsegs): to/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsung thos nas/ /the tshom ma mchis dbang po tshim/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i rgyur/ /mchog gi spyod pa spyad par bgyi/ /bdag gi spyod pa ci 'dra ba/ /sngon gyi mthar ni rnam
276a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs pa/ /de bas shin du dpag yas par/ /bdag gi spyod pa sbyang bar bgyi/ /'di ni le los mi 'da' bas/ /brtson 'grus brtan pa'i spyod pa 'di/ /zhum pa ma mchis sems kyis su/ /byang chub spyod pa spyad
276a4(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi/ /bdag ni byang chub lung bstan pa/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni spro ba stsal/ /ji srid 'dren par ma gyur pa/ /de srid brtson 'grus mi gtong ngo / /rtag tu byang chub mchog gzhol te/ /sems can thams cad
276a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyer bar bgyi/ /byang chub dam pa don du btsal/ /de dag bdag gis bskyang bar bgyi/ /byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po ches tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa
276a6(dkon brtsegs): g nyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med par skye bar sems kyis smon de tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das nam de bzhin gshegs pa rin
276a7(dkon brtsegs): po che 'byung ba des byang chub thob par gyur pa de na bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar gyur cig ces smras pa dang / de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung bstan to/ /
276a8(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig /chongs shig lhogs shig kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang
276b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig / kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam/ klog pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nga lung ston to/ /
276b2(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la lo stong du ci bzhed ces sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am
276b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnams grangs 'di thos nas mos te/ 'chang ngam klog gam/ de kho na bzhin du nan tan byed na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang ste/ tshad med grangs med par khong du chud par bya'o/ /
276b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar bzung
276b5(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar zung shig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i man ngag ces bya
276b6(dkon brtsegs): bar yang zung shig / gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin chen dang / byang chub sems
276b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag thams cad dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags
276b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka mal shI la dang /
277a1(dkon brtsegs): zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de d+harmA tA shI las bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las
277a2(dkon brtsegs): le'u bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa ste 'phags pa lha mo dpal phreng gi seng ge'i sgra bstan pa/ bam po dang po/ @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya shrI mA la de bi sing ha nA da nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
277a3(dkon brtsegs): lha mo dpal phreng gi seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan
277a4(dkon brtsegs): yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / btsun mo dam pa btsun mo phreng ldan mas lha mo dpal phreng chos
277a5(dkon brtsegs): rtogs nas ring po ma lon pa'i bar skabs su gtam glengs pa/ rgyal po chen po kye ma khyod kyi sras mo lha mo dpal phreng ni 'dzangs shing gsal la zab cing mkhas te/ gal te des bcom ldan 'das mthong ba lta na
277a6(dkon brtsegs): tshegs chung ngus chos rtogs la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa la yang the tshom ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis btsun mo phreng ldan ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
277a7(dkon brtsegs): phreng ldan ma 'u bu cag gis lha mo dpal phreng la pho nya nus pa zhig gtang gor ma chag go/ de skad ces smras pa dang / btsun mo phreng ldan mas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi tshig de mnyan nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal
277a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / btsun mo phreng ldan mas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa rnam pa du ma bris te/ nang kor ma yid brtan pa zla ba lta bu zhes bya ba de'i lag tu phrin yig bskur nas de mthar gyis song ste/ grong khyer 'thab
277b1(dkon brtsegs): med du phyin nas btsun mo'i 'khor du song ste/ lha mo dpal phreng la phyag 'tshal nas phan tshun kun dga' ba'i gtam byas te lha mo dpal phreng gi lag tu phrin yig byin no/ /de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis pha ma la gus
277b2(dkon brtsegs): pas phrin yig de lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas mgo la gtugs te bdag nyid kyis phrin yig bklags nas/ phrin yig gi don bzang ngo zhes nges par bzung ste/ don du nges par bzung nas mgo gcogs te ya
277b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan du bzung nas lha mo dpal phreng gis nang kor ma zla ba lta bu la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas zhes bya'i sgra 'di ni/ /'jig rten dag na shin tu dkon/ /gal te tshig 'di bden gyur na/ /bdag
277b4(dkon brtsegs): gis khyod la bgo ba sbyin/ /gal te bcom ldan sangs rgyas de/ /'jig rten don du byung gyur na/ /de ni bdag la thugs rje yis/ /bstan pa'i ched du 'dir sbyin cig /de nas de yi skad cig la/ /mgo bo gshegs
277b5(dkon brtsegs): nas mkha' la bzhugs/ /bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas sku/ /'od zer 'gyed cing bzhugs pa mthong / /de nas de tshe lha mo ni/ /gus pas 'khor bcas langs nas kyang / /spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /
277b6(dkon brtsegs): smra ba'i mchog la bstod pa ni/ /mgon po khyod kyi sku gzugs dang / /dpal dpe gang na 'ang yod ma mchis/ /bsam yas dpe zla ma mchis pa'i/ /'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon po khyod kyi sku
277b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang / /ye shes la yang bsam mchis/ /khyod kyi sangs rgyas chos mi bas/ /de bas thub khyod skyabs kyang lags/ /bsam yas rtsal ldan khyod kyis ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi skyon rnams bsal/ /
277b8(dkon brtsegs): nyams ma mchis pa'i sa brnyes pa/ /chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes bya thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen/ /ye shes sku yi dbang phyug ste/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /mthar phyin
278a1(dkon brtsegs): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhal yas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpe las 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsam yas chos khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtha' yas gzugs khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /
278a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni da ltar mgon pos bskyabs/ /byang chub sa bon rnam par bskyed/ /slan chad srid pa gzhan dag tu/ /thub pas bdag la phan gdags mdzod/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sngon tshe
278a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams su lha mo khyod/ /ngas ni byang chub sbyor ba byas/ /phyis kyang tshe rabs gzhan dag tu/ /ngas ni rjes su gzung bar bya/ /lha mo dpal phreng gis gsol pa/ /bdag gis 'di dang gzhan dag tu/ /bsod nams
278a4(dkon brtsegs): gang dang gang bgyis pa/ /bsod nams de yis mgon po khyod/ /rtag tu bdag gis mthong bar shog /de nas lha mo dpal phreng dang lhan cig tu btsun mo kun dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs
278a5(dkon brtsegs): so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa'i nang du lha mo dpal phreng bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ lha mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa'i
278a6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan dag gis mngon par bstod pa'i bsod nams bsags pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis lha mo khyod bskal pa tshad med grangs med par lha dang mi'i rgyal srid phun sum tshogs pa myong bar 'gyur te/ tshe rabs thams cad du yang nga mthong ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur zhing /
278a7(dkon brtsegs): nga la mngon sum du 'di lta bu'i bstod pa bsngags pas bsngags par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs
278a8(dkon brtsegs): med pa dag la yang mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /da phyin chad bskal pa brgya stong phrag grangs med pa nyi shu na khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du bzang po zhes
278b1(dkon brtsegs): bya bar 'gyur te/ de'i tshe yang lha mo khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ngan song dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe sems can rnams kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag la
278b2(dkon brtsegs): nad kyang med rga ba yang med/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i gnod pa yang med de/ mi dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams kyi ming yang mi grags par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag 'byung ba de dag gis ni
278b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang 'di ltar bde ba dang / gzugs dang kha dog dang dpal dang gzi rjid dang / gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / longs spyod thams cad kyis zil gyis non par 'gyur te/
278b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag shin tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lha mo sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /lha mo de bzhin du
278b5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba dag byas pa'i sems can rnams de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha mo dpal phreng gi lung bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa thos nas lha dang mi dpag tu med pa dag gis
278b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab bo/ /de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to/ /de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis bcom ldan 'das las mngon sum
278b7(dkon brtsegs): du bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas thal mo sbyar te yi dam chen po bcu yang dag par blangs so/ /bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis tshul khrims kyi dus las 'da' ba'i sems
278b8(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam dang po 'di ni byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis bla ma dag la ma gus pa'i
279a1(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam gnyis pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis gang du yang
279a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can la khro ba dang / gnod sems kyi sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam gsum pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das
279a3(dkon brtsegs): da slan chad bdag gis gzhan gyi dpal dang / gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa dag la phrag dog gi sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam bzhi pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag
279a4(dkon brtsegs): gis yang dag par blang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis tha na kham slang ma tsam la yang ser sna'i sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam lnga pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar
279a5(dkon brtsegs): thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis bdag nyid kyis longs spyad pa'i slad du nor yongs su bzung bar mi bgyi ste/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das sems can
279a6(dkon brtsegs): dbul po sdug bsngal zhing mgon ma mchis pa yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du yongs su gzung bar 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam drug pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis
279a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par blang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pas na bdag la sman du re ba'i slad du sems can bsdu bar mi bgyi ste/ 'on kyang
279a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems dang / chog par mi 'dzin pa dang ldog pa ma mchis par sems can yang dag par bsdu bar 'tshal de/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam bdun pa 'di yang byang chub
279b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis sems can mgon ma mchis pa dang / go rar stsal pa dang bcings pa dang nad kyis
279b2(dkon brtsegs): nyam thag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / dbul po dang phongs par gyur pa dang / tshegs chen pos 'tsho ba dag mthong na/ de dag la sman ma btags par gom pa gcig kyang dor bar mi bgyi'i/ bcom ldan 'das
279b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sems can sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa de dag mthong na sdug bsngal de dang de dag las yongs su thar par bgyis la nor gyi bsdu bas bsgrubs nas slad kyis bdag mchi bar bgyis te/ bcom ldan
279b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das yi dam brgyad pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis phag 'tshong dang / bya ba la sogs pa sdig pa'i las kyis 'tsho
279b5(dkon brtsegs): zhing de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa'i chos 'dul ba las nyams pa'i chos can dag mthong na yal bar mi dor gyi/ bcom ldan 'das grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal
279b6(dkon brtsegs): po'i pho brang 'khor gang dang gang dag na bdag gis mchid nyan pa de dang de dag tu tshar dgum pa'i rigs pa rnams la ni tshar dgum/ sman gdags pa'i rigs pa rnams la ni sman gdags par 'tshal la/
279b7(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das tshar dgum pa dang / sman gdags pas ni 'jig rten du dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba'i slad du ste/ dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas na lha dang mi rnams kyi
279b8(dkon brtsegs): lus rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing ngan song rnams yongs su 'grib par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rjes su skor bar bgyid pa lags te/
280a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das yi dam dgu pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba las
280a2(dkon brtsegs): bskyud par mi bgyi/ sems gcig tsam yang bskyed par mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos bzung ba las bskyud na theg pa chen po bskyud par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das
280a3(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po bskyud na pha rol du phyin pa bskyud par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das pha rol du phyin pa bskyud na theg pa chen po las mi 'dun par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
280a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po gang theg pa chen po las ma nges pa de ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la mi 'dun par 'gyur zhing rang nyam du gnas par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sar mchi ba'i skal pa
280a5(dkon brtsegs): can du 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis nyes dmigs dang / gnod pa chen por mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa las ni bdag dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub
280a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi phan yon dpag tu ma mchis pa'i don yongs su grub par mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i yi dam bcu pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar
280a7(dkon brtsegs): du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi yi dam chen po bcu po 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar blangs pa lags te/ 'di la chos kyi rje nyid bdag gi dbang du gyur pa lags so/ /
280a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ston pa mngon sum du gyur du lags kyang sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu la la dag kye ma yi dam chen po bcu po 'di dag ni lcogs par dka'o snyam du bdag la the tshom za 'am/ yid gnyis 'tshal
280b1(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis yun ring por gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang phung bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag nyid la sman gdags pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs 'di
280b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi bar 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis yi dam chen po bcu po gang dag blangs pa'i yi dam chen po 'di dag la bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur ba lta na/ bcom ldan
280b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag gi bden pa'i tshig 'dis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir lha'i me tog char 'bab par gyur cig / lha'i sgra grag par gyur cig /des kyang bdag gi bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs 'di len par gyur cig /lha mo dpal phreng gis
280b4(dkon brtsegs): tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i tshe lha'i me tog gi char chen po bab nas par snang las lha'i sgra grag par gyur te/ des bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs de mnos nas lha mo de de bzhin no/ /ji ltar khyod kyis bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs
280b5(dkon brtsegs): byas pa de ni de bzhin du 'gyur te gzhan du ma yin no zhes byas so/ /de nas rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul de yang mthong / lha'i sgra mnos pa de yang thos nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor the tshom med cing mchog tu dga' bar
280b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ lha mo dpal phreng dang mi 'bral zhing 'grogs par smon lam btab bo/ /'khor de thams cad kyang de bzhin du 'bral bar mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to/ /de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis bcom
280b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar smon lam chen po gsum btab bo/ /gsum gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs 'dis sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa bdag la sman btags pa gang lags
280b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsod nams bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des bcom ldan 'das bdag tshe rabs thams cad du dam pa'i chos rtogs pa thob par gyu cig / bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi smon lam chen po dang po lags so/ /
281a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dam pa'i chos rtogs pa de thob nas kyang ngal ba dang yongs su skyo ba ma mchis par sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi smon
281a2(dkon brtsegs): lam chen po gnyis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dam pa'i chos bstan pa de yang lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos bsrung ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom
281a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi smon lam chen po gsum pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni smon lam chen po gsum po de dag 'debs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal phreng gi smon lam chen po
281a4(dkon brtsegs): yul che ba gsum po 'di dag lung ston pa mdzad de/ lha mo 'di lta ste dper na gzugs su gtogs pa thams cad ni nam mkha'i khams kyi khongs su 'dus shing khongs su gtogs la khongs su chud do/ /lha mo de bzhin
281a5(dkon brtsegs): du byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang smon lam chen po 'di gsum gyi khongs su 'dus shing khongs su gtogs la khongs su chud de/ smon lam chen po gsum po de dag ni de ltar yul che'o/ /
281a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di la smon lam chen po'i yul bstan pa gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag gis spobs lags so/ /
281a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gis khyod spobs par gyis shig de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang
281a8(dkon brtsegs): c hub sems dpa'i smon lam gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang dag lags pa de dag thams cad kyang 'di ltar dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i smon lam chen po gcig gi khongs su 'dus shing khongs su chud de
281b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar yul che ba lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal phreng la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo legs so legs so/ /lha mo khyod
281b2(dkon brtsegs): ni shes rab zab pa ste/ thabs kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i shes rab dang ldan no/ /lha mo sems can gang dag khyod kyis chos bstan pa'i don rtogs pa de dag ni dkon pa yin te/ yun ring po nas sangs rgyas du ma la
281b3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed bskyed pa yin no/ /lha mo khyod kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba bstan pa ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis
281b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba bstan pa de nyid bshad do/ /'chad do 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /lha mo nga yang da ltar mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog thob nas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba bstan pa rnam pa du
281b5(dkon brtsegs): mar ston te/ lha mo de ltar dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba bstan pa ngas rnam pa du mar bshad kyang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan rnams kyi mtha' 'am mu thug pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
281b6(dkon brtsegs): slobs pa la yang mtha' 'am mu thug pa med do/ /lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar don che'o/ /lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar phan yon che'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha
281b7(dkon brtsegs): mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus don chen po bstan pa gzhan yang bdag gis spobs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo da de'i dus
281b8(dkon brtsegs): la bab par shes na khyod spobs par gyis shig / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin
282a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu ma mchis pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos kyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong
282a2(dkon brtsegs): sdud pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das dper na 'chags pa'i dus kyi tshe'i sprin chen po'i ni kha dog mtha' yas pa'i rgyun dang / rin po che'i mtha' yas pa'i rgyun dang ldan pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de
282a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yang bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i chab kyi rgyun dpag tu ma mchis pa dang / ye shes rin po che'i rgyun dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa lags so/ /bcom ldan
282a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das dper na 'chags pa'i dus kyi tshe chab kyi phung po chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi skye gnas de las ni gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kha dog sna tshogs pa dang / dbyibs sna tshogs
282a5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'byung zhing / 'khor gling phran bye ba brgya phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi chab kyi phung po chen po de las 'byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa theg pa chen po yang dag par 'grub
282a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'byung khungs dang / skye gnas su gyur pa de las byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad dang / chos snang ba'i sgo rnam pa sna tshogs dang / 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /
282a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug thams cad dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba lha dang mi rnams gyis sngon ma myong ba gang lags pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das dper na sa chen po ni khur
282a8(dkon brtsegs): chen po bzhi'i rten bgyid pa lags te/ bzhi po de dag gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chab kyi phung po chen po rgya mtsho dang / ri mang po thams cad dang gnas pa dang rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang sman dang me tog dang / nags tshal
282b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang / sems can gyi tshogs thams cad kyi rten bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sa chen po khur chen po bzhi po 'di dag gi rten bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
282b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po bzhi khyer ba lags so/ /bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu ba 'am rigs kyi bu mo sems can dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang
282b3(dkon brtsegs): bral zhing thos pa dang mi ldan la chos can ma lags pa rnams lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par bgyid pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la sbyor ba ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba lags so/ /
282b4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo sems can kha cig nyan thos kyi theg pa la sbyor bar bgyid pa ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba lags so/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo sems can kha cig
282b5(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor bar bgyid pa ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba lags so/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo sems can kha cig theg pa chen po la sbyor bar bgyid pa ni sa chen
282b6(dkon brtsegs): po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bzhi po de dag ni khur chen po lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni khur chen
282b7(dkon brtsegs): po 'di bzhi khyer ba lags te/ sa chen po bas kyang ches rten du gyur pa dang / sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba dang / khur mtha' yas pa khyer ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi gzhi rten du gyur pa
282b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / byams pa bgyis pa dang snying rje can dang / sman par 'tshal ba dang snying brtse ba dang / chos kyis 'jig rten gyi ma zhes bgyi ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das dper na sa chen po ni rin po che sna bzhi'i 'byung gnas
283a1(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ sna bzhi po de dag gang zhe na/ rin po che rin thang mchis pa dag gi 'byung gnas dang / rin po che rin thang mchis pa dag gi 'byung gnas dang / rin po che de bas chung ba dag gi 'byung gnas dang /
283a2(dkon brtsegs): rin po che de bas kyang chung ba dag gi 'byung gnas lags te bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sa chen po rin po che sna bzhi po 'di dag gi 'byung gnas su gyur pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dam
283a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brten nas sems can rnams kyis rin po che'i mchog chen po rin po che thams cad kyi dam par gyur pa bzhi'i khe rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na dge ba'i bshes gnyen
283a4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la brten nas sems can rnams kyis lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par bgyid pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi khe rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg par
283a5(dkon brtsegs): nye bar 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thob par bgyi ba rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par nye bar 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thob par bgyi ba rnyed pa 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
283a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas su nye bar 'gro ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chos mthon po thob par bgyi ba rnyed par 'gyur ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brten
283a7(dkon brtsegs): nas sems can rnams kyis rin po che thams cad kyi mchog ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i rin po che chen po bzhi'i khe rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das gter chen po rin po che mtha' yas pa'i 'byung gnas
283a8(dkon brtsegs): zhes bgyi ba de ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bgyi ba ni bcom ldan 'das dam
283b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos kyang gzhan ma lags la/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid dam pa'i chos lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das pha rol
283b2(dkon brtsegs): du phyin pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa nyid pha rol du phyin pa rnams lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
283b3(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni sems can gang dag sbyin pas yongs su smin par bgyi ba de dag ni sbyin pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/ tha na lus kyi yan
283b4(dkon brtsegs): lag dang nying lag yongs su gtong bas kyang yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pa rnams dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan
283b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das sems can gang dag tshul khrims kyis yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni dbang po drug bsdams pa dang / lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/ tha na
283b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod lam gyis kyang de dag gi sems bsrung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de dag de lta de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa lags so/ /
283b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag bzod pas yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag la ni de dag gis de la spyos brgyad de gtse bar bgyis kyang gnod sems ma mchis shing sman par 'tshal ba dang /
283b8(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i stobs dam pa dang ldan pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/ tha na bzhin gyi mdangs kyis kyang de dag gi sems srung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de dag yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas
284a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag brtson 'grus kyis yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni sems ma zhum zhing le lo ma mchis
284a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'dun pa chen po dang brtson 'grus rtsom pa mchog dang ldan pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/ tha na rang gi spyod lam bsgrims pas kyang de dag gi sems srung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/
284a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag bsam gtan gyis
284a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni sems mi g.yeng ba dang / yid phyi rol du mi rgyu ba dang / dran pa 'khrul pa ma mchis pa mchog dang ldan pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/ tha na bgyis nas
284a5(dkon brtsegs): yun ring du lags pa dang / smras nas yun ring du lags pa mi bskyud pas kyang de dag gi sems srung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de dag de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par
284a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag shes rab kyis yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni sems can gyi don 'dri ba dag la
284a7(dkon brtsegs): le lo ma mchis par lung ston pa dang / bstan bcos thams cad dang / rig pa dang bzo'i gnas thams cad kyi mthar phyin pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/ tha na bzo grwa'i gnas chen po dag tu yang de dag gi sems
284a8(dkon brtsegs): srung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de dag de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas pha rol du phyin
284b1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags la/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid pha rol du phyin pa rnams lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
284b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus don chen po bstan pa gzhan yang bdag gis spobs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gi khyod spobs par gyis shig /de nas
284b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po zhes bgyi ba ni bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos
284b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa yang gzhan ma lags la/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa lags so/ /
284b5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa des ni bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du yan lag gsum yongs su gtong bar
284b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lus dang srog dang longs spyod rnams te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo lus yongs su gtong bas ni sangs rgyas kyi sku 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mu dang mnyam pa rga ba
284b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / na pa dang 'chi ba dang bral ba mi shigs pa/ rtag pa brtan pa zhi ba/ ther zug pa 'chi 'pho dang bral ba/ mtha' yas pa/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am
284b8(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo srog yongs su gtong bas ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par 'phrul bar gnas pa 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mu dang mnyam pa 'chi 'pho dang bral ba/ mtha' yas pa rtag pa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
285a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo longs spyod yongs su gtong bas ni sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mu dang mnyam pa/
285a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa/ bas par mi 'gyur ba/ rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa/ rtag par rgyun mi 'chad cing rtag tu gnas pa/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan
285a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yan lag gsum po 'di dag yongs su gtong bas ni yon tan shin du rmad du byung ba gsum po de dag thob par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas thams cad
285a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang lung ston par mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma rnams bye zhing gnyis su gyur la sde
285a5(dkon brtsegs): sder chad de/ phyogs phyogs su gyes nas rtsod par gyur pa na g.yo ma mchis shing gya gyu ma mchis la sgyu ma mchis par chos la dga' zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du chos can gyi phyogs la 'jug par bgyid na
285a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de zhugs pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad las lung bstan pa nges par thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar brtson 'grus
285a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po lags pa snyam pa dag bgyid de/ 'di la bcom ldan 'das nyid spyan du gyur pa lags te/ ye shes su gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni mnga' bdag lags/
285a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ni ston pa lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal phreng gis dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa bstan pa la rjes su yi rang ba mdzad de/ lha mo de de bzhin te/ lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni brtson
285b1(dkon brtsegs): 'grus chen po yin no/ /lha mo dper na mi stobs dang ldan pas gnad du mi drag par bsnun du zin kyang snang bar 'gyur zhing nad skyed par byed do/ /lha mo de bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni chung du zin kyang bdud sdig can la gnod par
285b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing mya ngan skyed la smre sngags 'don par byed do/ /lha mo ngas ni bdud sdig can la dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ji ltar gnod par 'gyur zhing mya ngan skyed la smre sngags 'don par byed pa de ltar gnod par 'gyur ba dang / de ltar
285b3(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan skyed pa dang de ltar smre sngags 'don par byed pa'i dge ba'i chos gzhan gcig kyang ma mthong ngo / /lha mo dper na pa lang gi mchog khyu mchog gis ni 'di ltar 'phang mtho' ba dang chu zheng gis pa lang gi tshogs thams cad
285b4(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis mnan te mngon par brjid cing yang dag par mngon par brjid do/ /lha mo de bzhin du theg pa chen po pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yang chung du zin kyang 'di ltar rgyas pa dang / rgya chen por gyur pas nyan thos dang
285b5(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /lha mo dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyis ni 'di ltar mtho ba dang / rgya che bas ri nag po thams cad zil gyis gnon cing mngon par lhag
285b6(dkon brtsegs): ger 'dug go/ lha mo de bzhin du theg pa chen po pa'i lus dang srog la mi lta zhing / phan gdags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yang 'di ltar rgyas pa dang rgya chen por gyur pas theg pa chen po pa
285b7(dkon brtsegs): theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa lus dang srog la lta ba rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad zil gyis gnon na gzhan dag gi lta ci smos te/ lha mo de bas na sems can rnams dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba nyid yang
285b8(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/ yang dag par bstan par bya yang dag par gzeng bstod par bya/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya gzung bar bya dgod par bya'o/ /lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar don che'o/ /
286a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar 'bras bu che'o/ /de ltar phan yon che'o/ /lha mo gal te bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med par dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan dang phan yon ngas bshad du zin kyang lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin
286a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan dang / phan yon bshad pa de dag gi mtha' 'am mu thug par mi 'gyur ro/ /lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar yon tan mtha' yas pa dang ldan no/ /lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba sangs
286a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas thams cad kyis bzhed pa ngas bstan pa deng khyod kyis bshad pa spobs par gyis shig / de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul ba mnos te/
286a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos zhes bgyi ba de ni theg pa chen po'i tshig bla dgas so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
286a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad ni theg pa chen pos rab tu phye ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na klung chen po bzhi ni mtsho ma dros pa las 'byung ngo / /
286a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad kyang theg pa chen po las 'byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das dper na sa bon gyi
286a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa gang ci yang lags pa dag dang / rtswa dang shing gel ba dang sman dang / nags tshal de dag thams cad ni sa chen po la rten cing sa chen po la gnas te skye zhing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du nyan
286a8(dkon brtsegs): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gang lags pa dag dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags pa de dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po la rten cing theg pa chen po la gnas te skye zhing 'phel la
286b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas par 'gyur ro bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas theg pa chen po la gnas shing theg pa chen po yongs su bzung na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
286b2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos thams cad kyang rten cing gnas te yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa dang / dam pa'i chos nub pa dang / so sor thar pa dang 'dul ba dang rab tu 'byung
286b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa gnas drug po 'di dag dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan cing btags pa gang lags pa'i gnas drug po de dag kyang theg pa chen po'i dgongs pa las byung ba lags so/ /de ci'i slad du
286b4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos gnas pa zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa 'di ni theg pa chen po'i dgongs pa can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po gnas pa nyid ni dam pa'i chos gnas pa lags
286b5(dkon brtsegs): so/ /bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa 'di ni theg pa chen po'i dgongs pa can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po nub pa nyid ni dam pa'i chos nub pa lags
286b6(dkon brtsegs): so/ /bcom ldan 'das so sor thar pa dang 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba'i chos 'di gnyis ni don gcig ste/ yi ge'i 'bru ni tha dad lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni theg pa chen po pa rnams
286b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bslab pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi slad du rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa lags pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags pas 'di ltar 'dul
286b8(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bgyi ba dang rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa 'di ni theg pa chen po'i cho ga'i tshul khrims kyi phung po lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa
287a1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi slad du rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni ma mchis kyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi slad du
287a2(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa lags pa'i slad du 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang de bzhin
287a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa nyid la skyabs su mchi ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
287a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'du byed thams cad la mi bzad par 'jigs pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa lags pa'i slad du 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dper na gshed mas
287a5(dkon brtsegs): ral gri gzas pa bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas de dag kyang nges par 'byung ba shin du bde ba thob pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ skyabs su gyur pa ni skyabs gzhan
287a6(dkon brtsegs): tshol ba ma mchis pa'i slad du 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems can skyabs ma mchis pa rnams gang dang gang gis 'jigs skrag pa de dang de las 'byung ba tshol ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das dgra
287a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la yang 'jigs pa de mchis te/ 'jigs pa des skrags pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la skyabs
287a8(dkon brtsegs): su mchi bar khas len pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas
287b1(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang skye ba'i chos kyi lhag ma dang bcas pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gi skye ba ma pas pa yang mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bsten par bgyi ba'i
287b2(dkon brtsegs): lhag ma dang bcas pa lags te/ des na de dag ni dag pa ma lags/ las mthar phyin pa ma lags te de dag gi bgyi ba mang lags so/ /de dag gi spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gzhan yang mang du mchis te/ de dag
287b3(dkon brtsegs): ma spangs pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings dang ring ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin
287b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pas
287b5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa lags la/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das yongs su
287b6(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
287b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pas yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa lags la/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan bsam
287b8(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/
288a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pas spang bar bgyi ba'i skyon thams cad spangs shing
288a2(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa lags la/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni skyon gyi lhag ma rnams dang bcas pa/ yongs su ma dag pa'i chos
288a3(dkon brtsegs): can lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
288a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas
288a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings dang ring ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnam par grol ba la so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi mtha' dbugs
288a6(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa rjes su dran pa bzhi po gang lags pa de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa can dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / drang ba'i don dang rnam par phye ste lung bstan par bgyi ba lags so/ /de ci'i slad
288a7(dkon brtsegs): du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'chi 'pho ni 'di gnyis lags te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ rgyun chad pa'i 'chi 'pho dang / yongs su bsngos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'chi 'pho lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de la
288a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyun chad pa'i 'chi 'pho ni nying mtshams sbyor ba dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das yongs su bsngos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'chi 'pho ni dgra bcom pa rnams
288b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang thob pa dang / yid kyi lus rnams lags te/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
288b2(dkon brtsegs): de la 'chi 'pho 'di gnyis las rgyun chad pa'i 'chi 'pho'i dbang du bgyis te/ bdag gi skye ba zad do snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lags so/ /bcom ldan
288b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das de ltar lhag ma dang bcas pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis pa la brten nas bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa bsten to snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung
288b4(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /byis pa so so'i skye bo dang lha dang mi bgyi ba dang bcas pa thams cad dang / slob pa bdun po dag gis nying mtshams sbyor ba dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spang pa sngon ma bgyis pa de
288b5(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa la brten nas bya ba byas so snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes bgyi ba
288b6(dkon brtsegs): ni dgra bcom pas spang par bgyi ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang / yang srid par nying mtshams sbyor ba'i dbang du bgyis nas 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang
288b7(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so snyam pa'i shes pa de yang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa yang ma lags/ skye ba thams
288b8(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su 'tshal ba las byung ba yang ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la yang nyon mongs pa rnams ma spangs pa
289a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / skye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su ma 'tshal ba yang mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa dag ni rnam pa gnyis te/ gnas kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang /
289a2(dkon brtsegs): kun nas ldang ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das gnas kyi sa yang rnam pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lta ba gcig la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa dang / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa dang /
289a3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa dang / srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gnas kyi sa bzhi po de dag gis nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang ba thams
289a4(dkon brtsegs): cad skyed lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang skad gcig pa ste/ sems kyi skad cig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas
289a5(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa ni sems dang mi ldan pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gnas kyi sa bzhi po 'di dag gi nang na stobs che ba gang lags pa de ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa ma rig pa'i
289a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyi sa stobs che ba'i grangs sam/ cha 'am/ bgrang ba 'am/ dpe 'am/ rgyur yang mi bzod lags so/ /bcom 'das de ltar na ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ni stobs che ba lags te/ srid pa'i
289a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags la gnas pa'i sa zhes kyang bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dper na bdud sdig can ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du gtogs kyang 'di ltar gzugs dang / kha dog dang / gzi
289a8(dkon brtsegs): brjid dang / stobs dang / 'khor dang / dbang phyug gis gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams zil gyis gnon to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du ma rigs pa'i gnas kyi sa srid pa'i 'dod chags
289b1(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa zhes bgyi bas kyang gnas kyi sa bzhi po 'di dag zil gyis gnon te/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed kyi rten du gyur pa dang / nyon mongs pa bzhi
289b2(dkon brtsegs): dang yang yun ring po nas lhan cig gnas pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pas mi rdzi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par bgyi ba lags te/ bcom
289b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ni stobs che ba lags so/ / // bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/ bcom ldan 'das dper na len pa'i rkyen gyis zag pa dang bcas pa'i las kyi rgyu las byung ba'i srid
289b4(dkon brtsegs): pa gsum 'byung ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa'i rkyen gyis zag pa ma mchis pa'i las kyi rgyu las byung ba'i dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /
289b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dbang thob pa rnams kyi yid kyi lus gsum 'byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ni gsum po 'di dag tu yid kyi lus gsum po 'di dag 'byung ba dang /
289b6(dkon brtsegs): zag pa ma mchis pa'i las mngon par sgrub pa'i rten lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das rkyen ma mchis pa na rkyen 'byung ste/ de lta lags pas ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ni yid kyi lus gsum po rnams
289b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / zag pa ma mchis pa'i las kyi rkyen lags pa'i slad du srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa dang mi 'dra ba lags so/ /de lta lags kyang srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i
289b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyi sa dang las thun mong ba ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa bzhi po dag las tha dad pa kho na lags te/ yongs su grol ba'i sa pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sas
290a1(dkon brtsegs): spang bar bgyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par bgyi ba lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas
290a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis ni gnas kyi sa bzhi spangs kyang zag pa zad pa la dbang ba'i stobs kyang mi 'thob/ mngon sum du yang mi bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das zag pa zad pa zhes bgyi ba de ni ma rig pa'i gnas
290a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi sa'i tshig bla dgas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / srid pa tha ma par gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
290a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sas bsgribs shing chod la yongs su dkris te ldongs par bgyis pas chos de dang de dag rab tu ma 'tshal cing mi rtogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das chos de dang de dag ma 'tshal
290a5(dkon brtsegs): cing ma mthong bas spang bar bgyi ba'i chos de dang de dag mi spongs shing byang bar mi bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das spang par bgyi ba'i chos de dag ma spangs shing byang bar ma bgyis pas bcom ldan
290a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de dag skyon las rnam par grol ba lhag ma dang bcas pa lags kyi/ skyon thams cad las rnam par grol ba ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de dag ni rnam par dag pa lhag ma dang
290a7(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i chos can lags kyi/ thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos can ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de dag ni lhag ma dang bcas pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa lags kyi/ yon tan
290a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang ldan pa ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang dag skyon las rnam par grol ba lhag ma dang bcas pa lags kyi/ skyon thams cad las rnam par grol ba ni ma lags pa dang /
290b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pa lhag ma dang bcas pa'i chos can lags kyi/ thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos can ni ma lags pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa lags kyi/ yon tan thams cad
290b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa ni ma lags pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal yongs su 'tshal ba lhag ma dang bcas pa lags so/ /sdug bsngal 'gog pa mngon sum du bgyis pa lhag ma dang bcas pa
290b3(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam bsgoms pa lhag ma dang bcas pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang dang sdug bsngal yongs su 'tshal ba lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / sdug
290b4(dkon brtsegs): bsngal kun 'byung ba spangs pa lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa mngon sum du bgyis pa lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam bsgoms pa lhag
290b5(dkon brtsegs): ma dang bcas pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das de'i yan lag gi mya ngan las 'das pa dang / de'i yan lag gi mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de dag ni mya ngan las
290b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i dbyings su zhugs pa zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gang dag sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su 'tshal ba dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba thams cad spangs pa dang / sdug
290b7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal 'gog pa thams cad mngon sum du bgyis pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam thams cad bsgoms pa gang lags pa de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pas
290b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom zhing rtag tu na pa'i 'jig rten du rtag pa dang / zhi ba dang bsil ba'i dngos po'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das de dag ni skyob pa ma mchis pa dang / skyabs ma
291a1(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i 'jig rten na/ 'jig rten gyi skyob pa dang / skyabs lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bzang ngan du 'byed pa'i chos can dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa thob
291a2(dkon brtsegs): pa lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes mnyam pa dag gis mya ngan las 'das pa thob/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par grol ba mnyam pa dag gis mya ngan las 'das pa thob/ bcom ldan
291a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnam par dag pa'i ye shes gzigs pa mnyam pa dag gis mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni ro gcig
291a4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'di ltar rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i ror ro mtshungs pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang la la dag ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ma spangs shing byang bar ma bgyis pa de dag ni bcom
291a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su ro gcig pa ma lags te/ 'di ltar rig pa dang rnam par grol bar ro mtshungs pa ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig
291a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas kyi sa ma spangs shing ma sbyangs pas ni spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed ma spangs shing ma sbyangs pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das spang bar
291a7(dkon brtsegs): b gyi ba'i chos gang gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed de dag ma spangs shing ma sbyangs pas chos gang gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed ma thob cing mngon sum du ma bgyis par gyur pa'i
291a8(dkon brtsegs): slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ni sgom pas spang bar bgyi ba'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i 'byung gnas lags te/ bcom ldan
291b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das de las ni sems kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / zhi gnas kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / lhag mthong gi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / bsam gtan gyis nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / ting nge
291b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / rnal 'byor gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / shes pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / 'bras bu'i nye ba'i nyon
291b3(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa dang / rtogs pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / stobs kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yang 'byung lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das nye ba'i nyon mongs
291b4(dkon brtsegs): pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa las 'byung ba lags so/ /bcom ldan
291b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad kyi rgyu dang / gzhi dang / rkyen lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kun nas ldang ba gang lags pa de dag ni
291b6(dkon brtsegs): skad cig pa ste/ sems kyi skad cig pa dang mtshungs par ldan lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas mchis pa ni sems dang mi ldan pa lags
291b7(dkon brtsegs): so/ /bcom ldan 'das spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom zhing spang bar bgyi ba'i chos de
291b8(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad kyi gzhi dang rten ni 'di ltar ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das dper na sa bon gyi rnam pa gang ci lags pa dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang /
292a1(dkon brtsegs): nags tshal de dag thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das sa la brten cing sa la gnas te skye zhing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sa chen po tshig cing zhig la mi gda'
292a2(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur te ma mchis par gyur na ni sa bon gyi rnam pa gang ci lags pa dag dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal de dag thams cad kyang tshig cing zhig la mi gda' bar 'gyur zhing ma
292a3(dkon brtsegs): mchis par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par
292a4(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa la rten cing ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa la gnas te skye zhing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas
292a5(dkon brtsegs): k yi sa spangs shing sbyangs te ma mchis par gyur na ni spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par bgyi
292a6(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag thams cad kyang spangs shing sbyangs te ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de dag thams cad spangs shing sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam
292a7(dkon brtsegs): g yis mi khyab pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed brnyes pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis chos thams cad la sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa brnyes te thams
292a8(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa dang / thams cad gzigs pa dang / skyon thams cad spangs pa dang / yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa dang / chos kyi rgyal po/ chos kyi dbang phyug /chos thams cad la
292b1(dkon brtsegs): mnga' sgyur ba'i sar gshegs nas nga'i skye ba zad do/ /tshangs par spyad pa bsten to/ /bya ba byas so/ /'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das
292b2(dkon brtsegs): de lta lags pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi seng ge'i sgra 'di ni nges pa'i don lags te/ don 'di ni mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bgyi ba yang lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu nyid
292b3(dkon brtsegs): las gzhan mi shes so zhes bgyi ba'i ye shes la yang rnam pa gnyis te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rgyal ba bla na ma mchis pas bdud bzhi bcom ste
292b4(dkon brtsegs): pham par mdzad nas chos kyi sku 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa sems can thams cad kyis blta bar bgyi ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa brnyes te/ shes bya'i sa thams cad la
292b5(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi dbang phyug mdzad pa na 'di las lhag par bya ba 'am/ rtogs par bya ba'i sa med do zhes yang dag par gzigs te/ stobs bcu po dag gi stobs dang ldan zhing
292b6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs pa'i sa bla na med pa'i mchog tu yang dag par gshegs te/ shes bya thams cad la sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par gzigs nas 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes
292b7(dkon brtsegs): so zhes bgyi ba'i ye shes kyis seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las rgal ba de ma thag tu rnam par grol ba
292b8(dkon brtsegs): dag gi bde ba nyams su myong ba rnams ni 'di ltar bdag ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rnams las yongs su grol gyis/ bdag gis ni phyin chad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur ro snyam
293a1(dkon brtsegs): du yang dag par mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes bgyi ba rtogs nas dbugs phyin pa'i mchog mya ngan las 'das
293a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sa la so sor rtog go/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rtogs nas kyang sa de la rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par
293a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis ni 'di ltar lhag ma dang bcas pa'i sa thob ste/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to snyam du 'tshal to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
293a4(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par 'du ba'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i tshig bla
293a5(dkon brtsegs): dgas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar na theg pa gsum po 'di dag ni theg pa gcig kho na'i grangs su mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das theg pa gcig rtogs pas bla na med pa yang
293a6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bgyi ba de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi tshig bla dgas lags so/ /
293a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings zhes bgyi ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i tshig bla dgas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mtha' ni theg pa gcig
293a8(dkon brtsegs): pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang gzhan ma lags/ chos kyi sku yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid chos kyi sku lags so/ /
293b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mtha' ni theg pa gcig gi mtha' lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das theg pa gcig gi mtha' zhes bgyi ba de ni theg pa gcig gi mthar sbyar ba'i tshig bla dgas
293b2(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni dus kyi mtha' mchis pa la gnas pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
293b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par gnas pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni 'jig rten la sman pa'i slad du dus kyi mtha'
293b4(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i thugs rje can dang / dus gyi mtha' mchis pa'i thugs dam mnga' ba ma lags te/ kye 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir dus kyi mtha' med par snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dus kyi mtha'
293b5(dkon brtsegs): med par yi dam bcas pa'i sems can a la la zhes mchi ba dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la yang dag par smra bas smra ba lags so/ /kye 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir chos/
293b6(dkon brtsegs): mi zad pa dang / chos rtag pa dang / chos brten pa dang / skyabs kyi sems can a la la zhes mchi ba dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la yang dag par smra bas smra ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de
293b7(dkon brtsegs): lta lags pas 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni skyabs ma mchis pa dang / skyob pa ma mchis pa'i 'jig rten na phyi ma'i mthar
293b8(dkon brtsegs): thug par skyabs mi zad pa dang / skyabs rtag pa dang / skyabs brtan pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das chos zhes bgyi ba de ni theg pa gcig gi lam bstan pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so/ /
294a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dge 'dun zhes bgyi ba de ni theg pa gsum pa'i tshogs kyi tshig bla dgas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das skyabs 'di gnyis ni de'i yan lag gi skyabs zhes bgyi ste skyabs
294a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi rab ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa gcig gi lam bstan pa'i chos kyang chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mtha' lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i pha rol na theg pa gcig gi

298b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni yang dag pa'i lta ba can du 'gyur ba lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos
298b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi sku nyid rtag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bde ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bdag gi pha rol du phyin pa dang / gtsang ba'i pha rol du phyin pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can
298b8(dkon brtsegs): gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku la de ltar mthong ba de dag ni yang dag pa mthong ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mthong ba gang lags pa de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sras
299a1(dkon brtsegs): thugs las skyes pa dang / zhal nas skyes pa dang / chos las skyes pa dang chos kyis sprul pa dang / chos kyi bgo skal la spyod pa zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes pa dag pa zhes bgyi ba ni
299a2(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags te 'di ltar shes pa dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni shes pa dag pa de'i spyod yul
299a3(dkon brtsegs): yang ma lags yul yang ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa rton pa bzhi'i shes pa can dag gi spyod yul ma lags shing yul ma lags pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i
299a4(dkon brtsegs): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa gsum pa'i las dang po pa rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i chos can dag gis don de khong du chud par 'gyur zhing don de rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das
299a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis rton pa bzhi bshad cing btags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rton pa bzhi po 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das rton pa gcig pu 'di lta ste/ sdug bsdug 'gog pa'i
299a6(dkon brtsegs): bden pa ni rton pa thams cad kyi mchog 'jig rten las 'das pa lags te/ de ni yang dag par rton par bgyi ba dang / skyabs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'khor ba na rton pa lags te/
299a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyid kyi dbang du bgyis nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi mtha' med do zhes bshad cing btags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mchis na 'khor ba zhes mchi na
299a8(dkon brtsegs): ni tshig de rig pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba zhes bgyi ba ni zin pa dag gi dbang po rnams 'phos ma thag tu zin pa dag gi dbang po rnams len pa la 'khor ba zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba zhes
299b1(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba'i chos gnyis kyi ming de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i tshig bla dgas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gum zhes bgyi ba dang / skyes zhes bgyi ba 'di ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gum zhes bgyi ba ni dbang po
299b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gags pa 'di lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das skyes zhes bgyi ba 'di ni dbang po gsar pa rnams byung ba 'di lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la ni skye ba 'am/ 'gum pa 'am/ 'pho ba 'am/ byung ba yang
299b3(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul las 'das pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni rtag pa dang /
299b4(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa dang / ther zug pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni tha dad du mi gnas shing 'brel la sbubs nas grol ba'i shes pa can dag gi gzhi dang / rten dang / gnas
299b5(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'brel ba ma mchis shing tha dad du gnas la shes pa grol ba ma lags pa phyi rol gyi 'dus byas kyi gzhi dang / rten dang /
299b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyang lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ma mchis na ni sdug bsngal la skyo ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la 'dod cing don du gnyer ba dang smon pa yang
299b7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa drug po gang lags pa 'di dag dang / rnam par shes pa gang lags pa 'di dang / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar
299b8(dkon brtsegs): chos bdun po 'di dag ni mi gnas pa dang / skad cig pa dang / sdug bsngal rnams myong ba ma lags pas chos de dag ni sdug bsngal la skyo ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la 'dod cing don du gnyer ba smon par mi rigs so/ /bcom
300a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa'i mthar mchis pa dang / mi skye ba dang / mi 'gag pa'i chos can sdug bsngal myong ba lags pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
300a2(dkon brtsegs): po de ni sdug bsngal la yang skyo ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yang 'dod cing don du gnyer ba dang smon par 'os so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yang bdag ma lags/ sems can ma lags/
300a3(dkon brtsegs): srog ma lags/ gang zag ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni sems can 'jig tshogs la lta bar lhung ba dag dang / phyin ci log gis nyams par gyur pa dag dang / stong pa nyid las sems
300a4(dkon brtsegs): g.yengs pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di ni dam pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po lags so/ /chos kyi sku'i snying po lags so/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
300a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi snying po lags so/ /rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi snying po lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa glo bur gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pas nye bar nyon mongs
300a6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul te/ bsam gyis mi khyab po snyam pa dag bgyid do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i sems ni skad cig pa ste/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags/ bcom

300b1(dkon brtsegs): sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i don ni khong du chud par dka' ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la bcom ldan 'das nyid spyan du gyur pa lags te/ ye shes su gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni chos thams
300b2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi rtsa ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni mnga' bdag lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni rtog pa lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal phreng gi rtogs par dka' ba'i don bshad pa gsan nas rjes su yi rang ba mdzad de lha mo de de
300b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no/ /lha mo de de bzhin te/ sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i don ni rtogs par dka'o/ /lha mo chos 'di gnyis rtogs par dka' ba ste/ 'di lta ste sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa rtogs par dka'

300b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la dad pas 'gro bar zad de/ lha mo nga'i nyan thos gang dag dad pa dang ldan zhing dad pa'i dbang du byed pa de dag ni dad pa'i snang ba la brten nas chos dang 'thun par sdud pa'i shes pas 'di la nges par 'gyur ro/ /lha mo chos dang
300b6(dkon brtsegs): 'thun par sdud pa'i shes pa zhes bya ba ni lha mo dbang po'i rnam par rig pa yid kyi spyod yul la rnam par lta ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la rnam par lta ba dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyi gnyid la rnam par lta ba dang / sems la dbang du gyur

300b8(dkon brtsegs): da ltar dang / nga 'das pa'i 'og ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga'i nyan thos dad pa dang ldan zhing dad pa'i dbang du byed pa de dag dad pa'i snang ba la brten nas chos dang 'thun par sdud pa'i shes pas rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa dang / sems kyi nye bar nyon

301a8(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gsum po 'di dag las gzhan pa'i sems can gang lags pa de dag ni chos zab mo dag la nan gyis mchog tu bzung nas gob lob kyi sems 'dzin cing mngon par zhen
301b1(dkon brtsegs): te/ ston par bgyid kun tu smra bar bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de dag la dam pa'i chos la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / gzhan mu stegs can dag sa bon rul pa lags te/ rgyal po'i thad du yang mchis la brlag par bgyi'o zhes
301b2(dkon brtsegs): mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das sa bon rul par gyur pa de dag ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis legs par tshar gcad par bgyi ba lags so/ /de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis de skad ces gsol nas 'khor dang bcas

301b6(dkon brtsegs): yod kyi grong khyer ga la ba der gshegs so/ /de nas lha mo dpal phreng 'khor dang dang bcas pas spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas lta bas chog mi shes shing mig mi 'dzums par lta bas bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing 'khod par 'gyur to/ /
301b7(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mig rgyang gis mi slebs par gyur pa de'i tshe lha mo dpal phreng 'khor dang bcas pa mchog tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i bzhin dang ldan pas gcig gis gcig gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i

302a1(dkon brtsegs): gnyen theg pa chen po la nges par bcug go/ grong khyer chen po'i bud med kyi tshogs bu mo lo bdun lon pa yan chad thams cad theg pa chen po la btsud do/ /rgyal po grags pa'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang grong khyer chen
302a2(dkon brtsegs): po'i skyes pa'i 'khor khye'u lo bdun lon pa yan chad thams cad theg pa chen po la btsud par gyur te/ de ltar grong khyer pa thams cad theg pa chen po la mngon du phyogs par byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal

302a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yon tan mtha' yas pa dang ldan te/ kau shi ka nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mdo sde 'di'i don thams cad ma lus par shes pa 'am/ blta ba 'am/
302a8(dkon brtsegs): nye bar brtags par mi nus na sems can gzhan dag gis lta ci smos kau shi ka de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni zab la yon tan chen po'i 'byung gnas yin no/ /kau shi ka de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan gyi ming yongs su
302b1(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa tsam zhig bshad kyis de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la legs so legs so zhes gsol te/
302b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtha' yas pa yang dag par bstod pa zhes bya bar zung shig /kau shi ka 'di ni yi
302b3(dkon brtsegs): dam chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig / smon lam thams cad sdud pa smon lam chen po zhes bya bar yang zung shig /dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung
