302b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sras kyi yang dag pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig / kau shi ka 'di ni lha mo dpal phreng gi sing ge'i sgra zhes bya bar yang zung shig /kau shi ka mdo 'dir bstan pa gang dag bshad pa de dag thams cad ni rgyu ba bcad pa dang /
302b8(dkon brtsegs): nges pa'i don dang / rton pa gcig pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /kau shi ka lha mo dpal phreng gi seng ge'i sgra bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ngas khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyis 'jig rten na dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas pa de srid du
303a1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad du yang dag par sgrogs shig / ston cig /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung zhing
303a2(dkon brtsegs): kun chub par byas nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / gzhan yang gang der 'dus par gyur pa dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
303a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las dpal phreng gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi
303a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhan po dzin mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bzhi
303a5(dkon brtsegs): bcu rtsa dgu pa ste 'phags pa drang srong rgyas pas zhus pa/ / bam po dang po/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ri Shi byA sa pa ri pr-its+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa drang srong rgyas pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen
303a6(dkon brtsegs): po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi 'gram rgal bar bya ba ma yin pa/ khu byug dang / ne tso dang /
303a7(dkon brtsegs): bung ba dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po dang / bya'i tshogs du ma sgra snyan pa 'byin pa/ shing p+lag sha dang / n+ya gro d+ha dang / tsan dan dang / mya ngan 'tshang dang / sa la ki'i yal gas bskyabs pa/ rtag tu me tog dri zhim po sil mar bkram pa de na dge
303a8(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ zag pa zad pa/ rdul zad pa/ chos las mi zlogs pa/ bsam gtan dang kha ton la gnas pa/ 'chag sa dang khri'i steng na 'dug na ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar
303b1(dkon brtsegs): sa phyogs de mdzes par byed pa sha stag la/ kha cig ni nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas pa/ kha cig ni shing drung na gnas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' kun bgro bar byed pa/ cha byad dul zhing brtan pa/ spyod lam rab tu zhi ba/
303b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la 'dod pa dang / gnod sems dang / snyom pa dang / gnyid dang / le lo dang bral ba sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sbyin pa byin cig /
303b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba gang yin pa gyis shig /tshul khrims kyi sdom pas bsdams shing dbang po sras la yid zhi bar gnas par gyis shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong rab tu mang po la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / 'od srung chen po
303b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / shA ri'i bu dang / bak+ku la dang / nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau di n+ya dang / de dag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po sha stag dang thabs gcig ste/ yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam mdzad do/ /
303b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe nub phyogs logs na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba zhig tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das nub phyogs logs na 'bar zhing snang ba
303b6(dkon brtsegs): zhugs kyi 'od zer lta bur gda' ba 'di ci lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo 'di ni dri nag ma'i bu drang srong 'jig rten pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan
303b7(dkon brtsegs): pa drang srong rnams kyi mchog drang srong rgyas pa zhes bya ba ste/ drang srong dka' thub drag po la gnas pa/ bsnyen par gnas pa brgya stong gis dub pa/ lus kyi mdzes pa med pa lnga brgya tsam phyi bzhin du 'brang ba la drang srong dkar min gzhon nu dang / mi lha dang / rnam par bde srung gi bu dang / ri dgas mo'i bu dang / sgra byed
303b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu dang / phur bu rna dang / me'i bu dang / rnam par rko'i bu dang / bsnyen par dga' dang / de dag la sogs pas yongs su bskor nas rjes su 'chag pa'o/ /de nas de'i bar skabs su rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba
304a1(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan gyi dben pa la dgyes pa/ shing ljon pa stug po'i nang na bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang rgyas pa 'di snyam du sems/ kye ma'o ma la ngo mtshar te/ 'di bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa phyin ci ma log pa gsung
304a2(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes 'jig rten du grags pa ni gnas yin no/ /ji ltar 'di kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan zhing rmad du byung ba'i gzugs rgya chen po phun sum tshogs pa las na 'di gdon mi za bar de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar bcom ldan
304a3(dkon brtsegs): ' das gzugs rgya chen po 'di lta bu dang ldan pas 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug gi bdag po dug dang bcas pa bzhin du spangs te bud med rin po che sa 'tsho ma la sogs pa bud med drug stong yang spangs nas dka' thub kyi nags tshal gyi nang
304a4(dkon brtsegs): du gshegs te bzhugs pa 'di ni kye ma'o 'jig rten na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'o/ /snyam du sems so/ /de nas drang srong mes sbyin gyi bus kyang rgyang ring po nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab
304a5(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /shing sngon dag gi khrod 'dug cing / /btso ma'i gser ltar ser bar snang / /gzugs ni shin tu
304a6(dkon brtsegs): 'bar bas na/ /skye bo kun kyi dga' ba skyed/ /bai dUr+ya ni dri med brag /stug nang ri rab rtse gcig 'phags/ /ston gyi nyi ma rab lhan ltar/ /dpal gzugs 'bar ba 'di su zhig /de nas drang srong chen po de dag thams cad dga' ste mig phye thal
304a7(dkon brtsegs): mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i drang srong me'i phung po ltar 'bar ba/ ral pa'i cod pan can/ rgas pa/ rab tu rke ba/ zas mi za zhing bsnyen
304a8(dkon brtsegs): par gnas pa/ shing shun dang / g.yang gzhi gyon pa/ thal bas byugs pa/ thang dang brag khrod na gnas pa/ bkres bkres ltar 'dug pa/ rlung 'gam pa/ zla ba phyed bsnyen gnas byas pa/ yan lag skem pa gcer bu ba shing shun gyon pa/ ag tshom dang /
304b1(dkon brtsegs): sen mo dang / spu ring ba/ bung ba'i kha dog lta bu/ dka' thub kyi nor can/ bzlas brjod dang / sbyin sreg dang / bsrung ba dang / bkra shis pa byas pa sa dang / bla gab med pa dang / shing drung na gnas pa/ rkang pa gyen du sgreng gtsog tsog por 'dug pa/ chu'i nang du 'jug
304b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ me mdag 'bar ba dang / sreg me rab tu 'bar ba dang / nyi mas lus shin tu gdungs pa/ dka' thub drag pos yongs su bskor ba/ bab bab tu gnas pa/ rigs tsam gyis yongs su dga' ba/ bla na med pa'i ye shes dang bral ba de dag la ltos/ dge slong
304b3(dkon brtsegs): dag drang srong chen po 'di dag ni 'khor ba las 'byung ba mi shes pa dag ste/ 'di dag ni 'dod pa dang rgyags pas myos pa/ yang srid par skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa/ lta ba'i rgyu ba yongs su ma dag pa sha stag go/ de nas dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das la sems
304b4(dkon brtsegs): thag pa nas skyabs su dong nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni tshangs par spyod pa'i tshogs sgrub pa ste/ de'i slad du bdag cag srid par skye ba mi 'dzin to/ /de nas drang srong chen po rgyas pas drang srong chen po de dag gi sems dang mi
304b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa dman zhing lta ba dman par khad kyis brtags nas gus pa skyes te/ rjes dang bcas pa drang srong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas ral pa mang po brdzes te/ mchod phyir thogs thogs pa/ sngo sangs po/ mig gnyis ser ba/ skra rtsub cing grugs
304b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ lag na dbyug gu gsum thogs pa/ gzugs rab tu mi sdug pa dang ldan pa/ nam mkha'i ngos las 'gro ba/ gtam sna tshogs kyi gtan tshigs dang ldan pa de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'khor
304b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni kun tu rmongs pa ste/ 'di na gnas lags na bdag 'dir mchis par bcom ldan 'das mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po srid par skye ba thams cad kyang ngas shes te dngos po de yang rig go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
304b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba gsal ba zur phyin pa/ zhib pa mkhas pa/ blo dang shes pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / ral pa'i zar bu'i cod pan can 'di su lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
305a1(dkon brtsegs): bo 'di ni drang srong chen po rgyas pa zhes bya ste/ rig byed rnams byed pa/ nus can bu'i bstan bcos kyis 'tsho ba/ yi ge sna tshogs sdud pa'o/ /de nas dgra bcom pa de dag thams cad kyis rgyas pa mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
305a2(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su ma grol ba lags na/ dka' thub drag pos yongs su nyon mongs pa rnyed pa 'dis ci zhig thog dgra bcom pa de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyas pa 'dis bcom
305a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la gtam gang bdag med pa'i gtam 'am/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang rab tu ldan pa'i gtam 'am/ ci'i rgyu dang rkyen gyi gtam zhig zhu snyam mo/ /de nas drang srong chen po rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
305a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'byung ba dang / da ltar drang srong chen po tshogs pa 'di shin tu rnyed par dka' ba lags so/ /gal te zhu nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
305a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /drang srong chen po khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de de lta de ltar

305b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis dris pa 'di ni rtsing ngo / /de na gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu smin ma ring ba/ gnyer ma can/ mgo skya bos lag pa g.yas pas smin ma gzar nas mig lpags bteg ste bltas nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /drang srong chen po rgyas pa 'di 'jig rten na

305b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa la dris la/ nyan thos kyis bshad pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul ma yin te mi dgos kyis/ kun dga' bo de skad ma zer cig 'di ni gnas
305b6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis drang srong chen po rgyas pa ci dang ci 'tshal ba dris pa'i lan gdab par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
305b7(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu khyod kyang de skad mi 'tsham par ma zer/ nga'i mdun na nyan thos kyis the tshom bcad pa 'di ni mi rigs te/ nga la sems can gyi sems ma rangs par 'gyur ro/ /sems ma rangs nas 'di skad du gang gi phyir rgyas pas dris nyan thos 'chad
305b8(dkon brtsegs): du bcug pa las na de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin du nges so/ /yang na ni sangs rgyas la ngar 'dzin pa yod do zhes zer bar 'gyur te/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba
306a1(dkon brtsegs): skyes nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das drang srong chen po rgyas pa'i the tshom bsal ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka'
